125290217670934.description:
Lineup:
-----------------
Marcus Strickland http://bnds.in/Wh7Tji
Marcus Strickland - saxophones
Jean Baylor - vocals
Yuki Hirano - keys
Mark Kelley - e.bass
Charles Haynes - drums

Buy Tickets: http://bnds.in/1jB3nqs
Find Local Concerts: http://bnds.in/jlStT0

Twi-Life, an electric band with its inception rooted in the soul music Marcus Strickland grew up listening to, is a testament to his irrepressible versatility. "It seems, so far, that every Twi-Life band will be significantly different than the next because it is my refuge for trying out my wildest ideas," says Strickland, who is emerging as one of the most multi-faceted and prolific writers and performers of his generation. 
 
His genre-bending propensity has produced fascinating and unconventional collaborations and this time around is no different; the members of this eclectic ensemble have worked individually with artists like Kanye West, Bilal and Meshell Ndegeocello. The group includes the wide-ranging talents of dexterous keyboardist Yuki Hirano; The Roots' newest member, bassist Mark Kelley; dynamic drummer Charles Haynes; and special guest, singer-songwriter Jean Baylor, formally of the hit- making 90s R&B duo, Zhané. 
 
Strickland's development as a producer is the nexus of this project whose music comes mostly from taking his beats and applying acoustic instrumentation and improvisation. "Once you combine the many textures, layers and number crunching of [drum] programming with human spontaneity, the possibilities are infinite and it becomes yet another instrument for human invention." 
 
"Let's hear it for audacity - the ability to fashion an artistic statement that blends uninhibited ideas with pride and self-awareness. Archie Shepp has it, Steve Coleman had it and with his rather commanding fourth disc as a leader, Marcus Strickland shows he has it, too... By blending meaty hip-hop grooves and intricate, funk-tinged rhythms, Strickland presents a cagey approach to what used to be called the crossover move... Strickland is a natural agitator throughout, unfurling his tenor lines in ways that consistently generate responses."
 - Jim Macnie (Downbeat Magazine)

>This is a public event, let's try to make this event reach as far out as possible, please. It will only take you a few seconds. 


...Took this from the facebook page: "Code to invite all friends to a event/page"
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Code-to-invite-all-friends-to-a-eventpage/169258573166847

It didn't work for me on Firefox, unfortunately, but definitely worked on Chrome. Please let me know if it worked for you or not. 

--->"Method TWO:" Also working. If this doesn't work, please view our older posts for the other method!

Instructions:
1. Click Invite Friends on whatever you are inviting people to
2. In the dropdown next to the search box, make sure Search All Friends or "Search by name" is selected!
3. Scroll ALL the way down until names stop loading (I found it easy to click the first name and then hold down the spacebar or Page Down button)

4. For EVENTS Copy this code:
javascript:elms=document.getElementsByName("checkableitems[]");for (i=0;i<elms.length;i++){if (elms[i].type="checkbox" )elms[i].click()}

For PAGES Copy this code:
javascript:var inputs = document.getElementsByClassName('uiButton _1sm');
for(var i=0; i<inputs.length;i++) {
inputs[i].click();
}

5. Past the code into the URL bar of your browser (where you type website addresses), but WAIT! Check the beginning of the URL bar and make sure the word "javascript:" is there, if it is not, TYPE IT IN! A lot of browsers automatically delete the "javascript:" portion. Press enter.
6. For large friends list, this may utilize all your resources and will cause the page to freeze and be unresponsive. Just wait a few minutes until all the names get selected.


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ALTERNATIVELY, The other method. I haven't tried it yet: 

WORKING AND VERY EFFICIENT!
Instructions:
1. Click Invite Friends on whatever you are inviting people to
2. In the dropdown next to the search box, click Search All Friends
3. Scroll ALL the way down until names stop loading (I found it easy to click the first name and then hold down the spacebar or Page Down button)
4. For EVENTS Copy this code:
javascript:elms=document.getElementsByName("checkableitems[]");for (i=0;i<elms.length;i++){if (elms[i].type="checkbox" )elms[i].click()}

For PAGES Copy this code:
javascript:var inputs = document.getElementsByClassName('uiButton _1sm');
for(var i=0; i<inputs.length;i++) {
inputs[i].click();
}

For Chrome:
5. Press (CTRL+Shift+J) for WINDOWS or (Command+ Option+J) for MAC on your keyboard.
6. Paste the code into the box at the bottom and press enter (next to the blue ">")
7. For large friends list, this may utilize all your resources and will cause the page to freeze and be unresponsive. Just wait a few minutes until all the names get selected.

For Firefox:
5. Press (CTRL+Shift+K) for WINDOWS or (Command+Option+K) for MAC on your keyboard
6. Paste the code into the box at the bottom and press enter (next to the blue ">>").
7. For large friends list, this may utilize all your resources and will cause the page to freeze and be unresponsive. Just wait a few minutes until all the names get selected.

For Safari:
5. Go to Preferences - Advanced - check "Show Develop menu in menu bar" and close the preferences window.
6. Go to Develop - Show Error Console (or Command + Option + C)
5. Paste the code into the box at the bottom and press enter (next to the blue ">").

For Internet Explorer:
5. Press F12 on your keyboard
6. Click the "Console" tab
7. Paste the code into the box at the bottom and press enter.
8. For large friends list, this may utilize all your resources and will cause the page to freeze and be unresponsive. Just wait a few minutes until all the names get selected.

#Exclusivo Profesores Registrados! Oportunidad laboral en #USA.
Se necesitan Profesores de Tenis Registrado AAT para sumarse a una experiencia laboral única en USA, para la temporada de Verano 2014 (Junio, Julio, Agosto) a ejercer como asistente de entrenador en un "Summer Camp" - las facilidades incluyen 275 acres equipadas con cabañas, salones varios, 11 canchas de tenis, 2 canchas de volleyball, 3 canchas de futbol, 7 diamantes de baseball, 7 canchas de basquetball, 2 frentes de agua, torre para escalar, 250 yardas de golf... como para destacar algunos - en New York, Estados Unidos.

Los requisitos son los siguientes: buena presencia y conocimiento del idioma ingles, tener entre 21 a 25 años de edad, (varones y mujeres), ganas de pasear en America, conocer gente de todo el mundo, perfeccionar el idioma y ganar experiencia laboral a nivel internacional.

Solo los profesores Registrados AAT, podrán postularse a través de la bolsa de trabajo de nuestra página www.tenisregistrado.com, con su usuario y contraseña, podrán acceder al portal, ponerse en contacto y coordinar una entrevista; se realizará la primer selección los primeros días de Noviembre. —
Los interesados deberán contactarse vía mail a: federojastessel@hotmail.com
*Importante: Sólo los Profesores Registrados podrán ser seleccionados en la búsqueda.

136733949830618.description:
Валерий Пономарёв — труба (США).

Валерий Пономарев - легендарный джазовый трубач . В 1973 году тридцатилетний московский музыкант  эмигрировал из Советского Союза в США. В Нью-Йорке — мировой столице черного джаза — стал трубачом номер afisha_2063_bigодин, пять лет играл в лучшем джазовом оркестре Арта Блэйки «Посланцы джаза». Сегодня Валерий Пономарев входит в десятку лучших джазовых трубачей мира. У него ученики в России и Америке, свой биг-бенд в Нью-Йорке и оркестр «Русские посланцы» в Москве.


Валерий Пономарев (V. Ponomariev,trumpet ) видео.

Every year 4 million animals are needlessly euthanized. 
We can change this!

Please join Wendy Diamond and Baby Hope for AnimalFair.com's 12th Annual Paws For Style on May 13th, 2014 benefiting the Humane Society of New York!

Proceeds support the Humane Society of New York, which receives no government funding, and to critical care for animals in need. Without this funding many loving animals will not have the chance to meet their perfect families.

Please watch this fabulous video of our Past Paws For Style benefits - to see what you will not want to miss... http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FBULfy3gnPc

Paws For Style is the premier charity fashion benefit where dogs takeover the catwalk! Fashion, celebrities, and coiffed canines in couture gather to support the animal rescue community! A bevy of celebrities, media personalities, and animal welfare philanthropists will sashay the runway as dog walkers for the event, while an array of world-famous fashion designers create one-of-a-kind outfits to be adorned by the amazing canines up for adoption.

We would love your support! You can start your own fundraiser to raise any donation amount,  tickets for Paws For Style 2014 are $150 per person (general), $300 per person (VIP), VIP tables of 10 are $5,000 (very limited), or through a corporate sponsorship.

If you raise over $5,000 you will be invited to unleash your inner supermodel and walk the Paws For Style catwalk with your dog (or cat)! This is an exclusive opportunity for for of the most loving dog and fashion lovers! Have you ever dreamed of what Naomi Campbell, Tyson Beckford, Giselle, Kate Moss, David Beckham, Miranda Kerr and Kendall Jenner feel like strutting down the catwalk (hopefully without any catfights)? Here's your once in a lifetime chance for you and your dog to be supermodels at the most furtastic fashion benefit in the world to support one of the greatest shelters in New York City - the Humane Society Of New York!

Even if you cannot attend the event, your donation (no matter the amount) will benefit  an animal in need and furever change their life!

Past Paws for Style celebrity dog walkers have included Hayden Paniettiere, Glee's Jane Lynch, Real Housewives of New York, Today Show's Natalie Morales, Tina Fey, Cornelia Guest, Hilary and Haylie Duff, Vanessa Trump, Richard Belzer, Carson Kressley, and a bevy of Ford Model beauties! You will also be joining an impressive list of designers that have donned the dogs in creative attire including Marc Jacobs, Marc Bouwer, Gucci, Dolce & Gabbana, Burberry, Chaiken, COACH, Tommy Hilfiger, Betsy Johnson, Donna Karan, Todd Oldham, Vivienne Tam, Vera Wang, Ralph Lauren , Diane Von Furstenberg, Carolina Herrera, Donna Karan, and many more!

For more information on becoming a Paws For Style supermodel with your dog visit here:

http://animalfair.com/unleash-inner-supermodel-paws-style-2014-benefitting-humanesocietyny/

Bark about it, share, and help us raise money for the Lucky Diamond Critical Care Ward at the Humane Society of New York! The critical care ward provides pet parents and their animals affordable critical health care that they might not be able to afford and wouldn't have received otherwise.

Thank you & Dog Bless! Hope you get involved - help us help animals that need our support!
1376673272599196.name: 12th Annual Paws For Style Benefitting the Humane Society of New York

1380606505549645.description:
If you have ever come across Australian DJ/Producer Rob Pix, he has most likely crashed your party, drank your vodka and left you melodically scarred all in the name of having a good time.

His productions and DJ sets draw influences from Electro, Techno, Rave, Dutch House and a myriad of dance genres. His hard hitting originals and remixes released via Downright, Sweat It Out!, Vicious and OneLove regularly attain international airplay and chart status.

Pix's releases have enlisted support from a range of iconic DJs; Chuckie, Crookers, David Guetta, Laidback Luke, DJ Craze, Bingo Players, Tommy Trash and beyond. It wasn't long before Ministry Of Sound Australia picked up on this noise and hit up Rob to stamp his uniquely futuristic sound on their 'Sessions' mix series (2011, 2012). The compilations topped the Australian iTunes dance charts and made it into the top 5 on the overall album charts.

Travelling throughout Australia every weekend, his DJ appearances include nightspots in his hometown of Melbourne as well as in Sydney, Brisbane, Gold Coast, Adelaide and Perth. Festivals such as Stereosonic, Splendour in the Grass and Future Music Festival regularly
call on his distinctive bass laden DJ sets and the high energy party vibe for which he is notorious.

Having now solidified his name on home soil and the wider Australasian circuit, the colossal
Rob Pix sound is poised for take off.
1380606505549645.name: Rob Pix (Melb) at HNY #BRONK

--- ATÖLYE PROGRAM DETAYLARI ---

Stage Performing Arts Center, ülkemizdeki performans sanatlarının gelişebilmesi adına Amerika New York eyaletinde uluslararası düzeyde eğitim veren, dünya çapında sektörün önderlerinden olan Broadway Dance Center ile anlaşarak eğitmenlerinin Türkiye’de dans atölyeleri vermelerine öncülük ediyor!

Stage PAC ve Broadway Dance Center iş birliği ile düzenleyeceğimiz dans atölyeleri ve dansçı seçmeleri kapsamında Broadway Dance Center eğitmenlerinden “Caitlin Gray”, 12-13 Nisan 2014 tarihlerinde ülkemize gelecek; ve toplamda 4 adet dans atölyesi düzenlecektir. 

ATÖLYE PROGRAMI:

12 Nisan Cumartesi 15.00-16.30 Jazz Funk
12 Nisan Cumartesi 17.00-18.30 Commercial Jazz
13 Nisan Pazar 15.00-16.30 Modern Dans/Contemporary
13 Nisan Pazar 17.00-18.30 Street Jazz/Hip Hop

Tüm atölye katılımcıları arasından eğitmenimiz tarafından yetenekli görülen kişiler Amerika - New York eyaletinde bulunan Broadway Dance Center'da BURS KAZANMA fırsatını yakalayacaktır!

BURS DETAYLARI:

Burs kazanma fırsatını her bir atölyeden sadece 1 kişi yakalayacaktır! 

TÜM atölyelere (4 ders) katılan kişiler arasından eğitmen tarafından yetenekli görülen 1 kişi, BDC International Visa Program için TAM BURS kazanacaktır!

TAM burs kazanan kişinin, BDC programı süresince KONAKLAMASI Stage Dance Studio tarafından karşılanacaktır.

Herhangi bir atölyeye katılan kişiler arasından 3 kişi, BDC International Visa Program için $500 burs kazanma hakkı yakalayacaktır.

* Eğitmenin burs verme hakkı saklıdır.

International Visa Program:
http://www.broadwaydancecenter.com/isvp/index.shtml

ATÖLYE KATILIM BEDELİ:

1 sınıf katılım ücreti: 50 TL
2 sınıf katılım ücreti: 90 TL
3 sınıf katılım ücreti: 135 TL
4 sınıf katılım ücreti: 160 TL 

* Kayıt yaptıran 1, 5, 10, 25, 50, 75, 100, 125 ve 150. kişilere Broadway Dance Center (BDC) Shop'tan HEDİYE YAĞMURU!!!

1 kişiye BDC logolu t-shirt
1 kişiye BDC logolu havlu
1 kişiye BDC logolu boxer şort
2 kişiye BDC logolu matara
6 kişiye BDC logolu anahtarlıklar

(Hediyeler atölye bitiminde sahiplerine teslim edilecektir.)

---
12 Nisan Cumartesi saatler 23:00 gösterdiğinde Atölye Katılımcılarına özel ve BDC eğitmenimiz Caitlin Gray katılımıyla coşacak "REHAB DANCE PARTY"ye davetlisiniz! 

Girişler ücretsiz!
Sınırsız dans, sınırsız müzik, sınırsız eğlence!

REHAB DANCE PARTY 
12.04.2014 / 23.00
---

Kayıt için:
Stage Performing Arts Center
02122636967 - 05358335297
info@stagedancestudio.com

*Ödeme yapıldıktan sonra kayıt işleminiz tamamlanmış olacaktır. 
**Nakit, havale/eft veya kredi kartı ile ödeme yapabilirsiniz.
***Sınıflarımız kotalıdır.

Türkiye'de ilk kez gerçekleştirilecek olan bu organizasyonla STAGE PAC yine kalitesinden ödün vermiyor ve ülkemizde performans sanatlarının gelişimine bütün gücüyle destek olmaya devam ediyor!

139026072934778.description:
On June 6th First Friday’s in Allentown will be hosting an outdoor art & craft market and we are seeking artists and crafters to set up tables to sell their merchandise. 

From 6-9 pm Allen Street between Franklin and Virginia Place will be closed to traffic and we will fill the street with tables and booths. We are also thrilled that The Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural Site will be joining us in this event. We hope you will join us in a night of food, music, art and fun! 

The cost for participation is $35 which will cover the cost of a vendors permit and will secure you a 12'x12' space (enough to provide space for a standard 10'x10' EZ up tent). 

We CANNOT provide tents, tables or chairs, we will do our best to help you locate one should this infringe on your ability to participate, but we cannot guarantee them.

Interested vendors can apply by sending the following information to 
allentowngalleries@gmail.com: 

•	Your name
•	Business name
•	Postal mailing address 
•	Email address
•	Phone number
•	Website (if you have one)
•	3-5 images of your work. Images should be at least 4" x 6" 300dpi and in .jpg format as we will be using selected pieces for publicity purposes.

Please also give a brief description of the work you plan to sell at the event (i.e. prints, clothing, ceramics, handbags, paintings, jewelry, etc.) as well as materials used and/or processes used. Be sure to include any details that might give a better understanding of the work (sustainable practices etc…)

Applications are due by 5pm May 9th, selected vendors will be notified via email on May 12th and the $35 fee is due by May 23rd.

Please note that all vendors are solely responsible for obtaining and tracking all sales tax related to the sale of their merchandise. 

Any and all questions can be directed to: allentowngalleries@gmail.com


PLEASE NOTE THAT THE DATE ON THIS "INVITE" IS FOR THE APPLICATION PERIOD. The event is scheduled for June 6th.
139026072934778.name: Allentown First Friday's June Art & Craft Market

1390383421184049.description:
AWAKEN YOUR UNLIMITED POTENTIAL 
 
In this breakthrough workshop you will gain the tools that will help you break all your old bad habits/patterns, learn how to effortlessly adopt the habits that seem impossible to adopt, and you'll experience living a life you've always dreamt of! 

Whether your deepest desire is to be in a passionate loving relationship, become financially free, be in a career you love, build an incredible beach body, or to be happy and blissful 24/7, this workshop will show you how you can achieve that almost effortlessly! 

Free yourself and allow your true colors to soar in this life shattering, mind shifting, incredibly transformational workshop. 

This workshop is for those who are truly ready to take life to the next level! For those who were made for greatness, and who know they have what it takes to live the life they always dreamt of!


What to expect: 

• Experience a cognitive shift that will dramatically destroy all your old negative habits and patterns.

• Awaken hidden powers that you've never known you had. 

• Find out how to become the creator of your life - learn how to erase all negative past experiences and rewrite your entire future instantly! 

• Get guided through an intense interactive process that will miraculously unlock and awaken the parts of your brain that have been asleep your whole life. 

LIFE WILL NEVER BE THE SAME! 



Testimonials: 

• For four years I was stuck. There was something stopping me from being the person I knew I was meant to be. After attending this workshop, I finally feel like I can spread my wings and fly again. -Brandon H. , L.A., California 

• Nothing beats this workshop. Ayelet is amazing at what she does. She has helped me so much. She is my secret weapon. -Kawai A., New York, NY

• Ayelet knows how to relate to any type of person she encounters. If you are looking to live a life you love she is the person to meet. She has a practical solution for every obstacle. This workshop will take your life to a whole new level. -Eyal M., Miami, Fl. 



Who is Ayelet Shimron?

Ayelet is a Transformational Life Coach, Motivational Speaker and Published Author. After rising to the top of a Fortune 500 Company as the #1 salesperson nation wide, Ayelet sought out to fulfill her purpose, which is to help and inspire every person she meets to live a life they truly love and enjoy. You better get ready and brace yourself, because Mass Transit's final concert of this school year is almost here! 

Wow! It's been one crazy ride lately. MT has been touring up and down the coast and singing all around the city, but have finally returned home to finish off the year. We're putting together an ear-tickling/side-splitting set to see everyone off. Don't miss our best concert yet, not to mention our last concert for our senior members!

I know what you're thinking, "April 26th? Isn't that like sort of kind of possibly near finals? Oh no, I might might be super busy!" 

NOPE! YOU'RE IN LUCK!

It's way before your finals for once! Come out for one last hurrah with everyone's favorite stripe-clad a cappella group and end the school year off with a bang before we all have to lock ourselves in Bobst forever!

We will be having TWO special guests joining us--both from the NYU cappella scene! Come hear NYU's own Ani V'Ata and APC Rhythm in a night you won't forget (and some of you might not remember)!

Tickets are just $5 NYU/$7 Non-NYU at Ticket Central at Skirball, or at the kiosk on the 2nd floor of the Kimmel Center (the night of the event). The show will likely sell out, so plan accordingly!

 See you there!

SPEND AN EXTRA HOUR AT THE AUTO SHOW AND SAVE ON ADMISSION!

NY Waterway takes you right to the Javits Center in 8 minutes to see the 2013 New York International Auto Show.  

No tunnels or midtown traffic and parking problems means more time to spend at the show. Buy a round-trip ferry ticket and get a discount on show admission with the special link below. Buy your adult or child ticket online and use your ticket voucher at Port Imperial Terminal in Weehawken, NJ.
Enjoy the show!
 
FERRY - SHOW COMBO TICKETS AVAILABLE:

★ PURCHASE TICKETS HERE: http://ow.ly/sGHCc

★ PURCHASE TICKETS HERE: http://ow.ly/sGHCc 

Fun for the Family

The New York International Auto Show is full of activities that are fun for parents and children. Every year there are lots of things to do for the kids. Here are some tips for having a great day at the show for the whole family:
• Check out the floor plans and schedule of events to make sure that you get to all of the fun exhibits.

• Many exhibitors have activities specifically for kids including simulators, video games, movie cars and more.

• There's also an iPhone app with all of the important show information for parents on the go.

• Don't forget your cameras! Filming and photography is allowed and encouraged.

• Strollers are allowed and kids 2 and under are free.
Whether it is a family tradition or your first show, there is something for everyone and always a great value!

1394527234159695.description:
In this show, Marcie Kaufman explores the ever evolving, dynamic landscape and architecture of New York City. Kaufman photographs buildings, storefronts, and iconic structures throughout Manhattan and Brooklyn, then cuts into, paints on, or applies decorative interior surface materials to certain digital archival prints and Polaroids, leaving other prints unaltered. The result makes change visible, foregrounding the effects of age, time, and weather. Kaufman blurs the line between past and present, painting and photography, abstraction and representation, the mechanical and the handmade. She captures the layers of New York, an old city eternally reinventing itself.
marciekaufman.com

Opening: Sunday, April 13, 3 - 5 pm
On view: April 10 - 30
Gallery hours: Tuesday - Friday 10am - 6pm; Saturday 12pm - 6pm
1394527234159695.name: Marcie Kaufman,  City of Gold: The Changing Face of New York

Español

El Conservatorio de Mariachi de la ciudad de Nueva York se enorgullece en anunciar la presencia de Irma Infante homenajeando a su padre Pedro Infante (D.E.P) y su madre Irma Dorantes en su 3er Conferencia Anual del Mariachi en Junio del 2014!
Irma Infante es la hija de la gran actriz Irma Dorantes y  icono de la película Mexicana Pedro Infante.  Siguiendo los pasos de sus padres legendarios, Irma Infante ha disfrutado de una carrera como actriz, cantante y artista de grabación.  En 1995 recibió un premio como Mejor Actriz de la Asociación Mexicana de Periodistas de Radio por su trabajo en la telenovela "Tres Destinos".  Muchos la conocen por su trabajo en innumerables programas de televisión como "Cada Quien Su Santo", "Lo Que CallamosLlas Mujeres", y más recientemente, "Emperatriz", con Gabriela Spanic y Bernie Paz.  Irma caminó por la alfombra roja para el estreno de su primera película americana "En Busca Del Sueño Americano" en Houston, TX.  

Su padre Pedro Infante fue el más famoso actor y cantante de la Epoca de Oro del Cine Mexicano, y sigue siendo el ídolo del público Mexicano.  Su madre Irma Dorantes, continúa actuando en México y es el autora del libro muy elogiado "Asi Fue Nuestro Amor", que narra su vida con Pedro Infante.  Irma Infante lleva esa rica tradición a través de su música y la excelencia artística. El 15 de Septiembre del 2011, se celebró en El Grito de Independencia cantando en la Armería en el Hudson en la ciudad de Nueva York acompañada por el Mariachi Tapatío de Álvaro Paulino.  

English

The New York City Mariachi Conservatory is proud to announce the presence of Irma Infante honoring her father Pedro Infante (R.I.P.) and her mother Irma Dorantes at their 3rd Annual Mariachi Conference this June 2014!

Irma Infante is the daughter of Mexican Film Icon Pedro Infante and the great actress Irma Dorantes.  Following in the footsteps of her legendary parents, Irma Infante has enjoyed a career as an actress, singer and recording artist.  In 1995 she received a Best Actress award from the Mexican Association of Radio Journalists for her work on the Telenovela “Tres Destinos”.  Many know her from her work on countless television shows like “Cada Quien Su Santo”, "Lo Que Callamos Las Mujeres”, and most recently “Emperatriz”, with Gabriela Spanic and Bernie Paz.  Irma walked the Red Carpet for the premier of her first American Film “In Search of the American Dream” in Houston, TX.  

Pedro Infante was the most famous actor and singer of the Golden Age of Mexican Cinema and remains the idol of the Mexican public. Her mother Irma Dorantes, continues performing in Mexico and is the author of the highly praised book “Asi fue nuestro amor”, which chronicles her life with Pedro Infante.  Irma Infante carries on that rich tradition through her music and artistic excellence.  On September 15, 2011, she celebrated El Grito de Independencia singing at the Armory on the Hudson in New York City accompanied by Mariachi Tapatio de Alvaro Paulino.
139541499581148.name: 3rd New York City Mariachi Conservatory Conference

THE CHAMPIAN FULTON CONCERTS ARE IN MEMORY OF RENEE DORUYTER. 
100% OF TICKET SALES TO BE DONATED TO THE CANADIAN BREAST CANCER FOUNDATION

Renee Doruyter was a talented Vancouver jazz vocalist and one of the most dedicated supporters of jazz in Vancouver, both through the columns she wrote for The Province newspaper for many years as well as through her support of and regular appearances at Cory Weeds Cellar Jazz Club. A warm and generous woman, her enthusiasm and knowledge contributed immeasurably to Vancouver’s thriving jazz community. She will be greatly missed.

After 13 years as a jumping joint on West Broadway in Kitsilano, Cory Weeds’ Jazz Cellar closed its doors on Feb 26th. 

Cory returns in April as The Cellar Jazz Society and The Hard Rubber New Music Society are proud to present an exciting concert series in 
Alan and Gwendoline Pyatt Hall at the Vancouver Symphony Orchestra School of Music in downtown Vancouver.

Charismatic New York singer and pianist Champian Fulton is the talk of Manhattan. Though still in her late 20s, she's got the lived in voice that gives authority to all the classic show songs and invites comparisons with everyone from Billie Holiday to Carmen McRae. And she plays great piano. She'd have Erroll Garner checking her out. No one has created a stir like this since Diana Krall burst onto the scene. She was tutored in jazz by Clark Terry while still a tyke and gained youthful appreciation of big bands from Red Holloway, Butch Miles and other Basie-ites. In other words, 27-year-old pianist and vocalist Champian Fulton was taught to swing by experts and, as demonstrated six years ago on her debut recording with David Berger’s Sultans of Swing, learned her lesson well.

Reminiscent of another big-voiced, hard-swinging Oklahoman, Kay Starr, with scraps of Sooner State twang still evident. As befits her musical upbringing, Fulton favors an old-school approach, recalling the bandstand era when vocalists dotted, rather than dominated, a tune. Her playing, too, hints at days gone by, echoing the round joviality of Oscar Peterson.

Her latest release "Sings And Swings" opens by skillfully navigating the cross-breezes of “Tenderly,” and adds plenty of bounce to “You’re Getting to Be a Habit With Me,” a rolling “It’s Alright With Me” and a loose-limbed “I’m Gonna Sit Right Down and Write Myself a Letter.”
1396440487297789.name: CHAMPIAN FULTON: VOCALIST/PIANIST FROM NEW YORK CITY featuring Cory Weeds tenor saxophone, Jodi Proznick bass, Julian MacDonough drums.

Thanks to the generous support and efforts of our chapter members, TZM NYC will be hosting its annual flagship event, Zeitgeist Day (Z-Day), on Saturday, March 29th, from 11AM - 3PM EDT. The event will be held at TRS Inc. Professional Suites, 40 Exchange Place (also known as 27 William St.), 3rd Floor, Room 1, New York, NY 10005.

ADMISSION IS FREE!

For full event info, visit this page: http://www.tzmnyc.com/#!z-day-2014/cedq

FEATURING:
Bakari Pace
Author of Enough. For All, Forever & Founder of The World House Institute

Federico Pistono
Social Entrepreneur, Researcher, Activist, & Author of Robots Will Steal Your Job, But That’s OK: How to Survive the Economic Collapse and Be Happy

TZM LECTURE TEAM:
Jay Jameh, Harry Cason, Johnny Hobbes, and Saul Marcus

DISCUSSION PANEL GUESTS:
Rob Robinson
Member of the Campaign to Restore National Housing Rights supported by the National Economic and Social Rights Initiative - a policy and research organization

SYNOPSIS:
The event will begin with an introduction to The Zeitgeist Movement followed by a series of speakers and presentations and conclude with a Q&A/discussion panel.

What is Z-Day? 
Zeitgeist Day, or Z-Day, is the Zeitgeist Movement's annual flagship awareness event, consisting of global simultaneous events occurring in March of every year. Events include talks, presentations, screenings, and Q&A sessions covering topics in science, technology, sociology, engineering, systems theory, sustainability, and more. Events are held with the goal of increasing public awareness of The Zeitgeist Movement and our potential for a globally sustainable society.

THIS EVENT IS SOLD OUT. To be added to our waiting list, please send an email with your request to peter@riverspiritmusic.com

“Fans of Dixie Chicks, Alison Krauss and Dolly Parton, take notice: Nora Jane Struthers embodies everything you could want in an Americana singer-songwriter.” — NPR 

Virginia-born Struthers (http://www.norajanestruthers.com)
was educated at NYU’s Steinhart School of Education and taught at a charter school in Brooklyn, while cutting her musical teeth as a folk-rock performer in New York clubs like CBGBs and the Cutting Room. She decided to move into music full-time after attending such convocations as Virginia’s Galax Old Time Fiddlers Convention and North Carolina’s Mount Airy Fiddlers Convention with her father.

Nora Jane and her band have already been booked to perform this summer at Grey Fox Bluegrass Festival, MerleFest, Strawberry Park Bluegrass Festival, Riverhawk Music festival, Ellicott Mountain Music Festival, and GALOT Music Festival.

Suggested Donation - $22 at the door
100% goes to the musicians
Pot-luck dinner 1 hour before show – bring a dish!
Tickets at www.riverspiritmusic.com

「2014 美國就業輔導基金會 USCOF Spring Job Fair 第12届台灣留學生徵才及就業博覽會」活動說明

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
一、活動名稱: USCOF 2014 Spring Job Fair 第12届台灣留學生徵才及就業博覽會

二、活動時間: 2014 年 4 月 4 日(星期五) 下午 13:00~下午 17:00 

三、指導單位: 紐約協和門窗( CRYSTAL WINDOW & DOOR SYSTEMS LTD) 與 駐紐約臺北經濟文化辦事處 (Taipei Economic and Cultural Office in New York)

四、主辦單位: 美國就業輔導基金會 (US Career Orientation Foundation) 

五、贊助公司及單位: 
Crystal Window & Door Systems Ltd 
紐約僑務委員會(Overseas Chinese Affairs Council, R. O. C. (Taiwan)) 
Telesia LLC
Helio Energy System 

六、活動地點: 駐紐約臺北經濟文化辦事處 (Taipei Economic and Cultural Office in New York)

七、活動地址: 1,E. 42nd Street New York, NY10017 U.S.A.

八、交通方式: 搭乘 B,D,F,M train至 42 ST Bryant Pk 下車或7 train至 5 Av 下車, 步行5分鐘即可到達。 

九、活動目的:
1. 促進大紐約地區台商與學生求才求職雙方之就業媒合。
2. 使在學學生及求職人士瞭解紐約產業之發展現況、人才需求情形, 作為未來求職選擇的參考。
3. 協助公司招募台灣留學生之優秀人才。

十、活動對象: 大紐約區台灣留學生 (含大學部及研究所)、台灣畢業校友 、 社會人士及有興趣踏入產業者。

十一、活動流程
下午13:00 ~下午13:50pm: 
貴賓及廠商代表致辭 

下午14:00 ~ 下午17:00:
現場面試開始

備註: 如現場人數過多, 16:30pm以後限制入場, 請同學儘早入場。

十二、活動形式:
(一)現場徵才攤位:
公司人員駐留會場攤位提供徵才諮詢,以當面解說的方式提供求職者就業相關資訊,並收取學生履歷表。 

(二) 現場收取履歷攤位: 
不克前來的廠商, 本基金會設置收取學生履歷區。

十三、 去年參展廠商名單
1. Acer Inc. 
2. Asia Bank, N. A. 亞細亞銀行
3. Chinatrust Commercial Bank Co, Ltd New York Branch 
中國信託商業銀行紐約分行
4. Crystal Window and Door Systems 協和門窗公司
5. Core Continental Construction 美國大陸工程公司
6. CSI Technology Group 西思艾軟體科技公司
7. Hanart Building Technology, LLC
8. Kung Fu Tea 功夫茶
9. Queens Museum of Art 皇后區藝術博物館
10. Telesia LLC 泰力西亞國際有限公司 
11. Tyga-Box Systems 
12. Vista Skywall Systems
13. Wei Wei & Co. LLP 
14. A&G Jewelry International 
15. World Journal 世界日報

本次參展廠商名單將會在 3/21 公布

十四、參展單位參加辦法
1、報名日期: 即日起至額滿為止。 

2、請於聯絡Alex或Leon專員索取「廠商邀請函」及「公司註冊表」, 收到後請將註冊表填寫完畢並將EMAIL檔 至 本組聯絡信箱
(cc3830@nyu.edu) 美國就業輔導基金會收, 主旨請註明:申請參展 2014 就博會-- OO 公司。

3、因現場空間有限,請儘早報名,以免向隅,如申請參展單位眾多, 則優先提供有徵才需求之廠商設攤。

4、錄取參展本校就業博覽會廠商名單確認後公布於本組網頁。 

十五、其他注意事項:
如在本次第12届台灣留學生徵才及就業博覽會活動期間,
若有任何疑問, 請洽專員Leon 先生 專線: 765-404-0734 
或請洽專員Alex 先生 EMAIL: cc3830@nyu.edu

Teev and ISRAMERICA present "ROCKDIM ATZMAUT" with Rami Kleinstein, Israel’s most renowned pop superstar performing LIVE at B.B. King with his 7 piece band for a special Yom Ha'atzmaut concert!

"ROCKDIM ATZMAUT" with Rami Kleinstein 
Monday, May 12th, 2014
B.B. King Blues Club, 237 West 42nd St. New York, NY
Doors open at 6:30PM, Show starts at 8:00PM

Tickets: $45 Standing Room, $55 Seated, $85 VIP
RSVP HERE: www.tinyurl.com/l5jellt

For VIP Tickets Call: 718-997-9848 Hani
For more info and tickets visit: www.teev.com or www.isramerica.com
Please note VIP tickets can be purchased by phone only. 

Known as one of Israel's greatest composers, Rami Kleinstein has often been compared to Elton John and Billy Joel. Like John and Joel, Rami is known for his beautiful love songs, soothing voice and delicate piano-playing. Rami, a native New Yorker, aptly and cleverly weaves his songs together with rich anecdotes laced with a poignant, delicate humor, that give the audience insight into Rami’s life as well as tidbits of Israeli history. Rami’s piano playing is stellar, as is his soulful and captivating voice.  Apart from being a triple platinum and gold album award winner, Rami is also known for composing and arranging music for other singers, most notably the Israeli superstar, Rita, to whom he was married for 19 years.
This special Yom Ha'Atzmaut show will feature a selection of original songs from Rami’s enormous personal repertoire as well as songs from his new album "small gifts". A one-of-a-kind performance not to be missed!

ROCKDIM ATZMAUT" with Rami Kleinstein 
Monday, May 12th, 2014
B.B. King Blues Club, 237 West 42nd St. New York, NY
Doors open at 6:30PM, Show starts at 8:00PM

1404230263180549.description:
Get ready New York, "Cambalache - One Night in Argentina" is an event like no other that turns the concept of wine tasting completely on its head. This is a cutting edge, multi-sensory event showcasing the passion, complexity and contradictions that define Argentine culture.  Music, wine, food, street art, cocktails, dancing, masterclasses and a whole lot more.

In one immersive evening's experience, Cambalache will invoke all the senses and offer the following:

:: Over 120 of Argentina’s finest wines from 26 of the top Argentine wineries

:: The unconventional art of pairing wines with music, hosted by renowned multi-sensory experts and flavor consultants, Oxford and London professors Charles Spence and Barry Smith

:: True Buenos Aires street food from Sur Empanada, historical Argentine cocktails, circa 1940, from Malbec House, the thirst-quenching local beer, Quilmes and the famed Dulce de Leche ice-cream from Cones

:: Three of Argentina’s most prolific street artists Cabaio Stencil, Roma and Tec will create a live mural during the event

:: A lesson in Buenos Aires street slang (to stir up trouble) with James Bracken, author of the cult book Che Boludo

:: Music from DJ Uproot Andy, whose label Que Bajo spotlights bass-filled South American music"

:: Plus a host of other uniquely Argentine experiences including exposure to the spirit of Argentine literature, dancing Nuevo Tango with Strictly Tango and rubbing elbows with Gauchos

Location: Brooklyn Night Bazaar, Williamsburg, Brooklyn
Date: Wednesday April 16th and Thursday April 17th 2014 
Time: 6pm-11pm

Tickets cost just $80, including all food and drink (unlimited wine)

Included in your Cambalache ticket is the chance to win a set of two airline tickets to travel from New York-JFK to Buenos Aires on Aerolineas Argentinas plus 3 nights accommodation at the Pan Americano hotel. Winners will be announced each night at 9pm at the event and must be present to win. 

For more information visit: http://www.winesofargentina.com/cambalacheny
1404230263180549.name: CAMBALACHE - ONE NIGHT IN ARGENTINA! (New York)

1406927362901829.description:
Please join us and attend our Art/Photo Exhibition in New York to help raise awareness into the enslavement and deaths of Nepalese migrant workers in Qatar. As per the Guardian, if left unchecked, the death toll could surpass 4,000 by the start of FIFA's World Cup in 2022!

The featured Artists:

Hitman Gurung - Currently a lecturer in Wigen and Leigh College (WLC Nepal) Kathmandu, he is also the co-founder of an art space named Artree Nepal.  His art work symbolizes the synthesis of the present contrast in society. And, he narrates socio-political issues through different forms of art.

Milan Rai - The founder of the concept of "White Butterflies", Milan uses white butterflies in his installations as a symbol of pure transformation , He believes that every individual, like a butterfly, has the power to transform themselves and when this transformation happens collectively, we can observe miracles in their truest form. 

Kunsang Gyatso - The son of a traditional Buddhist artist, Gyatso's paintings are colorful, large-scale abstract landscapes, drawing influences from Rothko, de Kooning, Buddhist thangka art and Brooklyn artist Jason Sho Greene. His work is a vivid abstraction of his deeply spiritual upbringing. 

ALL PROCEEDS FROM THE EVENT WILL BE DONATED TO Heart Beat, WHO WILL DONATE THE FUNDS TO COMMITTED - AN NGO WORKING WITH THE FAMILIES OF THE DECEASED NEPALESE MIGRANT WORKERS IN QATAR.


Details of the event:
Venue: Himalayan Yak Restaurant, 72-20 Roosevelt Avenue, Jackson Heights, Queens, NY - Via the MTA, Take the 7, E, F, V, R to Roosevelt Ave or 74 Street.
Date: Saturday, March 29th and Sunday, March 30
Time: 11:00am - 6:00pm
Suggested Donation: $20 (Or any amount toward the cause).
Contact: Karma Tenzing Nyangmi (Phone: +1 718 801 3069) 




- A brief history into the atrocities migrant workers face in Qatar:

There are an estimated 1.2 million migrant workers in Qatar, mostly builders, and the country is expected to ship at least 500,000 more in preparation for FIFA's 2022 World Cup. Earlier last year, the Guardian stated that during the period from June 2014 until early August 2014, an average of more than one Nepalese migrant worker died per day. At this rate, International Labor Organization (ILO) warns that more than 4,000 migrant workers could die between now and the start of the World Cup in 2022 unless drastic measures are taken to provide better living and working conditions. Even among perfectly healthy young men, mostly within their 20s-30s, heart attacks are a major cause of death along with accidents at the construction sites. Workers had been often denied access to drinking water in extreme heat, had not been paid in months, beaten on a daily basis and had their passports confiscated to prevent them from leaving the country- in effect enslaving them.

The chain of modern day slavery and exploitation leads from the labor recruiters in Nepal's poorest villages, where men are promised jobs and salaries to help support their families left back home, to the governments of Nepal and Qatar.  Also equally involed are the officials of soccer's governing body, the Federation International de Football Association (FIFA). The overriding image here is one where the wealthiest of the world's nations takes advantage of one of the most poverty stricken countries in order to get ready for the world's most popular sporting tournament, the soccer World Cup.

Learn more about the events leading to the modern day slavery crisis in Qatar and ways you can support the petition to stop the atrocities: http://www.change.org/petitions/end-slavery-of-nepalese-migrant-workers-in-qatar?utm_campaign=petition_created&utm_medium=email&utm_source=guides

Related information can be read at:
http://www.theguardian.com/world/2013/sep/25/revealed-qatars-world-cup-slaves
http://www.theguardian.com/global-development/video/2013/sep/25/qatar-migrant-workers-world-cup-host-video
1406927362901829.name: New York: Art Exhibition for Human Rights (Qatar Movement - 2nd Phase)

1408403332748115.description:
THIS IS HOW WE DO IT…

**Ft. Poet Carina Del Valle Schorske, Ziek McCarter, and the extraordinary Musician/Poet Shawn Randall of Symphonics Live**

Come to hear where New York poetry is going, and sign up for one of our 10 OPEN MIC slots. Vote for your favorite poem to be published online at www.thepoetinnewyork.com. 

$10 admission at the door. Come early to sign up to read!

CARINA DEL VALLE SCHORSKE (https://twitter.com/FluentMundo) is a poet, translator, editor, and essayist longing to leave Cambridge, Massachusetts. She is a MacDowell Writing Fellow and her writing has appeared in the Yale Literary Magazine, Transition, and the Hypocrite Reader, among other venues. She's heard of Twitter (@fluentmundo) but is more invested in working with traditional forms, like Facebook.

ZIEK MCCARTER (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aMa79edrwjE) is a young San Fran Front-man/ Singer/Songwriter and Entertainer Extraordinaire, whose soulful voice and electrifying stage presence have quickly become a captivating force in the Bay Area’s music scene. After traveling the nation and performing alongside SF Funk bands like,  Afrolicious, Ziek McCarter & The Soul Train Revival, Con Brio, Martin Luther, Will Magid Trio, and ‘Oscar Myers & Steppin’,  Ziek was successfully funded by fans at large through Kickstarter to produce his Solo Debut EP entitled, "Eden".  Experience "Eden" as Ziek McCarter provides you a live preview into this very place he calls, "the source of life and love"
1408403332748115.name: The Poet in New York

NOTE:  Good news!!  You do NOT have to attend the live event to support this project.  Your alternative:  simply go to Amazon, search "Jasmynne Shaye," and point and click until you are the proud owner of this new book.  You'll be so glad you did (trust me).

Hello, Everyone!

To some this is news, but to others you know that I’ve had visions of releasing my first book for a while now.  Well it seems that things settled just long enough for me to complete the manuscript and I am beyond excited to share it with everyone.

I’m not asking much – just support ya’ girl by purchasing a copy of the book.  That’s it.  Easy-peasie.  You need not leave your home (unless you’re in NYC, then I’d love you to attend the release as well).  You need not trek in the snow or sit in traffic.  Just a “point” here and “click” there and you’re set!

HERE ARE THE DETAILS

1412611219001550.description:
Sounding Circles Invites Special Guest DREAM SEED this month to co-create THE SOUND SOAK located at the New York Open Center - Golden Drum and Didge Project invite you to experience Dream Seed: A Shamanic Sound Journey in Manhattan for the first time!

Dream Seed is a sound bath meditation hosted by members of Golden Drum and Didge Project. Shamanic chanting, mantras, overtone singing, Native American songs, indigenous music, didgeridoos, crystal singing bowls, bells, gongs, harmoniums, tuning forks and other overtone-emitting instruments are used to create an environment conducive to deep relaxation and inward investigation. Participants are led through guided meditations and sound healing practices designed to harmonize body, mind and spirit.

The SOUND SOAK is a montly meditational sound-bath concert created and hosted by Joule L'Adara and located at the New York Open Center. Each month features different guest collaborators from the greater New York community of sound healing practitioners and consious musicians. 

The Sound Soak will be followed by tea, mandala drawing and grounding integration. 

Doors open at 7:30 pm
No entry after 8:15 pm!

Tickets: $25 online and $30 at the door 

Register online and save $5 here!: 

http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e93qn3xqce465a86&llr=8zcssleab

More info about the presenters:

1414567798794649.description:
“NY Loves Dilla”  is the first ever official J Dilla tribute show in NYC, featuring special performances by Talib Kweli, Phony Ppl, YC the Cynic and surprise guests, with an all-Dilla set by DJ Parler following the show! Hosted by Jarobi of A Tribe Called Quest, this event will be the first annual Dilla tribute show in NYC to honor the legacy of the Grammy Award-winning producer, James “J Dilla” Yancey, and directly benefit the J Dilla Foundation. 
 
Regarded as one of the greatest hip hop producers that ever lived, J Dilla (aka Jay Dee) emerged from the underground hip hop scene of Detroit, Michigan in the mid ‘90s. He formed the Detroit-based hip hop group, Slum Village, and went on to play an integral role in much of the classic hip hop music produced from the mid ‘90s up until his death in 2006, working with big acts such as A Tribe Called Quest, Busta Rhymes, Common, MF Doom, The Pharcyde, De La Soul, and more.  
 
Hip hop veteran and Brooklyn emcee, Talib Kweli, one half of Black Star with Yasiin Bey, and a torchbearer for the Dilla legacy, contributes a special performance to the first annual “NY Loves Dilla” tribute show. Deemed one of the most lyrically-gifted, socially aware and politically insightful rappers to emerge in the last 20 years, Kweli began working with Dilla in 2001 for his solo debut album, “Quality.” Bridging the gap between the old and new generation of Dilla beneficiaries, the youthful and amorphous Brooklyn-based fusion-funk band, Phony PPL, and the young Bronx-based emcee, YC The Cynic, will also take the stage, as well special surprise guests.
 
Doors for this historic event will open at 6:30PM, and the show will begin promptly at 8PM. Tickets go on sale today (March 3rd, 2014) at 3PM and can be purchased at www.websterhall.com. Proceeds will benefit the J Dilla Foundation. 

MORE ABOUT THE J DILLA FOUNDATION:
The J Dilla Foundation is a non-profit organization that serves to help fund inner-city music programs, and provide scholarships to students attending schools that have progressive music curricula. Started by Maureen “Ma Dukes” Yancey, mother of acclaimed producer James “Jay Dee aka J Dilla” Yancey, the foundation seeks to be the staple in the movement for progressive music education and to be a leader in the efforts to enhance and develop arts programs in urban communities.  It is the foundation’s hope that by funding and encouraging progressive music curricula to be studied and cultivated in communities and higher learning institutions, young prodigies and music enthusiasts alike will have the tools they need to flourish and become successful within the entertainment industry. For more info, please visit www.jdillafoundation.org.
1414567798794649.name: NY Loves Dilla, The 1st Annual Official New York City J Dilla Tribute  w/ Talib Kweli, Phony Ppl, YC The Cynic, and Surprise Guests

1416837671901004.description:
Gegužės 20 d. į Vilnių antrą kartą atvyksta šiuo metu, ko gero, viena geriausių Europos instrumentinių post roko grupių – airiai GOD IS AN ASTRONAUT. Grupės turas neįvardintas jokiu specialiu pavadinimu, išskyrus – „Live“ / „Gyvai“, tačiau suplanuotas itin intensyviai po visą Europą nuo pat kovo pradžios. Vienas iš turo taškų – Vilnius, klubas „New York“. 

GOD IS AN ASTRONAUT jau yra išleidę 7 puikius albumus ir yra vertinami visapusiškai: už profesionalią, originalią kuriamą muziką, už estetinį skonį ir jų muzikinę kūrybą lydinčias ypatingas vizualizacijas, už įspūdingus gyvus pasirodymus su audiovizualiniais efektais ir už požiūrį, kurio neišdavė nuo pat susikūrimo. Semdamiesi didžiulės patirties, apkeliavę visą pasaulį ir turėdami visas galimybes pasukti komerciškesniu keliu, muzikantai išlieka ištikimi sau ir vis dar laikosi idealo – kurti tik tokią muziką, kuri jiems patiems yra graži.

1417040408544187.description:
The 2014 Thumbs UPstate Improv festival is almost here! Thumbs UPstate will bring 18 improv teams (and one sketch team) from across upstate New York to the Central New York Playhouse for three nights and one day of awesomeness.

THUMBS UP SUPER FUN TIME VARIETY HOUR(S)
Thursday, April 3 will introduce the Thumbs UP SUper Fun Time Variety Hour(s) to the Thumbs UPstate festival. Performance artists of all kinds (improvisers, stand-ups, musicians, poets, whistlers, mimes) are welcome to come display their talents for all of the world to see(or all of the world that can fit into the CNY Playhouse). Doors open at 7:30, show goes on at eight. Visit thumbsupstate.com if you want to perform.

IMPROV NIGHTS
18 improv teams, and one sketch team, from Syracuse, Rochester, Binghamton, Ithaca, Troy, and Oswego have been invited to perform on Friday, April 4 and Saturday, April 5. We’ve got long form and we’ve got short form. We’ve got pro teams, college teams, a high school team, and whatever you call Satan’s Closet. Doors will open at 6pm both nights, shows start at 7pm and will go all the way until 11:30. The full roster of teams will be listed here as the big weekend approaches.

IMPROV WORKSHOPS
We’ve got some great workshops instructors lined up for Saturday, April 5. We will have two workshops each happening from 11am - 1pm and from 3pm - 5pm. Law Tarello and John Thompson from Rochester, Scott Austin from New York City, and Syracuse Improv Collectivists Stephen Peters and Ken Keech will all lead workshops with different areas of emphasis.

The Thumbs UP Super Fun Time Variety Hour(s) and each Improv Night are just $5 for all guests and performers. Workshops are $10. A festival pass that will allow entry to ALL events, including workshops, is also just $10. So if you take a workshop you might as well go see some comedy because it’s essentially free.

Like Thumbs UPstate Improv Festival on Facebook for updates, and keep on checking out thumbsupstate.com for more information.
1417040408544187.name: 2014 Thumbs UPstate Improv Festival

The show is FREE & ALL AGES!

http://www.temptband.com
http://www.soundcloud.com/temptband
http://www.facebook.com/temptband

///////////////

BIO: Kids want to rock and Tempt is the band they've been waiting for. Comprised of Zach Allen (vocals), Harrison Marcello (guitars, keyboards, vocals), Zak Gross (bass, vocals), and Jimmi Kane (drums), this New York City-based band is all about big hooks and big riffs. Tempt brings musicianship, style, performance, and an intense rock sound to a new generation.

Tempt is an explosive new band built on a love for melodic rock. The band is fronted by two 19 year olds on vocals and guitar has taken the heritage of the Sunset Strip, New Jersey and the streets of their hometown New York City and made it their own to take rock into the 21st century.

Following their highly anticipated performance at Rocklahoma in Pryor, OK on May 25th, they plan to tour nationwide to promote the release of their debut album "Under My Skin". They have their sights set on making 2014 their year.

1420229651559951.description:
Dear friends,Vasil Hadžimanov Band took part in the first on-line Jazz competition in the world called MADE IN NY and YOU can help them get there to represent the Balkan side of JAZZ!

Go to: http://www.fundedbyme.com/en/campaign/3436/vasil-hadzimanov-bend
for detailed list of how the funds will be used, when's our deadline and what rewards are on display.
Our deadline is set for the 15th of April, two weeks before departure.

FUND OUR CAMPAIGN HERE AND BACK US UP WITH A €10 ($14) MINIMUM AND WE'LL GIVE YOU FANTASTIC PRIZES IN RETURN IF WE CROSS THE MINIMUM TRESHOLD OF ☛ €1000 (aprox. $1380)❤ 

Let me tell you, Vasil Hadžimanov Band is the most generous band on earth!

Vasil’s ideas of mixing Balkan traditional, folk rhythms and melodies with the western, modern musical styles (jazz, funk, world music…) in his own music, is completely authentic and a new approach to fusion and jazz music. It was these ideas that inspired him to form this band, back in 1995, when they made their first recordings and started performing live, for the first time.

Let's represent!

/Much love, Žana Erdeljan and VHB!
www.vhband.com

_______________________________________ 

Poštovani,

Htela sam da vas zamolim da podelite sa vašim prijateljima, poznanicima i relevantnim finansijerima novost o nedavno pokrenutom projektu sakupljanja novca namenjenom Vasil Hadžimanov Band-u i pokrivanju troškova VIZA, PUTA, SMEŠTAJA I DNEVNICE za New York (period 2-14.maj)

Tražimo da 50% od budžeta bude finansirano od strane ljudi koji žele da pomognu da ovaj prominentni bend predstavlja Srbiju na Jazz festivalu u New York-u.

Zavisimo dosta od naše dijaspore u Švedskoj i ostalih zemalja u Skandinaviji (i USA) pa i šire da ovo uspe zato se nadamo da želite da podržite i širite vest o ovoj akciji jer imamo malo vremena da osiguramo finansije i počnemo pakovanje za New York ;) (do 15-og aprila!)

Naravno da želimo da budžet dostigne naš cilj a to je da sakupimo 200% nebi li pokrili sve troškove avanture…

Pročitajte sve o projektu na engleskom ovde: https://www.fundedbyme.com/en/campaign/3436/vasil-hadzimanov-bend/

www.vhband.com

_________________________________________
VASIL HADŽIMANOV BAND

VH Band uspešno kombinuje tradicionalne balkanske folk ritmove i moderne zapadne muzičke stilove (džez, fank, rok, “world music”…) što njihovu muziku čini autentičnom. Za više od petnaest godina postojanja bend je snimio 5. albuma, nastupao na brojnim festivalima i koncertima, svirao sa poznatim svetskim i domaćim muzičarima (Nigel Kennedy, Teodosij Spasov, Marko Đorđević, Toni Kitanovski, Aleksandar Petrov, Bachar Khalife, Bisera Veletanlić i drugi).
VH Band sarađivao je sa Goranom Paskaljevićem i njegovom filmskom ekipom na snimanju dokumentarnog filma o Beogradu. Njihova muzika se takođe može čuti u filmu “011 Belgrade”, mladog austrijskog režisera Michaela Pfeifenbergera, u filmu Raše Andrića „Kad porastem biću kengur“, kao i filmu “Stvar srca” reditelja Mike Aleksića.

Sva izdanja i muzika Vasil Hadžimanov Banda su u Srbiji proglašeni za umetnička dela od kulturnog značaja za ovu zemlju.

------------------------------------

/S' ljubavlju, Žana Erdeljan i VHB!

Epilog:
Razlog mog angažovanja je nerazumevanje nedostatka interesovanja kulturnih insitucija Srbije i svih (meni) relevantnih organizacija da finansira predstavljanje svoje zemlje na ovako značajnom festivalu. To se odnosi i na Srbiju i na Ameriku!

Surova selekcija (tj. prioritet) kandidata za finansiranje iz budžeta kulture neobjašnjiva zašto VHB ne ispunjava sve kriterijume… Mislim da privatna inicijativa, mi, publika, "fanovi", kolege, entuzijasti možemo da uzdrmamo legitimitet svih onih koji misle da ćemo sedeti skrštenih ruku. /Žana Erdeljan

1423977601188696.description:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/sidrabelldance/sbdny-new-york-city-season-2014

SBDNY has crafted a unique model as a progressive brand that produces mind bending dance. Launch our 2014 NYC Season by pledging at any level today!

SBDNY has crafted a unique model in New York CIty as a progressive, boutique company that produces mind bending dance theater events.  In 2011, the Company joined the Kickstarter family to create a sustainable practice of making and producing new work yearly through crowdfunding. With the support of our growing donor base and an increasing international reputation we have grown exponentially.  We are ecstatic that we have been able to produce three amazing seasons from large scale Kickstarter campaigns. 2013-2014 proved to be our most successful year to date with many international engagements. The past year has seen Bell and the Company expand its vision through residencies, educational partnerships, commissions, and tours to Vancouver, Germany, Atlanta, Philadelphia, Pittsburgh, Detroit, Ohio, Memphis, and San Francisco to name a few. In 2014 Vancouver's Straight said- "Bell is rapidly gaining an international profile for her visceral work...The work demands both physical power and tender expressiveness from her crack ensemble of fearless and technically honed dancers."
With the 2014 New York City Home Season fast approaching we are asking that you consider making a contribution of any size to support the technical and production costs that will bring our two exciting NYC premieres to the stage.  
K I N G D O M and garment were created over several tour stops and in residency.  We bring these evocative works to you this May for the annual performance season at our New York City home Baruch Performing Arts Center over the course of two weeks.

Here's what the international press is saying about the Company and its newest works:
"Bell & her company are at the forefront of innovative contemporary dance."- The Vancouver Sun
"Bell's company is regularly in demand throughout the world, and critics are more and more frequently identifying her as one of the most intriguing and significant choreographic voices of her generation."-Creative Loafing Atlanta
"rising star"- Pittsburgh City Paper
"The five performers were some of the most unique, expressive, and secure artists I've seen in a long time… Pittsburgh is lucky to have witnessed the progressive force that is Sidra Bell Dance New York."-Pittsburgh Examiner
"incomparable"- Vancouver's CTV

2014 programs description- *material world…. Sidra Bell’s latest evening length events attempt to rescue the individual by constructing two new worlds that navigate popular zeitgeists. Conceived through materials, K I N G D O M (World Premiere Tanz Farm, Atlanta) and garment (World Premiere Kelly Strayhorn Theater, Pittsburgh) use small performance ceremonies to observe antiquation, literacy, transfiguration, and reformation.*
We hope you will join us in New York City and help us realize our Kickstarter goal. Your donation will go directly towards the production costs necessary to produce these full-scale evenings. Invest in the future of Sidra Bell Dance New York...

Program A:
K I N G D O M
May 8-11, 2014
Th-Sat @ 8pm, Sun @ 7pm
TICKETS
Program B:
garment
May 15-18, 2014
Th-Sat @ 8pm, Sun @ 7pm
TICKETS
We thank you for your ongoing support! think.feel.play.experience
Sincerely,
Sidra Bell & The Company

Kickstarter Link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/sidrabelldance/sbdny-new-york-city-season-2014

1424471814475649.description:
{YOUR NAME HERE} : A Queer Theater Company
presents

A Developmental Workshop of

DON'T DRINK FROM THE RIVER

Written by MJ Kaufman
Directed by Will Davis 

NINA - Jonny Beauchamp 
BO - Jax Jackson
MAY/MOTHER/NURSE - Bianca Leigh 

Casting - Judy Bowman, C.S.A.

Artistic Director - David Macke

Co-Presented by THE TANK

*** Nina is a 4.0 high school senior from a privileged family, but when her mom won’t get out of bed, she goes looking for parenting and support at a queer and trans youth drop-in center.   She instantly connects to Bo, the only other trans-person she sees and, as they become friends, she asks him to come stay with her and her mom. 

DON'T DRINK FROM THE RIVER tells the story of three transpeople who’s lives become inextricably connected.

Don't miss out on this groundbreaking work of theatre!

Performances: May 2,3,4, @7pm, each night
at
The Tank - 151 West 46th Street 

Tickets Available Now!

Please support our Kickstarter campaign and donate $ to pay our creative team.  Any amount is greatly appreciated.  We are a non-profit company and all contributions are tax deductible.

“the production is loud, filled with commotion, and perfectly over-the-top. It offers a chance to witness comedic acting at its finest ”
Natasha Ashley, NY Theatre Guide
http://nytheatreguide.com/2014/04/theatre-review-laughter-on-the-23rd-floor-at-the-central-new-york-playhouse/

“CNY Playhouse’s ‘Laughter on the 23rd floor’ a ‘skyscraper’ of a comedy“
David Abrams, cnycafemomus.com
http://blog.cnycafemomus.com/2014/04/20/april-18-cny-playhouse-laughter-on-the-23rd-floor.aspx

“is a reminder that second rate Neil Simon is better than first rate almost anyone else. “
Len Fonte, Syracuse.com
http://www.syracuse.com/entertainment/index.ssf/2014/04/central_new_york_playhouse_scores_with_laughter_on_the_23rd_floor.html#incart_river

“Laughter” is largely an ensemble effort  ...Czarny took care to cast the right actors in each role. “
Russ Tarby, Eagle-Bulletin
April 23rd Print Edition

Set in 1953, Neil Simon's "flat-out funniest play in years" (Dennis Cunningham, CBS- TV) re-creates the mayhem, neuroses, nonstop gags, and constant one-upmanship of a team of brilliantly funny social misfits as they write The Max Prince Show, a weekly variety program. Among the crew are Milt, the insult artist; Ira, the hypochondriac whose dream is to have a virus named after him; and Val, a Russian émigré‚ who takes a Berlitz course so he can curse without an accent. They are devoted to their boss, Max, a comic genius, a tyrant, and a paranoiac with a heart of gold. But his penchant for tippling and popping too many pills is growing under the pressures of a rising McCarthyism, network executives, and sponsors who want him to cut back his "too-smart" show and staff so that they can chase after the Leave It to Beaver and Father Knows Best audience.
 
The Cast and Crew of Laughter on the 23rd Floor

Time to shake off the winter and thaw out with the Good Looks New York family at the premier event House Warming, taking place at Brooklyn's own The Graham.

On the lineup:

BASS CONTROL: Good Looks New York's stellar DJ Bass Control is getting ready to jet off to Miami to play at Ultra Music Festival for the 11th consecutive year, but before he does, he's making a pit stop at The Graham to deliver a sultry disco-house sound to your eardrums. Consistently moving the crowd with his soulful grooves Bass Control epically blends fresh techniques with old school flavor. This veteran DJ is sure to light the dance floor on fire!

FLO: Good friend to Bass Control, DJ FLO has surely cultivated a  unique sound and style that has been fine cut like a F1 diamond through the years. Having just played in Australia and the Winter X Games, Flo's hip hop house style raises the energy high in any arena. His ever evolving sets keeps you on your toes, always raising anticipation for whats going to be next!

SPOOKY BUSINESS (DJ DUO): Just added to the roster, the electric DJ duo from Buffalo, NY will be jetting down south and hitting that L train to come and kick off our House Warming party. Spooky is one of the fastest growing DJ's groups in North NY. Be ready for a sincere slap in the face with fat baselines and sauced-out party grooves. 

There might just be a surprise or two in the mix as we are celebrating the Big Boss of GLNY's birthday, Trevor Titley, as well as Wallnutz (Mr. Paul Weingart) and long time GLNY supporter Mike Drangel. 

Please come and celebrate, get a little tipsy, and grind on your best friend with us at The Graham's cozy dancefloor!

1433791733531611.description:
Asalamu Alaykum!

In the Name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
 
All praise and thanks are due to Allah, and peace and blessings be upon His Messenger.
 

We at City Tech MSA are excited to invite you all to our first event in over a year!


In a post-911 America, Islamophobia is very real. First generation American Muslims are struggling to maintain their faith in an environment that is often at odds with their practice. Between parents who may not relate to societal norms, and non-Muslims who may not understand the struggle of being Muslim in the West, we find our youth unable to navigate where they belong. While some of us cope with this by developing an inferiority complex about our faith, others cope by protesting everything Western, condemning it all as evil. Is there a middle ground? Can there be an American Islamic identity? Can Muslims be positive, active, and engaged members of the community while maintaining their faith? What is our role in society?


We will be privileged to have Brother Cyrus McGoldrick and Dr. Raymond Brock-Murray advise us in this matter.

Free Entry/Dinner and Refreshments will be served 
_______________________________________________
All Non-Cuny students are required to RSVP to this event to be allowed to enter the building.  To RSVP please inbox City Tech MSA with your full name and the school that you go to.


DIRECTIONS: F going downtown to jay street metro-tech. The R to court street. The 4 or 5 train to borough hall. These trains all put near the school!

Please share this with all your friends and family! 
Jazak Allahu Khairan.
See you there.

The Lit City Trax posse has been waving the flag for grime ’n’ bass, future house, footwork and a slew of related styles from dance floor’s nether regions for a number of years now. Part rave night, part record label, Lit City is on the frontlines when it comes to getting down and dirty. The decommissioned strip club at The Westway is sure to provide the perfect setting for a night of grimy club ruckus, led by their resident DJs and a string of prominent guests.

In 2013, the Red Bull Music Academy set up shop in New York City, bringing our annual series of workshops, lectures and events to the city that never sleeps. This May, we’re returning to New York City for another month-long series of music and art events. As a legacy to the mark we left with the Academy, the Red Bull Music Academy Festival New York will become an annual public event series.

We Ride Together - European Tour 2014:
TURISAS koncertas (folk, power, symphonic metal)
+ special guests
..................................................

Bilietus platina TIKETA kasos ir internete:
http://www.tiketa.lt/turisas_koncertas_folk_power_metal;_suomija_we_ride_together__european_tour_2014_46030
..................................................

Suomijos roko grupės mėgsta Lietuvą – čia lankėsi įvairaus kalibro kolektyvai, pradedant violončelių virtuozais „Apocalyptica“, baigiant monstrišką įvaizdį propaguojančiais „Lordi“. O 2014-ųjų balandžio 17 dieną sulauksime grupės „Turisas“, kuri visame pasaulyje išgarsino originalią, suomišku folkloru ir istoriniais žygiais paremtą sunkiąją muziką.

Karingieji suomiai savo instrumentus žvangina nuo 1997 metų, kuomet šešetas muzikantų susibūrė nedideliame Suomijos mieste Hämeenlinna. Nuo pat pradžių savo kūrybai pasirinkę folk metalą, o pavadinimui – Suomijos mituose populiaraus karo dievo vardą, ilgainiui „Turisas“ sukūrė ir išpopuliarino taip vadinamą karo metalo žanrą. Manoma, kad jo pavadinimas kilo iš 2004-aisiais išleisto debiutinio grupės albumo „Battle Metal“. Ypatingas grupės skambesio akcentas – vietoj tradicinių gitarų daugelis solo partijų atliekamos elektriniu smuiku.

Šiuo metu „Turisas“ diskografijoje yra jau 4 studijiniai diskai, kurių paskutinį – 2013 m. rugpjūtį išleistą "Turisas2013" – grupė pristato koncertiniame ture "We Ride Together - European Tour 2014". Ši kartą gerbėjams nereikėjo laukti 3 ar 4 metų - ketvirtasis "Turisas" opusas klausytojus pasiekė po 2 metų. Be to, dar 2008 metais pasirodė kol kas vienintelis grupės DVD „A Finnish Summer With Turisas” - tai dokumentinis filmas su koncertiniais intarpais.

Nepaisant narių kaitos, grupė išsaugojo ne tik jai būdingą savitą skambesį, bet ir ypatingą sceninį įvaizdį. Kai šis nerimastingas šešetas scenoje, plaikstosi senoviniai apdarai ir šmėsčioja įspūdingai dažyti muzikantų veidai.

Ar jau girdite griaustinį? Balandžio 17 dieną Vilniaus klube „New York“ bus laikas susitikti su karo dievu!
1433939610163302.name: TURISAS koncertas Vilniuje, NEW YORK, 2014-04-17

DJs (Club):  Soulful Torino ( R&B,Jive,pocorn,rock&roll )
DJ (Bar): Pd-Easyset (sleazy 50's, Early R&B,Exotica,Jumpin' blues)
 Live: Phil Shoenfelt & Southern Cross
New York Junk,
Lorraine Leckie & Her Demons

Three bands that share strong links to the downtown New York scene of the late 70s and early 80s. Members of these bands have played on the stages of such legendary clubs as Max’s Kansas City and CBGBs. Though mostly coming from outside New York, their spiritual home is the Lower East Side. The attitude is New York hipster-cool, while the music itself has that unmistakeable dirty downtown sound. Phil Shoenfelt & Southern Cross (Dark Wave Post-Punk Heroin Rock). Now based in Prague, Englishman Phil Shoenfelt lived and played in New York from 1979-84 in bands such as Khmer Rouge and The Nothing. New York Junk (Downtown Johnny Thunders-style Punk Rock). Featuring Cynthia B-Girl and Joe Sztabnik. Lorraine Leckie & her Demons (Weirdo-Gothic New Folk). Singer-songwriter Lorraine's recent work includes a collaborative project with bon vivant/journalist/poet Anthony Haden-Guest. The concert at Bassy on Friday 21st March will be a psychedically blue and soulful night, showcasing three acts whose music has intimate connections to classic New York rock.

Das dj-Project Soulful torino besteht seit 10 Jahren. Luis und Jimmy sind die bekannteste Djs Italiens, was 50er und 60er Jahre Musik betrifft, spielen in den besten Clubs und Festivals der Halbinsel. Sie sind Gast-djs bei den wichtigen raregroove Veranstaltungen Europas wie For Dancers Only (Wexford, Ireland), Tiki Room and Riche (Stockholm, Sweden), Cargo (London Uk), Jester Wild Show (Leipzig, Germany), Soulsystmet (Kopenhagen, Denmark) und Le Bourge (Lausanne, Switzerland)

1438777623029158.description:
Have you missed TRANSCEND, Eris Revolution's free Wednesday trance & progressive party?  Well, we're fucking back on Wednesday, April 30th, 2014, celebrating the birthday of Moneta [Eris] with some of the best artists in town (shhh it's a surprise... let's see how long it takes her to find the event ;)).

Wednesday, April 30th, 2014
9:00 PM - 4:00 AM
No Fun
161 Ludlow St. (b/t Houston & Stanton)

All-night drink specials include $6 Ketel One drinks and other specials that change nightly.


DJs:
=====
Zack Roth
James Gill
DJ Wants
Moneta [Eris]
Affection [Eris]


Bios:
=====
Zack Roth
---
He has been a celebrated NYC-based DJ for the better part of a decade, regularly performing at acclaimed clubs throughout his native city and beyond. In 2011 alone, he played alongside some of the world's biggest djs, the likes of Armin van Buuren, Above & Beyond, Markus Schulz, and Ferry Corsten in front of sold-out crowds at Roseland Ballroom, Best Buy Theater, Pacha NYC, and of course Electric Zoo.

This past year, Zack's music has reached an even wider audience through his original productions and remixes. Zack now has music signed to a variety of top international labels, including Enhanced Music, Anjunadeep, Flashover, Silk Royal, and Baroque Records. As both a DJ and producer, his style of music can be described as progressive, and always 100% danceable. His DJ sets and productions alike showcase his passion for numerous genres of electronic dance music -- from tech house to electro, progressive to trance.

https://www.facebook.com/zackrothmusic
http://soundcloud.com/zackroth


James Gill
---
Building a name based on his one-of-a-kind "groovy" progressive style, James has risen to play in New York's biggest clubs alongside major international talent, as well as championed his own headlining concept shows "ReInvented," the last of which was performed to a capacity crowd. His productions are supported by numerous underground artists, and his unmistakeable flow during his sets has intoxicated crowds from New York to Europe.

https://www.facebook.com/jamesgillofficial


DJ Wants
---
Wants is a Trance & Progressive DJ in NYC. His international podcast Relentless Reverie, published on iTunes and Mixcloud with a live show on Mixify and a supporting website at RelentlessReverie.com, has become a staple in the trance community featuring tracks from the likes of Armin van Buuren, KhoMha, Leon Bolier, Raneem, Orjan Nilsen, Arnej, Markus Schulz and more.

Wants has been gracing the decks with his signature Trance sound at clubs around NYC since early 2013. For info on his upcoming shows, stay in touch on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/djwants -and- Twitter @DJWants.


Moneta [Eris]
---
Moneta has always had passion for music, driven by her parent's eclectic music collection and their encouragement to learn music. At 11 she learned to play the saxophone and started exploring the local records shops shortly thereafter. Her inspiration behind the decks comes from classic electronic acts like Depeche Mode, New Order, and Acid House acts like 808 State and S'Express. DJ/Producer influences range from Sasha, John Digweed, Jeff Mills, Markus Schulz, Jody Wisernoff, Gareth Emery, Nick Warren, Sander van Doorn, and of course Armin van Buuren.

Moneta has lived in San Francisco, Dallas, and even Barcelona before moving from Los Angeles to New York City. Shortly thereafter she began working in the New York City electronic music scene, observing the DJs, the crowd, and the promoters, gaining the knowledge and experience to take to the decks and start spinning music and throwing awesome parties herself.

Using her experience and passions, Moneta aims to give people a unique musical journey while still keeping true to her love of Trance and Progressive. 
Web: http://www.DJMoneta.com/
FB: https://www.facebook.com/moneta.kallesti


Affection [Eris] 
---
For Affection, music is about creating emotions, and trance music is the ultimate tool for sharing any and every emotion. "Trance is a constant flow. Every song is a building block in one or more emotional directions, and by the end of an epic set, the audience is left both overwhelmed and craving more."

Over the last decade, Affection has traveled the world to find and study the masters of powerful dance music. Affection entered the industry as a producer in order to delve deeper into the inner workings of the song, and now combines all of his experience together by performing with one goal: to make a crowd feel.

Beyond music, Affection is a civil rights advocate, tech entreprenuer, world explorer, and professional troublemaker, and when not on the road lives in New York and Miami Beach. 

Web: http://www.affection-music.com/
FB: https://www.facebook.com/affection.jon
Beatport Mixes: http://mixes.beatport.com/dj/affection/259720
1438777623029158.name: Eris Revolution presents: TRANSCEND Birthday Edition with Zack Roth, James Gill, DJ Wants + more

1438942846344416.description:
The Triangle created between Copenhagen, Istanbul and New York has given the name to The Triangle Project. A  collaborative Art, Music, Activist and Cultural Exchange project bringing people together across new boarders and states of mind.

The event at TBA Brooklyn will in the early evening have focus on the current situation in Turkey following the Gezi Resistance Movement in Istanbul. Film screenings* will be held with a follow-up panel debate with Turkish New York based artists, writers, journalists and activists. The panel debate will be hosted by Ahmet Bugdayci who is an editor and colommist of weekly Turkish paper Posta212 based in New York.

Digest Me!- A food art performance by Dilara Erbay and Franka
Gezi was fed by tear gas and transformed it to an inspiration of an awakening. Now it’s time for digesting. Let's get rid of our "gas" a.k.a ego and let's release. Take me as who I am I and digest me! A magic herbal tea can help with cinnamon, cardamon,  thyme, mint, lavender, rose, cumin and cloves.

Live music by the New York acoustic trio The Falconers.

Starting out the Night is the Danish sound artist Jacob Kirkegaard, who recentlywas in the first Sound Art Exhibition at MoMA, with one of his amazing sets.

The next live act is the up an coming Danish solo act FRANKA, who sings, plays various instruments, sequencers, pedals and samplers creating a powerful soundscape of pleasure and pain.

Bringing the crowd onto the dancefloor is DJ Taylan with a line-up of other Istanbul DJ legends. They will play a variety of house, techno, Turkish funk and beats that will be sure to light your fire.

TAYLAN (TBA Brooklyn, Redukt, AUF) / Techouse, Techno
BERK DOGAN (Deep House Proposal) / Deep House, House
MEMOS (Soul Revue, Dinamo) / Turkish Psychedelic, Disco, Folk

*Film Screening of the documentary film “Year of Dreaming Dangerously – Change in Turkey” by Tom Frey and the short Kickstarter.com film from the Istanbul based photographer Charles Emir Richard that helped fund his book called “Barikat”. A wonderful, just off the press, photography book about what happened in Istanbul in the spring of 2013. Also screening of Brendon Stuart's "99%" film and Claus Ankersen's "TOXIC TUESDAYS"

FREE DANISH CARLSBERG BEER!

6pm-4am

NO COVER
