437074573055252.description:
The 1st AAMA debuts In the
CIty Of New York, USA July 19 2014 @Peter Jay Sharp Theatre Broadway NewYork;

This is A Global Music Awards For

African Musicians.
THIS IS OUR CULTURE, OUR STYLE, OUR PRIDE & LEGACY. AFRICA MUSIC WORLDWIDE

Presented by
The Academy of African Music & Arts.

THE ALL AFRICA MUSIC AWARDS is conceived to reward deserving Talented African Artistes, promoters and producers in the music industry all over the World who have made significant progress in music and entertainment industry, bringing the beauty of African Culture to the World.

It is annual event focused to celebrate African musicians, Producers, Song writers, Music promoters, Record label owners, Music marketers, DJ, Music Video Producers, Radio and T.V stations, Entertainment Journalists, Contemporary African cultural musicians etc.

It is targeted to create awareness of music from African origin and an avenue to promote African music to the western world. It will also be an avenue to solicit support for the marketing, promotion and encouragement of African musicians who are under publicized and marketed.

The first edition of the Award shall be held in New York City, USA on September 20, 2014 from 8 pm (ET). It shall be aired live by FOX Television Network.

The All Africa Music Awards (AAMA) shall kick off with other live music performances featuring selected African and American Musicians before the Awards presentation to be anchored by renowned entertainment impresarios.

J. Martins, a popular African musician is the Host for the event.

The theme of this Awards show is “Mercy World Concert” Dedicated To The Forgotten Children Of Africa.

JOIN US LETS MAKE HISTORY TOGETHER
437074573055252.name: ALL AFRICA MUSIC AWARDS (AAMA)

On June 20, 2014, Project HEAL will be holding its 6th annual gala to further its mission to raise funds in order to provide financial aid grants for people with eating disorders who desperately want to recover but cannot afford treatment.  This year’s gala will take place at EVR in New York City. This elegant event will feature:

- Three (3) hour open bar

- Dessert stations

- Robust live and silent auction

- “Faces of Recovery”, an art exhibition about those affected by an eating disorders and the wonderful outcome of their recovery journeys

- Remarks by Liana Rosenman and Kristina Saffran, Founders of Project HEAL

- Annual Awards




For information on event sponsorship opportunities, please contact Sara Brody at sara@theprojectheal.org

ABOUT NESTORA AND THE STRUGGLE 


The uphill fight to free Nestora Salgado
Fred Hyde
April 2014

Seattle, Dec. 10, 2013. Salgado’s husband, José Luis Ávila, and two of her daughters, Grisel Rodríguez (center) and Ruby Rodríguez. Photo: Jim Coley

Nestora Salgado is both a naturalized U.S. citizen and an indigenous leader in her Mexican hometown of Olinalá, Guerrero. Last summer, Mexican authorities jailed her on trumped-up charges related to her role as the elected leader of Olinalá’s community police, which defends people against violent drug cartels and corrupt officials.

The grass-roots campaign to liberate Nestora is part of the hard-fought battle against neoliberalism. Over the past decades, the U.S. has joined many plans, treaties and alliances with Mexico aimed at opening up markets for the U.S., securing its oil supplies, and, ostensibly, combating narco traffic. In reality, Washington’s “War on Drugs” has been about protecting the profits of transnational corporations and foreign banks, including billions from laundering drug money.

As Marxist historian James Cockcroft notes in his most recent book on Mexico, the real targets of these Mexico/U.S. alliances are “immigrants, original peoples, guerrilla resistance, political dissidents, and social movements protesting transnational corporations that take over water and cause mining pollution.”

Clampdown and defiance. The U.S. wants stability in Mexico, something the Mexican government has been unable to achieve despite over $350 million in U.S. aid last year. So President Peña Nieto has resorted to sending thousands of federal troops to Guerrero and other states that have a history of indigenous-led insurgency. With the backing of Guerrero Governor Ángel Aguirre Rivero, they engaged in a dragnet operation last August that swept up leaders of the community police movement in Guerrero, including Salgado.

Past crackdowns have included murder and disappearances of opposition activists and ordinary people as well. This time, civilians are forming self-defense groups and electing community-based police forces, referred to as “comunitarios.” Despite government attempts at suppression and control, they are driving cartel criminals and corrupt politicians and police from their cities and towns. The comunitarios continue to hold mass demonstrations raising the demand to “Free Nestora” and others arrested with her.

Nestora’s liberty depends on all of us. Organizing around this unjust imprisonment has brought increased collaboration between leftist groups in the U.S. and Mexico and more broadly. It has also shown respect for women’s and indigenous rights by defending an independent woman of color, and confronting gender and racial prejudices that divide us.

Nestora is a political prisoner. Her prospects for getting a fair trial are poor. This is obvious by the way the prosecutor has piled on bogus charges against her — for example, 50 counts of kidnapping and allegations of leading a “criminal conspiracy.” Meanwhile, U.S. officials have done nothing to free her.

Nestora’s residence is in Renton, Wash., just outside Seattle. Recently, the campaign has won an outpouring of support from U.S. labor, including the 400,000-member Washington State Labor Council; Pacific Northwest Regional Council of Carpenters; Seattle/King County Building and Construction Trades Council; American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees Council 28; and coalitions of Black and women unionists. This has encouraged Mexican unions to sign on too.

Members of Nestora’s family spoke at numerous events and demonstrations celebrating International Women’s Day where they read greetings from Nestora. Reporters for several mainstream news organizations in Mexico interviewed her sister Clotilde.

This backing and publicity has achieved some improvement in Nestora’s treatment in jail. More pressure is needed to get her out of prison. Salgado’s champions need to urge Secretary of State John Kerry to call on the Mexican government to drop all charges against her.

Visit the campaign’s new website (see below) for updates, more background, and info on how to help, in English and Spanish. Please make a donation toward campaign expenses.

Contact Fred Hyde, a member of Nestora’s Northwest defense committee, at fhyde@igc.org.

LIBERTAD PARA NÉSTORA SALGADO

¿Quien es Nestora?

Residente del área de Seattle, Nestora Salgado es una prisionera política que ha estado encarcelada injustamente en el Rincón, un centro de detención de alta seguridad en Nayarit, México, por delitos que no cometió.
Ella ha luchado por los derechos de los pueblos indígenas en el estado de Guerrero,México.
Actuando en conformidad de una ley mexicana que defiende los derechos de los pueblos indígenas para formar su propia policía local. Nestora organizo una fuerza policial en su comunidad natal de Olinala con el apoyo inicial del Gobernador de Guerrero.
La policía comunitaria se utiliza para defender a los residentes de la ciudad de los criminales que obligan a las niñas a prostituirse, venden drogas y utilizan la violación como una forma de control social. Los policías comunitarios también lidiaban con cuestiones de género, como la violencia doméstica.
Salgado fue detenida por la policía federal el 21 de agosto de 2013, bajo cargos falsos de secuestro, esto ocurrió después que los policías comunitarios ejercieron su autoridad legal para detener al síndico del pueblo por manipulación de pruebas en relación con el asesinato de dos campesinos y el robo de la propiedad de la persona fallecida.
Previamente como coordinadora de la policía comunitaria en Olinala, Salgado lanzo un comunicado de prensa dando detalles de los vínculos del presidente municipal con el crimen organizado y la corrupción gubernamental en Guerrero.
El hecho de que las policías comunitarias se estén formando en varias zonas de México ha llevado a que el gobierno trate de suprimirles por medio de detenciones arbitrarias, amenazas de muerte, negación de servicios sociales y beneficios a sus partidarios.
Nestora Salgado esta siendo castigada por ser una mujer fuerte y líder en su pueblo natal, donde el gobierno local, estatal y federal se han convertido en opresores de los ciudadanos, de los luchadores sociales y de todos aquellos quienes denuncien los nexos del gobierno con el crimen organizado, es por eso que Nestora y 12 policías comunitarios fueron arrestados. Desde entonces el gobierno federal ha mantenido la ocupación militar en Olinala así como en casi todo el estado de Guerrero para prevenir la expansión de policías comunitarios.
Este plan orquestado por el gobierno en complot con el crimen organizado y carteles del narcotráfico tiene el objetivo de mantener la desestabilización social y así evacuar a los indígenas de sus tierras con el propósito de entregar las tierras a corporaciones internacionales mineras para la explotación del oro, la plata y otros minerales de la nación.

Necesitamos la solidaridad de todos aquellos que defienden los derechos humanos y la justicia.
Solidaridad por la libertad de Nestora Salgado!
Hermano, México te necesita!
Por un México sin violencia.

457502394317806.description:
Well, the Fission Exchange (https://www.facebook.com/events/343785592334332/?fref=ts) was a lot of fun, but the organizers lost money. We're already broke, and we don't want to get broker. 

We know you've been speculating about what the future's next big event might be, and it's time to go public. So, for next year's exchange, we're gambling on a more sound investment. Please come to the...

FIRST ANNUAL NEW YORK STOCK EXCHANGE!
April 1 (Black Tuesday) 2014
11 Wall Street
New York, NY

**(Please SHARE this invitation with all dancers!)**

When Wall Street traders talk about the thrill of being out on "the floor" what they aren't telling you is that the floor of the New York Stock Exchange is a beautiful wood sprung floor, perfect for dancing. Venture on down to Lower Manhattan for this truly capital event.

What you may not know is that this event has been going on in secret for some time. But we've decided to go public and invite anyone with the means to join in. Share=good. So don't miss out! You'll want to capitalize on this opportunity.

Reserve your spot now! How much does it cost? Well, we want you to get the most for your dollar but don't have a fixed price. Don't hedge, buy your ticket now. Early tickets are cheapest, if you get in on the ground floor, but the value may rise or fall, depending on interest in the event. You can save money if other dancers let you crash on their floor. (Ticket purchase is at your own risk; however, dancers with egos too big to fail will be bailed out if something happens.) We'll also be holding a raffle; to buy tickets, just look for the sign that says ENTER/PRIZE.

Most of the event will take place on the floor, but several back rooms will be available for insider trading of massages and the like. Also, don't miss the FREE MARKET taking place in the afternoon!


MUSIC AND DANCING 

Dancing will be a composite of all the forms you love, with a focus on blues. 

Music will largely feature mournful songs about losing everything you own. We're thrilled to welcome NPR's Marketplace host Kai Ryssdal to sing live for us; don't miss his rendition of Stormy Weather that will close out our event!


WORKSHOPS

We've got some amazing instructors lined up for you. 
- Dow Jones shares some better-than-average tips on how to take your dancing to an industrial scale. 
- Ira Gold will make sure you're investing in your future as a better dancer, so you don't look back with regrets.
- Ann Uity is always a favorite instructor, year after year.
- Adam Smith is one of the most hard-to-get instructors on the market, and he's coming!

It's risky to skip these workshops. Remember, acquisition of dance skills is an investment! If your dancing is still weak after these workshops, it might not be de fault of the instructors.

**Securities and Insecurities** 
Gain new dance securities and exchange those old insecurities for some confidence in how you move on the floor. 

**Ways and means of dancing better**
If your moves show signs of stress, relax your body and liquidate your dancing by learning these smooth, flowing moves. 

**Depression and dance**
It's time we talk about depression in the dance community. Dance attracts emotional people, and depression can be hard to predict. Learn why so much of our music comes from the late 1920s and the 1930s.

**Transactions and trading the lead**
Dance is an exchange. Learn how transactions within a dance, such as trading on the floor who leads and who follows, can be a sound investment

**Bonding with your partner** 
The best dances feel like a merger, a mutual experience of one shared dance. Learn how the bonds of dance can make this happen.

**Limited partnerships**
We've all seen them: the people on the floor who will only dance with a few specific partners. Do limited partnerships help or hurt us on the floor?

**S&P's 500 best dance tips in one hour**
Sylvie and Paul are back with hundreds of great dance tips at rapid fire. You're sure to learn from the S&P 500!

**Flaunt your assets**
Everyone's got 'em. Learn how to flaunt your assets to increase your worth in the dance community.

**Dance History**
Learn about how the Panic of 1873 almost shut down dancing in NYC for good.



NASDAQ
(Nosy-Assed Scrutinizing Dancerly Asked Questions)

- I couldn't find the Fission Exchange, since there are so many Springfields! How do I find this one? 
A: Simple! Just come on down to 11 Wall Street and start dancing. Lots of people will be in suits, but they're probably just dressed up dancers. Go ahead and start doing body rolls with one of them. 

- Is it true you almost hosted this at the old site of the Fulton Street Fish Market?
A: Yes. That site is currently un-developed, and the band Poisson d'Avril was willing to play for us if we had an event there. But the dance surface (open asphalt under a highway) wasn't as good, and the dance recess event scheduled there for the following week needed to use the space to set up communal showers and build a fusion cuddling nook. 

- Does the date have anything special to do with this event?
A: Oh, look at the time! Gotta get back to the floor. Hugs!

460841904018057.description:
The time has come once again for the most anticipated event for Jewish teens on the North Shore. Don't miss your chance to travel to New York City in style, visit famous sites, experience Shabbat in Crown Heights, spend time with your closest friends, and make new lasting friendships. This trip is for all Teens 13-18.

We will be leaving from the Chabad Community Shul at Friday morning, March 28, and arriving in Crown Heights that afternoon, we will be spending the day site seeing in New York City, including kosher pizza in Manhattan and some special New York sites. Friday evening we arrive back in Crown heights to settle in for Shabbat. After an exciting and lively Kabbalat Shabbat service, we meet up for an inspiring group-wide Friday night Shabbat dinner.

Saturday morning guys and girls will split up for special Shabbat services with members of the local communities, and will come back together for kiddush and lunch. Saturday afternoon will be spent relaxing, talking and walking to a local park. Finally we all come back together for a musical and magical Havdalah service led by Rabbi Yossi.

After Havdalah, put on your "out on the town" clothes, get your cameras, and prepare yourself for the light and sounds of New York City at night. We will be heading to Time Square for some late night exploring and shopping, followed by a midnight munchies trip to a kosher burger joint.

Sunday morning there will be some final shopping opportunities in Crown Heights and we will head back to the North Shore, arriving back at the Chabad Community Shul by 5:00PM.

Cost for the trip is $126 and includes all lodging, transportation, meals, and activities while in New York. Please eat before coming to the bus on Friday, and we suggest bringing spending money as there will be plenty of gift and souvenir buying opportunities.

If you have any questions about the trip, please call Rabbi Shmaya at 646.306.5510 or email rsf@nsjewish.com.

What would you give to be able to snap out of negative emotional states at a moment’s notice? 
What would you give to find within yourself an unlimited source of confidence and self-love?
What would you give to be able to feel your own Divine soul and experience deep connection with God on a daily level?
What would you give to be the kind of rabbi, teacher or leader who had an abundance of Torah-based psychological tools that were actually effective in helping your students m’taken (fix/transform) their middos (desires) and deal with their most difficult life challenges?
What would you give to discover authentic Jewish meditation techniques for achieving deep states of mindfulness? 
What would you give to make your regular daily prayer a powerful and transformative experience?
What would you give to finally see how all the different streams of Torah and all the mitzvos really do come together to form one unified and perfect system of self-transformation?

WOULD YOU GIVE JUST 1 DAY OF YOUR LIFE? 

WOULDN’T THAT BE WORTH IT? 

"Incredibly enlightening, liberating and totally transformative... I was amazed by my own ability to calm my mind and control my thoughts. I didn’t know I could do that. It's revolutionary to realize that I can generate my own positive emotions this strongly. You've changed my life." David

“It is hard to find the words to express my gratitude. You showed us a practical Jewish way to live with a deep emotional/spiritual connection to our inner selves and God.” Eli

Join the hundreds of people from around the world who have already participated in this unique and groundbreaking workshop, and get ready to forever transform the way you view the world, reality, and your own heart, mind, and soul.

EXCITING NEWS PEOPLE: After 7 sold-out events around the world for over 700 people, the Elevation Seminar is back in New York this APRIL, with even more transformative tools and mind-melting Torah ideas on self-development. Rather then the full 4 day Elevation experience, we are running an intensive 1 day "Taste of The Elevation Seminar" workshop. If you haven't yet experienced the Elevation Seminar, now is the perfect opportunity to be a part of this literally life-changing event. If you've already been along for the ride and you know how wonderful and important this material is, come join us again to further master the teachings and please help us by spreading the word to your family and friends. Look forward to seeing you all there. 

SEMINAR SYNOPSIS (ENGLISH): The goal of the Elevation Seminar is to explore the Kabbalah’s definitive map of human psychology and consciousness on an experiential level. We'll teach you how to achieve perfect uninterrupted concentration, overcome fears and emotional blocks, and access an infinite source of deep inner peace, serenity and joy. Based entirely on authentic Jewish mystical sources, we'll deconstruct the psychological mechanism of prayer and learn advanced techniques for transforming your consciousness and accessing profound meditative states that you never realized were part of your own tradition. Rabbi Katz's open and compassionate teachings have been a catalyst for change in thousands of people's lives. Now is your opportunity to join the hundreds of people from around the world who have already participated in this unique and groundbreaking workshop, and get ready to forever transform the way you view Judaism, life and your own heart, mind and soul. 

SEMINAR SYNOPSIS (YESHIVISH): Let’s be honest: tefillah, for too many of us, means mindlessly reciting pages of words that we barely connect to. Pity we were never taught the secret of how to plug those words in and turn on their real power — until now. The goal of this intensive one-day version of the Elevation Seminar is to teach you extraordinary techniques from the depths of Mussar and Chassidus that will allow you to truly feel connected to Hashem while you daven. We will explore Torah’s definitive map of human psychology and consciousness on an experiential level, teach you how to achieve perfect uninterrupted concentration, and learn how to access profound meditative states of higher consciousness. And we’ll learn life-changing techniques from the seforim hakedoshim of how to really m’taken your middos and access madreigos of emunah, ahavas Hashem, deveikus and kavanah that you never imagined were achievable. Join the hundreds of people from around the world who have already participated in this unique and groundbreaking workshop, and get ready to forever transform the way you view Torah, tefillah and your own heart, mind, and soul.

RABBI DONIEL KATZ is an internationally sought-after speaker and teacher. A former award-winning filmmaker and theater director in Australia, he has lived and studied in Jerusalem for the last twelve years. His famous classes at Aish HaTorah Jerusalem routinely drew crowds of well over 100 people eager to hear his unique combination of mussar, self- development, Chassidus and Kabbalah. Rabbi Katz's ability to present profound concepts from all areas of Torah in a concrete and meaningful way makes him a favorite teacher at Neve Yerushalayim, where he is currently on staff. In 2009, he created The Song Begins a cutting-edge live online learning community, and in 2012 he began running the Elevation Seminar in New York, Los Angeles and Jerusalem.

THE DETAILS: Fee for life-changing 12-hour seminar, includes 2 meals: $95, $75 for students OPEN TO MEN & WOMEN!! 

REGISTER HERE:
http://www.ohrnaava.net/elevationseminarapril12014

SPREAD THE WORD NOW!

About Hermán Olivera:
In a musical career spanning over 35 years, Herman Olivera has worked and has recorded as a singer with some of the most prestigious Salsa bands/band leaders in the Latin world, Manny Oquendo's ground-breaking band Conjunto Libre, Eddie Palmieri Orchestra (still his lead singer after 20 years), Spanish Harlem Orchestra, Jimmy Bosch Orchestra, Johnny Pacheco, Ray Barreto, Machito Orchestra. He has appeared in 43 record productions.

Herman Olivera is considered by many as one of the very few Soneros left in the true salsa genre, continuously touring around the world, appearing as a featured vocalist in many prestigious festivals, television shows, including stints with The Carnegie Hall Jazz Band & The Lincoln Center Afro-Latin Jazz Band. It has been noted that this brilliant vocalist has all the essential qualities of a great singer: diction, vocalization, soul & feeling which combined with his charisma and the palatable timbre of his voice evidences the well seasoned mixture of the Afro Caribbean rhythms.

More about Herman Olivera:
http://www.laboriqua.com/welcome/talent/band.asp?id=63

Showtimes are 1, 5 & 7:10 pm daily. Q&A w/ director Kathryn Bertine following the 7:10 pm show Fri Apr 18 - Wed Apr 23. Ticketing link above.

Modern society has long believed that women hold up half the sky in terms of equality and progression. So when it comes to the sport of professional cycling, why aren't women receiving half the road?

Directed by pro cyclist Kathryn Bertine, HALF THE ROAD explores the world of women's professional cycling, focusing on both the love of sport and the pressing issues of inequality that modern-day female athletes face in male dominated sports.

476590579133661.description:
**RESERVE YOUR SPOT here! https://sait.usc.edu/spectrum/events_details.asp?EventID=900  or by clicking the "Get Tickets" link above.

#HONYatUSC

USC Program Board's  USC Speakers Committee, USC Performing Arts Committee, USC Special Events Committee & USC Spectrum are proud to welcome Brandon Stanton, the creator of the photography blog, Humans of New York

In 2010, Stanton set out on foot to photograph the people of New York. His efforts resulted in the vibrant blog, Humans of New York, or HONY, where his photos are featured alongside memorable quotes and anecdotes. Now boasting over 3.6 million devoted followers, Humans of New York is an Internet sensation and a #1 New York Times bestseller. The blog has also spurred others to create pages such as our campus’ very own Humans of USC. 

How has HONY evolved since its creation? What has shaped Stanton’s own story? On March 31st, Brandon Stanton, the man behind the camera, will be speaking at USC to kick off the 1st annual Arts Week!

There will be a book signing after the event, and HONY books will be sold leading up to the event and a select number will be sold at the event. If you wish to purchase your own HONY book, we encourage that you to buy one ahead of time (online) as we may sell out at the event, and you will save time waiting in line buying your book!

For a chance to attend a MEET & GREET with Brandon Stanton, PUBLICLY share this event or any of our upcoming HONY posts with “#HONYatUSC”.
476590579133661.name: Humans of New York—Presenting Brandon Stanton: The Man Behind the Camera at USC

486409204818381.description:
La cursurile noastre de Salsa te distrezi pe ritmuri latino, te deconectezi de rutina zilnica si iti faci o multime de prieteni.

Dupa doar cateva saptamani poti sa dansezi si sa te bucuri de energia muzicii in club sau la Practice Party alaturi de noi, colegii tai si alti dansatori!

Ce este Salsa?

Salsa, ca gen muzical, este un termen general ce se refera la un amestec de ritmuri sud-americane (Son Montuno, Guaracha, Cha Cha Cha, Mambo, Bolero) cu diferite influente (Bomba, Plena, Cumbia, Latin Jazz). Termenul de Salsa a fost inregistrat intial, raspandit si comercializat la mijlocul anilor 1970 in New York. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Salsa_music 

Totodata Salsa este cel mai raspandit stil de dans social si se imparte in cateva categorii: New York (On 2), Los Angeles (On 1), Cuban, Portorican si Colombian.
Con Sabor este prima scoala de dans din Bucuresti la care inveti cel mai in voga stil de Salsa: New York (On 2). http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Salsa_%28dance%29.

Experienta acumulata ne-a invatat sa ne adaptam modul si ritmul de predare in functie de nevoile fiecaruia, asa ca fa-ti curaj si vino la dans!

Afla mai multe informatii pe website-ul nostru: 
http://consabor.ro/cursuri-de-dans/cursuri-salsa/

Program grupa:
Luni si Miercuri: 19:00 – 20:20;

Investitie:
Abonament normal - 140 lei/luna sau 320 lei/3 luni;
Abonament student - 110 lei/luna sau 250 lei/3 luni.

487654661344284.description:
NEW YORK, NEW YORK : 
UGO PAGLIAI IN UNA SERATA SPECIALE AL TEATRO COMUNALE DI FORMELLO

Ugo Pagliai è protagonista il 3 aprile, ore 21, di una serata speciale dedicata alla cultura americana contemporanea. Seguendo una storia che va dagli inizi del Novecento fino ai nostri giorni, il grande attore reciterà brani degli autori più significativi dell’ultimo secolo, accompagnato da un tessuto musicale dal vivo predisposto appositamente per la sua interpretazione e per i bellissimi testi.

Max McCane ha cucito insieme "songs ed evergreen" di grandi autori, scegliendo da Gershwin a Liza Minnelli i migliori pezzi, affidati all'ultima generazione di grandi vocalist come Marika Franchino e Viviana Aiello, accompagnati dalla Big Band "BESTiario BLUES" con la partecipazione del pianista Riccardo Bellomo. Un'esplosione di voci ricche di sonorità intense.

Lo spettacolo NEW YORK, NEW YORK è prodotto da Carlo Alberto Gioja e Bruna Bencivenga per l’ Ass.Cult. VIVIAMOL’ ARTE, con la direzione artistica di Gennaro Colangelo, è organizzato in collaborazione con Comune di Formello, Ass. Cult. Viviamo Le Rughe e si avvale del sostegno della BCC di Formello e Trevignano: per la vivace struttura di credito, un nuovo intervento mirato a valorizzare le realtà socio-culturali del territorio. 

La stessa BCC è anche promotrice di un’interessante iniziativa per promuovere le eccellenze enogastronomiche del Lazio, attraverso l’intervento di aziende del comparto a un evento sul Made in Italy organizzato a New York nel prossimo autunno.

Gli scatti dello spettacolo saranno ad opera di Emanuela Gizzi.

Dopo lo spettacolo, si può gustare un'ottima cena (completa) presso La Meridiana E il suo Roof Garden , con possibilità di pernottamento nella stessa struttura.

Per info e prenotazioni:
viviamolarte@gmail.com
oppure
cel. 347.77.98.461 / 342.64.57.455

Ufficio Stampa: MEG Management 

Prezzi:
Intero: € 18,50
Prevendita: € 17,00
Spettacolo + Cena: € 40,00

Agevolazioni:
Residenti, Associazioni Locali, Soci ViViAmol'Arte e ACLI: € 15,00

490081251114952.description:
RALPH MYERZ tar med sine venner på DJ-kveld i Porsgrunn.

Ralph Myerz, som nylig vant Spellemannsprisen for beste Elektronika-album, inviterer til natt til 1. maifest. 

Utendørs, ved Ælvespeilet, inviterer han og hans DJvenner til vårens feteste danseevent med artister fra både vestkysten og østkysten i USA.
 
Ralph Myerz and the Jack Herren Band er et norsk electronikaband som ble dannet i 1997. I 2002 signerte Ralph Myerz en kontrakt med det amerikanske plateselskapet Emperor Norton Records, og de lanserte sin første EP, “A Special EP”. Albumet “A Special Album” fulgte ett år senere. Det inneholdt blant annet sporene «Casino» og «Think Twice», som begge ble slagere i klubber rundt omkring i Europa, og kommersielt i Norge, og gikk rett inn på 2. plass på VG-lista topp 20. For albumet vant de Alarmprisen både i 2004 og i 2005 i klassen elektronika. 

De siste årene har han gitt ut tre soloalbum og jobbet med bl.a Devin the Dude, Snoop Dogg, George Clinton, Annie og mange andre, i tillegg til å spille verden over.
 
HECTOR DELGADO - Los Angeles
 
Asap Rocky og Rihanna´s faste tourdj. 
Han er også produsent for bl.a Snoop Dogg, Eminem, Jay Z, SchoolBoy Q, Kendrick Lamar, Asap Rocky og Rihanna. 
Han er en fantastisk party-dj som kommer til å spille masse nytt fra artistene han jobber med.

CLICK N PRESS - New York

Består av den Grammynominerte artisten og produsenten KQuick som bl.a har skrevet flere av Chris Browns største hits. Hans samarbeidspartner Fresh2Def kommer også for å spille det nyeste innen dansemusikk.

DA YOUNGFELLAZ - New York

New York sin hotteste duo akkurat nå, har tidligere jobbet med Snoop Dogg og Nipsey Hussle. De har også spilt flere konserter med Snoop og mange andre fra Dogg Pound. Storm & Biz kommer til å levere en rapkonsert du ikke kommer til å glemme.

CISCOE - Bergen!

En av de beste produsentene vi har her i landet, og som har jobbet med alt fra Snoop Dogg til Lars Vaular.
Har prosjektet Autobarn sammen med Lars Vaular og sammen ga de ut en EP i fjor til strålende kritikker.
Også gitt ut en haug med musikk sammen med bl.a Camp Lo & Kurupt. Er en amazing dj som spiller det beste innen disco, funk & rap.

 - See more at: http://elvespeilet.no/ralph-meyerz-dj-friends/#sthash.rPooZKPC.dpuf
490081251114952.name: Coast to Coast - Fra Los Angeles & New York  - Hector Delgado, Ralph Myerz, Da Youngfellaz, Click N Press & Ciscoe!

500333740076087.description:
(ABOUT) KASHMIR & ARTEXPO (HAKKINDA)
In Turkish & English

ART EXPO NEW YORK HAKKINDA
New York ta düzenlenen Uluslararası Artexpo,  yenilikçi eserleriyle sanatçıları,  yayıncıları , koleksiyoncuları  ve sanat alıcılarını bir araya getiren dünyanın en büyük sanat fuarıdır. 35 yıllık tarihi boyunca, Artexpo New York , Andy Warhol, Peter Max, Robert Rauschenberg, Robert Hint, Keith Haring ve Leroy Neiman gibi dünyanın en ünlü sanatçılarına ev sahipliği yapmıştır.
Artexpo New York , Amerika kıtası haricinde tüm dünyadaki kıta ülkelerini özellikle Avrupa, Uzak Doğu ve Güney Amerika’nın tanınmış ve gelişmekte olan sanatçılarına ve onların heyecan verici yeni eserlerini keşfetmek isteyen sanat sektörü profesyonellerine, uluslararası bir izleyici kitlesi ile ev sahipliği yapmaktadır. 
Artexpo New York 2014, dünya genelinde eserlerini sergileyen 500 civarı sanatçıya,  galeriye ve yayıncıya, özgün sanat eserleri, baskıları, resimler, çizimler, heykel, fotoğraf, seramik, taşbaskı, cam eserler ile 3 günlük bir görsel festivale ev sahipliği yapacak.

PIER 94 NEWYORK
Art Expo Sanat Fuarı,  Pier 94 çatısı altında konuklarını ağarlayacak. Pier 94 New York,  özel bir manzara ve konuma sahip bir alanda kurulmuş prestijli bir kongre merkezidir. Pier 94 sanat sergileri ve fuarlar için 135,000 m2 lik kesintisiz bir kongre alanı sunmaktadır. Son yıllarda, Pier 94 büyük ölçekli etkinlikler ve gösteriler için kullanılan New York'ta tanınan bir etkinlik alanı haline gelmiştir.

KASHMİR

“görüntüler indiriyorum yerküreye, evrende var olan askısından" by Kashmir

"İçsel yolculuğunda bir adem-i ressam...Kapalı gözler sinemasında izlediği kareleri, semboller, tınılar, renkler ve ruhlarla birleştiren...Kendi kapısından girip, bilmediği ama tanımak için adım attığı evrenin müzesinde asılı olan görüntüleri, izleyenlerin kapısına taşıyan.. kutsal ile günahı, güzel ile çirkini, yaşam ile ölümü, ademoğlu ile havva kızını ve kimbilir kaç çatışmalı dengeyi sorgulayan.. Sesini nef(e)sine, nef(e)sini renklerine aktarıp, susan bir fani..." by Nevhan Varol

P A R Ç A L A R I    B İ R L E Ş T İ R M E K
Parça-bütün ilişkisi hem insan zihninin hem de bu zihnin projeksiyonu olan sanatsal girişimlerin temelidir. Yaşam, dağınık zihinlerin, kendini toplamak ve birleştirmek için bireysel bazda çabalarının bütünüdür aslında. Sanatın her dalı, bu anlamda farklı bir metodoloji ile bireysel sağaltımın paylaşılan bir ölüm-yaşam-ölüm döngüsüdür. Her üretim süreci, ardından bir ölüm döngüsü yaşar ve bu ölü topraklar üretilen geçmişin izinden beslenerek, zenginleşerek, ayrılarak başka bir ölüme giden yolda
yeniden yaşamaya başlar. Yeniden üretir. Ölmeyi bilmeyen doğmayı bilemez.

Aslında tüm korkular, eksikler, tatmin olmayan ihtiyaçlar, arayışlar ölmeden yaşamanın odağında yatarlar. Ölmek, sadece dışımızda bizi bekleyen bir süreç değildir. Korkutucu olan da tam içimizde olmasıdır. Çünkü, arkada bırakmayı bilmemek, ayrılamamak aslında inatla eskiyen, çürüyen, kokuşan, işe yaramayan parçalarımıza sıkı sıkıya bağımlı kılar, köleleştirir, kendini tekrar ederek yerinde saymanın konformizmi içinde ve bu konformizmi yitirmenin korkusuyla yaşarken ölmeyi üretir.

Sonuç, dağılmanın ve yeniden birleştirememenin kaygısıyla zombi suretleri, “mış” gibi maskeler ardında saklamayı, saklanarak yaşamayı inşa eder.

“Ölmeden önce ölünüz” söylemi bu anlamda içimizdeki ölümle tanışmanın, ve bu tanışıklığın gücünü vurgulayan en önemli ifadelerden biridir. Bu ifade, ölümün karşısında pasif olarak yaşamanın ve beklemenin tam zıddı olarak kişisel olarak doğmayı ve ölmeyi ve bu döngüsel yaşam içinde kendine has suretleri keşfetmeyi rehber edinir. Bu anlamı ile birey; yalnız, bir yere ait olmayan, sessiz ve sır dolu olarak bir mezar içinde doğmayı beklerken, dolar, beslenir, hesaplaşır. Yeniden doğduğunda aşk ve coşku içinde, inançla, iyi ve kötü duygularıyla suretini yaşama yansıtır, yaşar, tüketir ve ölür...

Üretmek yeniden doğmanın, ölüm boşluğundaki bekleme odasıdır. Zaman 7-24 değil, ölüm-yaşam-ölüm arasında salınan, sonsuza devinen bir sarkaçtır. by Nevhan Varol


ABOUT ART EXPO

For thirty-five years and counting, Artexpo has been changing the way people buy and sell art. Our annual, juried expo brings the biggest publishers, galleries and collectors face to face with hundreds of established and emerging artists. In short, we’re the world’s largest fine art marketplace.

This year, we’ll host over 400+ innovative exhibiting artists, galleries and publishers from across the globe, showcasing exciting original artwork, prints, paintings, drawings, sculpture, photography, ceramics, giclee, lithographs, glass works and more—all under one roof at Pier 94.

Each year thousands of art industry insiders flock to Artexpo New York in search of the art and artists that will shape trends in galleries worldwide. Hosting more than 15,000 avid art enthusiasts annually, we’re the largest international gathering of qualified trade buyers—including gallery owners and managers, art dealers, interior designers, architects, corporate art buyers and art & framing retailers.
- See more at: http://artexponewyork.com/artexpo-new-york/about-artexpo/#sthash.t44Yx1zv.dpuf

KASHMIR

"pulling down images into the earth off their hooks of the universe” by Kashmir

"The man as an artist is on his internal journey..Combining the symbols, rhythms, colours and souls with the scenes he watched in the cinema of closed eyes..Entering through his own door and stepping into the museum of the universe, yet unknown to him but he desires to know, and carrying the visions dangling around to the doors of the spectators..Questioning the sacred and the sinful, the beautiful and the ugly, the life and the death, son of Adam and daughter of Eve and who knows how many more contradictory balances..A mortal, who quietens after transferring his voice to his breath and his breath to his colours." by Nevhan Varol
500333740076087.name: KASHMIR @ ARTEXPO / NEW YORK / 4-6 April, 2014

520205164743847.description:
REGISTER ONLINE: http://www.certifiedforensicloanauditors.com/mortgage_securitization_auditor_certification_training_program_newyork_03.23.14.html


Pre-Registration is required and can be completed over the phone at 1-888-758-CFLA (2352), with Visa or Mastercard, or by Check.  Registration forms will be emailed after payment is complete.  Late Registration allowed until one week prior to  course enrollment!



Location

Westchester Marriott
670 White Plains Road
Tarrytown, NY 10591
914-631-2200

 

The Mortgage Securitization Auditor Training Certification Class; Sponsored by Certified Forensic Loan Auditors "CFLA" is a comprehensive training certification program entitled:

"Mortgage Securitization Auditor "MSA"—A 24-hour in-person intensive seminar held across the country." 

This is a professional development 'how-to' training, and does not imply any State or Federal Government affiliation.

* Nationally Recognized by Courts, Judges, Banks, and Lawyers in 50 States. 

* US Department of Education Approved Course (2011)

Certified Forensic Loan Auditors, LLC., located at 13101 W. Washington Blvd., Los Angeles, CA 90066, has pioneered years of research & development to produce an intensive certification program entitled: Mortgage Securitization Auditor "MSA". CFLA recognizes the supreme importance of the pursuit of truth, devotion to excellence, and the nurture of the democratic principles. CFLA brings accountability, trust, intelligence and integrity to all parties involved in the mortgage loan audit process. These parties include, but are not limited to: processors, underwriters, closers, borrowers, sellers, loan auditors, attorneys, real estate agents, brokers and appraisers. The Mortgage Securitization Auditor accepts the responsibility to adhere to the highest ethical standards.

CFLA Code of Ethics: http://www.certifiedforensicloanauditors.com/namu_code_of_ethics.html

CFLA's Training provides the peace of mind that your credentials are accurately highlighted and recognized.

 

Upcoming MSA Classes

MSA- New York, NY- March 21-23, 2014

MSA- San Diego, CA- April 25-27, 2014

    MSA- Trenton, NJ- May 23-25, 2014

    MSA- Seattle, WA- June 27-29, 2014

    MSA- Brooklyn, NY- July 25-27, 2014

 

Upcoming Attorney CLE Seminars

    Principal Reductions Through Strategic Litigation- Under Homeowner Bill of Rights (CA) III- San Diego, CA- April 5, 2014

    Quiet Title Kings Tour in Texas II- Houston, TX- May 17, 2014

    Principal Reductions Through Strategic Litigation & Expert Witness Forum I- San Francisco, CA- June 21, 2014

    Quiet Title Kings Tour IV and Strategic Litigation First Time in Illinois-Chicago, IL- July 19, 2014

 

Objectives

    Study and learn important topics related to Mortgage Securitization, terminology, and borrower documents, SEC Search Techniques, SPV search, document review, MERS search, GSE search, Assignments, Separation of Note/Deed, Substitution of Trustees, Notice of Defaults, & Trustee Sales, Bloomberg Screens, AbsNet lookups, and more.,

    Complex analysis of how to obtain recorded documents, their significance, and to analyze the same

    Complete (5) five full Mortgage Securitization Audits under the direct supervision of the Senior Auditor, including Chain of Title Reports, Robosigning analysis, Special Purpose vehicles analysis, and the Bloomberg Screenshots

    Understand the complexities of form and substance related to Expert Witness Testimony and how to use your portfolio of Education and Experience to Educate Judges and Opposing Counsel on Securitization Issues, Chain of Title, and Robosigning

    Receive a Certificate of Completion recognizing that you sufficiently meet the CFLA requirements necessary to be accredited as a "Mortgage Securitization Auditor"



Requirements

    Must possess a Bachelors Degree or equivalent, including 5+ years of mortgage, real estate, underwriting, legal and/or securities experience

    Must promptly attend and be present for a minimum of 24 hours of training.

    Must satisfactorily pass a criminal background check/ Sex Offender Check [looking mostly for fraud, embezzlement]

    Must satisfactorily pass the final examination at the end of the course.  Trainees will know right on the spot!

 

Designed for...

All professionals in the mortgage, real estate, legal, auditing, finance, and/or accounting professions, or anyone involved in loan modifications, lender litigation, bankruptcy, short sales, banking, underwriting, processing or real estate law.



Pricing

$1,995.00 for the 3-day course.   You will also receive certificate of completion recognizing you as a CFLA-Mortgage Securitization Auditor.



Benefits of the Course

    Receive a Certificate of Completion recognizing that you sufficiently meet the CFLA requirements necessary to be accredited as a "Mortgage Securitization Auditor"

    Maintain Students Records in a Nationwide searchable database to verify and validate certification for prospective employers

    Learn from Industry's Leading Experts recognized in this field and having been admitted as Expert Witness in multiple Jurisdictions.

    Obtain flowcharts, work product, and other proprietary trade secrets that have made millions for Certified Forensic Loan Auditors, its sponsors, and affiliates
     
    Individualized Instruction in workshop environment with maximum of 15 student enrolled per class session to ensure the highest level of oversight on work product and development

 

Testimonials from Past Students

"It is a life-changing experience—both in knowledge and spirit."
Guido Gil

"If you open your mind and listen, they will lead you to the promised land. Very educational and will enhance my business forever."
Corey Davinport

"Buckle your seats belts, you’re in for a real treat! Your in for the greatest information of the Information Age!!"
Kymosh Myrick

"If you have but one thing you do to further your education, make it this course. This is something that can be utilized in almost every real estate situation that exist today. What you can do with the information you learn will change lives."
Carlos J. Rice Perez, Esq.

"This was an outstanding training. If you want to learn Securitization and become and auditor, this is the class for you!"
Craig Barrett

"This class will change the direction of your life as a professional. It offers a gateway into the world of securitization and inherently valuable navigation tools to uncover the lack of integrity being performed in secondary investor trusts. This class is for anyone, but highly benefits professionals of foreclosure proceedings. Thank you CFLA! Thank "
Michal Y. Valdez

"My expectations were exceeded. I have been a Real Estate professional since 1993 and have simply followed guidelines established. This course has opened my eyes to all the reasons of 'why'."  
Michael Bakkers

"CFLA is one of the only business entities offering a one-stop shop where an attorney can get education, pleadings, research and practice support in the field of foreclosure defense. The attorney networking opportunities provided by CFLA are very valuable."
Charles Christmas, Esq.

"The class was extremely informative. The instructors were exceptional. I will use this information in all my reports, which in turn will help my clients."  Rhonda Arellano

"Everyone in life has a mission and a purpose. It’s a matter of actually finding out what your purpose is. This class was the missing piece of the puzzle for me. I can now do what so many have attempted and failed. Help every and anyone who has the motivation to help themselves to be not only successful in my own mission, but also be able to help others accomplish theirs."
Cecelia Moreno

"This course was the missing link in putting together all the knowledge I’ve already been accumulating, but was not able to assimilate into a prosecutable document for submission which an attorney can use in litigation. Thanks!" 
Warren D. Goldstein

"Although I have prior experience of 20 years of Mortgage Banking and Real Estate, this class has given me a comprehensive edge over the average attorney and ultimate foreclosure defense! Thank you for taking me to the top."
Kartika Kelley

"Attorneys, Brokers, Loan Officers and others definitely need to get certified from the Certified Forensic Loan Auditors. It’s a very, very powerful tool to use it against predatory Lending Act violation when banks violate the law."  Edna Franco

"I came in to this class wanting to do professional, competent, and comprehensive forensic loan audits and that is exactly what this class has done for me! As a mortgage professional looking to sustain myself in this career field, I have found that this class has opened up a wealth of opportunities for me and was easily worth the time and money."
Mark Martinez

 

Securitization Training Outline

    First, a revision of all pre-class reading material list, including handouts for each session, brochures, training survey forms, and securitized analysis report templates that will be worked on in each session.

    Docedge.com will be purchased by CFLA for usage in the class.

    CFLA will provide an electronic securitized analysis report template for each student.

    Overhead projector and PowerPoint type presentation slide show sequence demonstrating the segments of the report with flow charts and samples of how to perform each portion.

    Important to "define" the purpose of the investigation of the mortgage background to determine whether securitization has been followed by the terms of the PSA/prospectus.

    Divide sessions into SIX (6) segments for the first two days which model the six sections of the SAR.

    Work in small groups to perform 5 practice audits (SAR) during the courses first 2 days

    At the end of the each day, the student will take home a securitized analysis report assignment to prepare using a CFLA template.

    On the third day instructors will provide video education to all students while separately meeting with each student to review the securitized analysis report prepared by the student and answer individual questions.
     
    On the last half of the third day the student will prepare a securitized analysis report in class as a practical examination to be certified by CFLA.

 

Topics Covered Include:

    Overview of Securitization
    Terminology
    Borrowers Documents
    SEC Search Techniques
    SPV search
    MERS search
    GSE search
    Assignment[s]
    ROBO SIGNERS
    Chain of Title
    Fraud Analysis
    HAMP
    Notice of Defaults & Foreclosure Process
    Public Record Documents & Retrieval
    Separation of Note from Mortgage
    UCC-3 Negotiable Instruments
    UCC-9 Security Instruments
    Private Trusts
    Government Trusts
    Fannie Mae & Freddie Mac
    REMIC Status
    CUSIP
    Credit Enhancements
    Pooling & Servicing Agreements
    Prospectus
    Credit Default Swaps
    Investment Trusts
    Overview of Bloomberg Terminal[s]
    Overview of ABS Net
    Doc Edge record retrieval
    Title Company Abstracts
    And much, much more…


Class Agenda / Syllabus
Friday
9AM – 10:30AM                    

    Introductions: CFLA, Class, Instructor

    Objectives for Course: Introductory course to mortgage securitization and the securitization audit process.  Course provides industry recognized certification as a Mortgage Securitization Auditor.  Student will be able to perform audits where the name of the loan trust is known or obtainable from title records.

    Attorney Tim O’Reiley on the Legal Issues in the Profession of Securitization Auditing (DVD)

    Real Estate Acquisition, the Mortgage Process, Securitization, Loan Servicing and Foreclosure
     
    Set up PCs / conference and facility information / Q&A

Break 10:30AM – 10:45AM
10:45AM – 12:30PM

    Review of client information and recorded documents

    Looking up a loan: Fannie Mae; Freddie Mac; MERS

    Review of CFLA loan audit template for Level 2 audits – discussion of each major section

    Report preparation standards / code of ethics

    Discussion of the transaction parties to a loan securitization

    The role of the SEC, investors and reviewing SEC documents

Lunch 12:30PM – 1:45PM
1:45PM – 5PM (break 3:30 – 3:45PM)

    Walk-through of a Level 2 audit (report #1)
        Gathering of documents
        Completion of template as a class

    Quiz/Drawing for book/DVD

Homework – review reading list; start on a new case (report #2); review Tim O’Reilly, Esq DVD Presentation

Saturday
9AM – 10:30AM

    Discussion of homework / Q&A

    Finish audit in class (report #2) with instructor

Break 10:30AM – 10:45AM
10:45AM – 12:30PM

    The need for securitization audits

    Legal theory behind securitization audits: real parties in interest; MERS; chain of title

    Work through another audit (report #3) or own or in small group; instructor observes and answers questions

Lunch 12:30PM – 1:45PM
1:45PM – 5PM (break 3:30 – 3:45PM)

    Review of audit (report #3)

    Begin next audit individually (report #4)

Homework – email instructor audit (report #4) by 8AM

Sunday
9AM – 10:30AM

    Discussion of homework / Q&A

Break 10:30AM – 10:45AM
10:45AM – 12Noon

    Quiz/Drawing for book/DVD

    Video

    Overview of GSE audits / Bloomberg audits

    Q&A

Lunch 12Noon – 1PM

1PM – 3PM FINAL EXAM (report #5)

3PM – 4PM Notary on site to provide certification / raffle / feedback forms

 

Instructor(s)

MICHAEL CARRIGAN
Lead MSA Instructor / Mortgage Securitization Auditor / Expert Witness
Michael Carrigan is the Vice President of Auditing for Certified Forensic Loan Auditors, LLC. He conducts live training Mortgage Securitization Auditor certification classes generally each month at locations in New York, California, Florida, Washington D.C and Nevada . He also teaches periodic webinars. Mr. Carrigan has personally prepared audits and reviews on approximately 1,000 mortgage loans that include full scale audits, securitization memorandums, screen shots and lookups for other auditors and/or clients, commercial property audits, credit default swap analyses, private label reports and robo-signer reviews. Mr. Carrigan has appeared in court as an expert witness in Georgia, Florida, Illinois, California, and New York. Mr. Carrigan works supervisory capacity in managing, training and reviewing the work of other auditors.

Michael Carrigan is a seasoned corporate finance executive who has chosen to promote the cause of securitization defense through audit work and direct litigation of residential real estate holdings.  He is a Certified mortgage Securitization Auditor (2011) and Ambassador Mortgage Securitization Auditor (2012) and carries such other professional designations as a Chartered Financial Analyst.  He received his Master’s in Business Administration from the UCLA Anderson School of Management.

CHAD D. ELROD, Esq.
Litigation Support Manager / Expert Witness / Attorney
Chad Elrod is a Certified Mortgage Securitization Auditor (2012) and Ambassador Mortgage Securitization Auditor (2012) is admitted to the State Bar of Texas (2006).  He is also a CLE Provider on topics such as Mortgage Securitization, Quiet Title, and Contract Litigation, in each of the following Jurisdictions, TX, FL, NY, and HI.

TIMOTHY L. O’REILLY, Esq.,
MSA Class instructor / MCLE Provider
Admitted to the State Bar of California in 1990; He is a trial lawyer, litigator, and a former supervising prosecutor with significant experience in both civil and criminal courtrooms. His work has included defending complex criminal matters, prosecuting substantial business and contract disputes, as well as litigating real estate, banking, and securitization cases. He is currently working with Avid Law Center, a real estate, bankruptcy, and mortgage litigation firm in Orange County. He oversees the firm’s foreclosure defense and mortgage securitization litigation practice areas working in the defense of homeowners seeking resolution and debt relief from their mortgage issues. He recently retired from service in the U.S. Army and reserve forces after 25 years with the rank of Lieutenant Colonel. He holds a California Real Estate Broker’s license, MNLS Mortgage Loan Originator endorsement, and is certified as a Mortgage Securitization Auditor by CFLA (2011).

ANDREW P. LEHMAN, J.D.,
Managing Member / Chairman
Mr. Lehman is CFLA's Managing Member and he governs the quality control and implementation of policy standards for CFLA at the executive level and his background is in Corporate Governance and Entrepreneurship.  Mr. Lehman's creative inspiration was the foundation for what is currently CFLA which has grown to more than $25MM in Market Capitalization. Mr. Lehman has governed the training of thousands of Lawyers and Executive Level Professionals through the CFLA Training Academy in Houston, Texas. Mr. Lehman's Educational Books and DVD's have sold more than 25,000 copies since 2011.
520205164743847.name: Mortgage Securitization Auditor Training | March 21-23, 2014 | New York

523165994448723.description:
Now nothing says Spring Bank Holiday Weekend like JESUS and EGG PUNS. JESUS wasn't available at the time of organising this event so we've settled for an EGG PUN. And what a pun it is. The Cool Beans Easter Eggstravaganza. Do you get it? Like Extravaganza but with added egg. They don't teach you that at pun school do they you oeuf! Wow, another egg pun, we're cracking them out like there's no tomorrow! Hang on, make that THREE egg puns. We're having an eggcellent time aren't we?! WAIT A MINUTE - FOUR EGG PUNS! ARGHGGHGHEGG!

...

Now that you're all warmed up how about we slap you round the face with the plans!

THE LEADMILL (FLY MAGAZINE VENUE OF THE YEAR!) 
THURSDAY 17th APRIL 2014 (BANK HOLIDAY THE NEXT DAY!) 
7PM - 3AM (8 HOURS OF GOOD TIMES!)

Line up...

SMILING IVY 
In 2013 Smiling Ivy toured the UK, the French Alps, the Scottish Highlands and plethora of UK festivals, it's certainly about time that they played the FLY MAGAZINE venue of the year. Local ska/reggae heroes shall be headlining our night. 
http://www.smilingivy.co.uk

NEW YORK BRASS BAND 
Did someone say 9-piece brass powerhouse? Why I think they did! 2013 was also a big year for these York lads, notably performing at Soundwave Festival in Croatia. 2014 is set to be even bigger for them, honoured to have them back on the Cool Beans stage. 
http://www.newyorkbrassband.co.uk/

THE INDECISION 
Receiving airplay from David Rodigan, releasing records on Do The Dog, making some of the tightest music around - this young Leeds-based act are doing everything right at the moment. This Sheffield performance is slap bang in the middle of their 11 date debut UK tour! 
http://theindecisionband.bandcamp.com

BRIGANTII 
A Cool Beans debut from Brigantii, weaving hip hop, reggae, rock and pop together we've heard many great things about this eclectic musical melting pot. Very much looking forward to these guys opening up the show! 
https://soundcloud.com/brigantii

+ DJS ARNIVORE, OCELUS, JIMMY THE GENT & LONESOME DOM
Last time these four got together to perform it was the Sunday of Y-Not Festival 2014. Let's just say nothing was ever quite the same again (in a good way) and leave it at that.

528915927219798.description:
Before
2014 Parsons Fine Arts MFA Thesis Exhibition
curated by Niels Van Tomme

April 26 – May 3, 2014
opening reception: April 25th, 6-8pm

http://finearts.parsons.edu/2014mfathesis/

Parsons the New School for Design is pleased to announce Before, the 2014 Parsons Fine Arts MFA Thesis Show curated by Niels Van Tomme.
 
The exhibition features new works in a wide variety of media and artistic approaches by Hala Alhomoud, David Connolly, Lilly Handley, John Lee, Kai Margarida-Ramirez, Cara Nahaul, Angela Pulido Zorro, Rujuta Rao, Luka Rayski, Becca Jane Rubinfeld, María Margarita Sánchez U., Mark John Smith, Alona Weiss, Matt Whitman, Jian X Yi, and Alejandro Yoshii.
 
Presenting a reflection on a moment rather than a well structured, overarching curatorial statement, Before explores a state of perpetual yet-to-come and fragile anticipation. The exhibition playfully negotiates Jimmie Durham’s statement that the artist always works “Before Tomorrow,” before the crux of formation and before the advent of history, while laying out a provisional display of artistic gestures. Ranging from traces of transcendent encounters to explorations of social and individual memory, as well as the emergence of narrative structures and the breakdown of identity, the works featured in the exhibition reject official narratives in favor of a more open and exploratory approach to artistic processes. Taken together, they form temporal clusters that complicate a straightforward conceptualization of linearity and purpose. In doing so, Before suggests the continuous and multifaceted interplay between past, present, and future, as well as exemplifies the challenges and promises associated with graduating from an art academy in New York City.
 
For more information about the thesis exhibition at the Kitchen, please visit finearts.parsons.edu/2014mfathesis (http://finearts.parsons.edu/2014mfathesis) or contact parsonsbefore@gmail.com join on twitter #parsonsB4
528915927219798.location: The Kitchen 512 West 19th Street New York, NY 10011 T: 212-255-5793

529428507150237.description:
Cherry Orchard Festival presents:
"EUGENE ONEGIN" 
Scenes from the novel in two parts
  
By Alexander Pushkin 
Directed by Rimas Tuminas
Vakhtangov State Academic Theatre of Russia

Cast: 
With Sergey Makovetskiy,Irina Kupchenko, Ludmila Maksakova, Vladimir Vdovichenkov,Galina Konovalova,Olga Lerman, Oleg Makarov, Vasiliy Simonov.


  "A stunning, breathtaking, wise and humorous rethinking of Alexander Pushkin's great verse novel that gave us glimpses behind the scenes and between the lines." - The Moscow Times, By John Freedman


“Anyone who saw the Vakhtangov [Theatre]…will know they are a first-rate troupe.” – The Guardian, London

 A rare appearance by the legendary Vakhtangov State Academic Theatre of Russia, with a modern interpretation of Alexander Pushkin's most sincere and timeless work. With its enduring themes of condemnation, love, disillusionment, cynicism, compassion, and forgiveness, "Eugene Onegin" is as relevant today as it's been for almost two centuries.

World-renowned director Rimas Tuminas' theatrical adaptation of “Eugene Onegin”, recently recognized with Russia’s most prestigious theatrical award, the Crystal Turandot, remains faithful to Pushkin’s original text, providing an insight into the essence of a Russian soul. Showcasing 45 actors on stage, including Russian stars Sergei Makovetsky, Vladimir Vdovichenkov, Lyudmila Maksakova, Yulia Borisova, and impressive set designs, featuring music by Tchaikovsky and Shostakovich, along with original score of Faustas Latenas and Russian and French folk songs, Eugene Onegin is a daring and stylish display of real masterpiece theater.

Founded by a legendary Russian theatrical director, Evgeny Vakhtangov, in 1921 and now led by one of the hottest European directors, Rimas Tuminas, legendary Vakhtangov State Academic Theatre of Russia is now Moscow's landmark, located in the very heart of the city, and rated as the best theaters in Russia by both critics and audience. Vakhtangov’s troupe, that includes numerous Russian star actors, always presents the most original and interesting repertoire, with most of its productions being sold-out months in advance. Learn more about the theatre: http://www.vakhtangov.ru/en
In Russian with English subtitles
529428507150237.name: "EUGENE ONEGIN" by Vakhtangov State Academic Theatre of Russia

On Friday April 11th at 7.30 pm Buttershaw Business & Enterprise College are proud to be hosting an evening of entertainment as part of our fundraising efforts to send Connor Lancaster to NEW YORK.

Amongst other things on the night you will hear live performances from a top local band as well as been served a freshly cooked curry.

Connor has a rare form of terminal cancer and his dream is to visit New York City. We will be sending him there in May this year but to do that we need your help.

As part of our fundraising efforts we will be holding an auction of fabulous rare signed sporting memorabilia.
Some of the items include

Muhammed Ali and Pele signed canvas.
A pair of Lionel Messi football boots signed by the great man himself.
Football shirts signed by Gerrard,Ferdinand,Walcott and teams such as LFC,BCFC and Hull.
Signed footballs by LUFC and BCFC
A rugby ball signed by the Bradford Bulls squad.
Boxing gloves signed by Haye and Calzaghe
F1 signed items from Button and Hamilton
Golfing cap and photo signed by McIlroy

For a full list of items up for auction please visit www.buttershaw.net

More about Connor.
Unfortunately he was told last year that it is terminal. He has already fought off cancer once and meningitis and he is truly an inspiring lad. His dream is to visit New York City and we are wanting to send him there in May this year. 

Tickets will be just £10 each available from school. Buttershaw Business & Enterprise College, Reevy Road West, Bradford BD6 3JU. Telephone number 01274 676285.

Register FOR FREE today for this year’s conference through our website! http://www.nycaasc.com/register.html. 

The New York City Asian American Student Conference (NYCAASC) is a free, all-day, student-run conference on Saturday, April 26th, bringing together youth in the metropolitan area and providing a space to discuss racial and sociopolitical matters pertaining Asian/Pacific/America through a series of inspiring and empowering workshops. 
	
Here's why you should come to NYCAASC:
+ GARY Y. OKIHIRO, a professor of international and public affairs and the founding director of the Center for the Study of Ethnicity and Race at Columbia University, is this year's KEYNOTE speaker
+ MC JIN, a hip-hop artist, television host, and actor, will speaking and leading us into the day of the conference!
+ We've got over a DOZEN WORKSHOPS and BREAK OUT GROUPS where you'll get exciting networking opportunities with conference speakers and student attendees
+ Complimentary BREAKFAST, LUNCH, & SNACKS
+ Awesome local performers will be showing off their talent from an Asian American punk-hip hop duo to a nationally ranked beatboxer

Do you want to take part in helping make NYCAASC successful? Sign up to volunteer for the day of the conference! You get a free t-shirt, free food, and a chance to know what it’s like to be part of one of the largest East Coast Asian American conferences! 

Register to attend/volunteer RIGHT NOW at http://nycaasc.com/register.html!

ATTN: Day-of Registration closes at 10AM on Saturday, April 26. Be sure to come in early because we've got breakfast. 

Be sure to like NYCAASC’s Facebook page to get all the updates as we approach conference day: http://www.facebook.com/NYCAASCpage

536537489800403.description:
Cong Magen David Manhattan presents " The Syrian Jewish Community" A series of documentary films by Joseph J. Sitt and The Sephardic Heritage Museum 

Tuesday Apr. 4th 5/27 Episode 2 – “Coming to America” covering the years of 1900-1920. Depicting a little of the life in Syria that they left behind and showing their move out of the country and settling predominantly in America; and other countries.
 
Tuesday May 27th Episode 3 – “Bensonhurst” covering the years of 1920-1940 showing the Syrian community making the move from the lower east side across the bridge to Bensonhurst and establishing themselves and their families in a new region.
 
Tuesday June 17th Episode 4 – “The War Years” covering the years of 1940-1945 showing the efforts that Syrian Jews played in the United states army and their families efforts back home to support all the troops.
 
Please RSVP with Erica@Magendavidny.org

539841799388505.description:
TBA...   

Imagine growing up with a beloved brother, best friend and love one all coupled into one person and he is suddenly taken away without warning.  That is exactly what happened to Jason Swain, Director and writer of CITY COLLEGE 9, the stage play.  After doing extensive research for over 20 years, Jason wants to share this story with a stage play tour about this event.

On December 28, 1991, Sean "P Diddy" Combs promoted An AIDS charity celebrity basketball game, headlined by the late Heavy D, at the City College of New York gymnasium in Harlem. The event was overcrowded since it was oversold to almost twice capacity, while thousands without tickets were outside. When the crowd outside broke several glass doors in an attempt to get in, a stampede ensued inside the gymnasium in which nine people died.

The CITY COLLEGE 9 Stage play unravels the moments in the countdown to disaster and the circumstances that needlessly took nine youngsters from their loved ones.  After seeing this play you will be more familiar with what actually went wrong and also get to know a more intimate back story of the 9 victims.

This story will bring you back to a time when violence in America was at a high rate, with Rodney King's video-taped brutal beating making headlines in the Spring of 1991 and the Crown Heights riot spinning New York City into turmoil that August.  This examination of the City College 9 disaster seeks peaceful reconciliation, artfully avoiding finger-pointing to let us witness first-hand how institutionalized prejudices combined to allow something as simple as a charity basketball game in Harlem to spiral out of control.

Out of the devastating melee of lives lost a seed of hope emerged through the formation of the Dirk Swain Foundation to forever remember and combat the senselessness of December 28, 1991.  

Prepare to take a trip back to 1991 for a few laughs and maybe a few tears while you embrace a story based on an important historic event that shocked the world in 1991.  9 Dead, 1 Story!   SAVE THE DATE!  

Matinee and Evening show.
539841799388505.name: SAVE THE DATE for CITY COLLEGE 9, Nine, Dead, 1 story

587321718031113.description:
In Hearts Wake have announced a number of regional dates throughout Tasmania and Queensland for May and June.

Last week the Byron Bay group unveiled release details for their sophomore album Earthwalker, along with a new music video for the lead single 'Divine'. With the new album due out on May 2nd, The 'Earthwalker Regional Tour' will mark the band's first set of live dates playing the new material. The regional dates are scheduled for intimate venues, in a follow up to the successful and largely sold out Skydancer Tour earlier this year.

Fans quick enough to be one of the first few to purchase tickets will also receive unrestricted access to the band for an intimate Q&A session. Full details below
First 50 tickets sold will include free entry to a 30 minute Q&A session with the band. Have your chance to speak to the members of the band as part of an intimate Q&A group on a number of topics: recording, touring, sustainability and current & past projects. Q&A sessions will take place in the venue an hour before doors open and further instructions will be sent closer to the date.
587321718031113.name: In Hearts Wake -  Earth Walker Regional Tour @HNY

587692907986473.description:
GrantAnswers, "Let Your Voice Be Heard! Radio" and Gamma Nu Delta Sorority Inc. present The 2014 Be Heard! Forum: 

"Diversity in Entrepreneurship and Community Leadership: A Millennial Toolkit for Success"

This FREE event features guests who will share their insight, thoughts and strategies in achieving success and building up their communities. The interactive format will also provide a safe space for attendees to share their accomplishments, aspirations and concerns.

On social media, please use the hashtag: #BeHeard2014

Doors Open at 6:00pm!!!

**SPECIAL GUEST: CNN Contributor, Financial Guru and Entrepreneur Ryan Mack will deliver the closing address!!**

Ryan Mack, a University of Michigan alumnus, is a CNN contributor, financial advisor, author and President of The Optimum Institute of Economic Empowerment, Inc. His new book is entitled, Playing Smart: Financial Empowerment for Professional Athletes.

http://optimuminstitute.org	                                                   Twitter: @ryancmack

**FEATURED PANELISTS**

Adarsh Alphons - Founder of ProjectArt, which uses art, education and culture to empower underprivileged youth. It aims to close the gap in access to arts education for youth in a highly innovative, collaborative and cost-effective way.
Website: http://projectart.org/	
Twitter: @projectartnyc

Jing Li - an award-winning journalist and Founder/CEO of JingLi US, a lifestyle guide on studying, investing and shopping in America for immigrants. JingLiUS.com became the first U.S. start up to sign a video contract with Sina.com, the largest Chinese info-entertainment website. Jing became one of the first native Chinese speakers to break into CBS News and NBC New York.
http://jinglius.com	                                                           Twitter: @JingLiUS

Cris Mercado - Founder of GrantAnswers LLC, a startup focused on scholarships, grants and admissions. 
Website: www.grantanswers.com
Twitter: @crisknows + @GrantAnswers

Kat Lazo - is the Co-Founder of June Baby Productions. #JBP is an NYC-based female production company that tells compelling, progressive stories in every film medium- music video, live events & narrative. #JBP provides clients with branding, marketing and social media tools to highlight their unique story to their audience. 
Website: https://www.youtube.com/user/TheeKatsMeoww/videos
Twitter: @TheeKatsMeoww and @JuneBabyPro

Ainka Munroe - has an MBA from Rochester Institute of Technology and is now a financial consultant with AXA Advisors, LLC. She is the Co-Founder of High Impact Alliance, Inc. and is the NYS Internal Auditor of Zeta Phi Beta Sorority, Inc.
Website: http://www.ainkamunroe.com/ and http://www.highimpactalliance.org/
Twitter: Twitter: @AinkaMunroe

Pierry Benjamin - is a SUNY Old Westbury alumnus and is the President/CEO of “The BIG Live”. The BIG Live is fighting recidivism and negative influences by building up children in NYC public schools. 
Website: http://thebiglive.com/blog/about-us/#.UxQOWPldXtl
Twitter: @TheBIGLiveTV and @philanthro__p

HOSTS: 
Selena Hill and Stanley Fritz are the hosts of WHCR 90.3FM’s “Let Your Voice Be Heard Radio”, airing Sundays from 11am-1pm. Selena Hill is the Founder & Exec. Producer of LYVBH Radio. Stanley Fritz is also an author and political activist.
587692907986473.location: The City College of New York

NYC Bhangra’s Holi Hai fest:

We are celebrating the 5th anniversary of NYC Bhangra's Holi Hai, the Indian festival of colors.Come enjoy the  music, culture, colors, dance, food, and much more!

NYC Bhangra’s mission of engaging diverse audiences into Indian performing arts is in line with the Holi festival. Besides, bringing culture and Indian traditions to many American Indians & other ethnic communities of New York, Holi Hai continues to educate diverse ethnic communities about India: food, music, ethnic wear and dance forms.

 We thank each one of you who contributed to our 2013 festival. Thank you for helping NYC Bhangra Dance Company & School with your time, energy and efforts. 601049613305759.description:
Screening at 8pm on March 21, 22 & 23

In celebration of his centennial, we’re pleased to present these special screenings of BIG JOY, the new documentary on the life and work of James Broughton. Broughton was a member of the Essential Cinema selection committee in the early 1970s alongside Ken Kelman, Peter Kubelka, P. Adams Sitney, and Jonas Mekas, a crucial participant in the formation of Anthology Film Archives.

A charismatic figure, Broughton led a completely unconventional, counter-cultural existence as a filmmaker and poet. The directors of BIG JOY vividly follow the course of Broughton’s deeply intertwined creative and personal lives through his involvement with a wide array of artists, activists and spiritual guides. Among them movie critic Pauline Kael, choreographer and dancer Anna Halprin, filmmaker Sidney Peterson, theater actor and playwright Kermit Sheets, designer Suzanna Hart, poet Lawrence Ferlinghetti, Eastern philosopher Alan Watts and film student protégé Joel Singer. 

These screenings of BIG JOY, which has successfully toured festivals around the world for a year, mark the launch of a national theatrical tour.

Tickets are available at Anthology's box office on the day of the show only. The box office opens 30 minutes before the first show of the day. There are no advance ticket sales. Co-presented by Mix Nyc 

‘Fascinating…a revealing portrait of a man who helped to broaden our ideas of what films could accomplish.’ -  The Hollywood Reporter

‘A great documentary’- Variety

"An unusually intimate and unflinching portrait of the arc of Broughton’s life from childhood to death and from the dark depths of his own depression to the ecstasy of his creative freedom and sexual liberation, all in the service of Broughton’s lifelong quest to find his own ‘Big Joy.’” – Jon Gartenberg, Tribeca Film Festival
601049613305759.name: BIG JOY at Anthology Film Archives NEW YORK

603466296407808.description:
This year I have re-entered The ONE Festival. This year  as a writer not as a performer the story I bring to you is just as captivating as last years. 
MY TIME is the story about a woman named ANA who is going through a divorce. She has been married for twenty years and had two adult children. She goes through different emotions trying to overcome the pain and hurt that she is feeling from the betrayal of her husband. It is a look into what a woman goes through when she has to end a relationship of such a long period of time. And how the she handles the seven stages of grief; shock and denial, pain and guilt, anger and bargaining, depression and reflection, the upward turn, reconstruction and working through and acceptance and hope. 
ANA proves that everyone goes through this grief process but not always how psychology dictates. She proves that everyone grieves and handles their trials and tribulations in their own manner.

You do not want to miss this! 

Here is the link so you can buy Tickets: http://www.smarttix.com/show.aspx?EID&showCode=ONE68&BundleCode&PackageCode&GUID=dafb3d0c-612e-4d19-9caa-0331f90ff619

607098509371014.description:
Группа «Каста» - признанные лидеры российской рэп-музыки, во многом повлиявшие на формирование отечественной хип-хоп-сцены. Проект появился в Ростове-на-Дону в 1997 году. 
Костяком группы «Каста» стало трио Влади, Шыма и Хамиля (через несколько лет коллектив превратился в квартет, когда к нему присоединился Змей).
В 2002 году выходит первый альбом Касты «Громче Воды, Выше Травы». Этот релиз вызвал огромный интерес у представителей СМИ. Во всех изданиях, пишущих на своих страницах о современной музыкальной культуре появились публикации о группе. Благодаря этому релизу Каста значительно расширила круг своих почитателей. Летом был снят видеоклип на трек «Про Макса», который в течение трех месяцев не покидал чарты MTV. Осенью выходит сольный альбом Влади «Что нам делать в Греции», на котором был один из самых громких хитов группы — «Ревность». Затем появилось новое видео Касты «Горячее Время», ставшее саундтреком к блокбастеру «Антикиллер».
В 2004 Каста побеждает в только что появившейся категории «лучший рэп/хип-хоп проект» на первой церемонии вручения наград MTV Russian Music Awards 2004.
В мае 2008 выходит альбом «Быль в Глаза», ставший в июне, по данным журнала Billboard, самым продаваемым альбомом месяца. В состав группы официально входит четвертый МС, Змей. Снимаются три клипа – на песни «Встреча», «Радисигналы», «Вокруг Шум». Первые два запускаются в ротацию всех музыкальных телеканалов России и бывшего СССР. 
В 2010 Каста, первая из всех рэп-групп получает звание "Легенды MTV". Клип "Закрытый Космос" занимает первое место "Русской десятки" телеканала MTV.
В 2012 выходит клип на сольную песню Влади "Сочиняй мечты", который только в YouTube посмотрели более десяти миллионов раз.
В 2013 Каста получает приз "Лучший рэп/хип-хоп проект" телеканала МУЗ-Тв.
В мае 2014 года Каста впервые отправится в тур по Америке.
4 парня - Влади, Шым, Хамиль и Змей - мощнейшая команда, раскачивающая залы по всей России и за рубежом! Авторы главных песен нашего хип-хопа — "На порядок выше", "Наши люди", "Мы берем это на улицах", "Вокруг шум" - 4 мая в Нью-Йорке полным составом!!!
Билеты на сайте Ruconcert.com

New York Nights - Special Guest Night con Santiago Baldoncini - SalSantiago!

Torna a grande richiesta la serata "cult" di Torino NEW YORK NIGHTS! Dal 7 marzo tutti i venerdì la serata di Torino ispirata ai Clubs NewYorkesi dove, a partire dagli anni 70, ad opera di artisti del calibro di Tito Puente, Celia Cruz, Willy Colon, e tanti altri, la salsa è fiorita ed ha sviluppato il successo mondiale che tutti noi conosciamo. All'ingresso di Rivalta, in via Torino 79, nel rinnovato SMILE DANCE (a pochi passi dal centro commerciale), in collaborazione con Reina Latina, verrà ospitato tutte i venerdì un evento dedicato all’eccellenza musicale. Dalla migliore salsa classica, alla salsa dura, fino ad arrivare ad esplorare le produzioni contemporanee che risuonano nella grande mela.
E inoltre un intera sala dedicata alla bachata e kizomba al piano inferiore!
