610083415749636.description:
Come to the info meeting to learn more about our Summer Intensive 200HR Teacher Training. 
RSVP to Stacey@yogamayanewyork.com

---
For all of you who work weekends, who live out of town, who can’t plan your live’s weeks in advance, but really want to do our teacher training, this program is for you!
 
Summer Intensive 200HR Teacher Training
WITH: Stacey, Bryn & Deb
DATES: July 7th – August 3rd 2014
TIMES: Monday – Friday / 8am – 5:15pm + Sat/Sun Aug 2/3
TUITION: $2900, Payment Plans Available
 
YOGAMAYA’s 200 Hour Yoga Teacher Training is appropriate for aspiring teachers as well as committed students looking to deepen their personal practice and knowledge of Yoga. Illuminated Journey is an experience that will change the way you see yourself and the world forever. Rich in both ancient tradition and modern perspectives, ILLUMINATED JOURNEY is a full spectrum program for anyone ready to take the leap.
From the very first day, students will begin to uncover their own voices by teaching in an interactive environment that encourages self-expression and discovery.
Your tuition includes 20 classes at YOGAMAYA, half of which must be taken during or after the month of training, and a special on-going Yogamaya Graduate Rate after you have completed our program.
It is not possible to replicate any individual day of this journey, so we must ask you to make yourself available for every scheduled date. In addition to the group meeting times, there are required classes, assigned readings, and written homework assignments to round out your formal class time.
610083415749636.name: INFO MEETING: Summer Intensive 2014 200HR Teacher Training

El presidente de la República del Ecuador, Rafael Correa,  afirmó que el encuentro con los migrantes es muy importante. “Para mi es una de las cosas más intensas, la reunión con los migrantes, es algo indescriptible, tremendamente profundo, tremendamente intenso”, expresó.

En ese sentido, Correa comentó que Ecuador ahora es un país de oportunidades y el Gobierno Nacional ha diseñado varios planes especiales para los migrantes, que anhelan retornar al país, tales como, las exoneraciones arancelarias para traer equipos de oficina, materiales de trabajo, programas de crédito para migrantes, entre otros.

The 2014 AREAA Global & Luxury Summit will take place in April 12-15. Registration is now open! Go to http://areaa.org/summit to register now! Take advantage of the early-bird member rate $399 ($599 non-member).

At AREAA’s 2014 Global and Luxury Summit, you’ll learn best practices for working with international and affluent buyers, build your understanding of global investment strategies, and hear from experts whose experience will help you market your business to investors in Asia and around the world. 

Explore emerging markets, hot new content on both residential and commercial real estate trends, and the latest distressed asset investment strategies. This year’s Global and Luxury Summit will include the current state of global housing markets and insider secrets on how to develop business relationships with international clients, including an exclusive preconference session focused on the EB-5 Visa Program and the CIPS designation.

Enjoy unparalleled business networking opportunities at the international welcome reception and an unforgettable night in New York City. So dive in and register now – popular sessions will sell out early, so don’t miss out!

619976388070046.description:
Donald's Matters: TRIBUTO NIRVANA 
Full Unplugged in NY + extra electric gig
17 Aprile 2014 presso "I Candelai", via dei Candelai 65, Palermo.
Apertura Cancelli 21.00

Ingresso € 3

Venti anni fa si spegneva il leader dei Nirvana. Il pub Candelai e  i Donald's Matters lo ricordano con un tributo il 17 aprile. Il gruppo eseguirà in acustico l'intero memorabile Unplugged in New York del 1993, concludendo con un set in elettrico, secondo lo stile abituale di Cobain e soci.

I musicisti palermitani, provenienti da differenti esperienze  musicali, hanno deciso di lavorare insieme per celebrare un gruppo che li ha segnati con la forza della semplicità stilistica e della creatività viscerale. La decisione di proporre la parte in acustico nasce dalla volontà di portare a Palermo il leggendario concerto che esplora le potenzialità sonore ed espressive di un genere spesso considerato acerbo e giovanile; la parte elettrica rievocherà, invece, l'energia graffiante e travolgente della grunge band di Seattle.

Fabrizio L. Gray alla chitarra e alla voce, Gaetano Solazzo al basso, Fabio Finocchio alla batteria, Luca La Russa alla chitarra, con la partecipazione di Janet Lee al violoncello e Paolo De Leonibus alla fisarmonica ci porteranno indietro di 20 anni, rapiti da pezzi come  Come As You Are, All Apologies e l'immancabile Smells Like Teen Spirit; cullati dal profumo dei gigli, dal calore dei ricordi.

----------------------------------------------------------

Donald's Matters
Fabrizio L. Gray – lead vocals, guitar
Gaetano Solazzo – bass, backing vocals
Fabio Finocchio – drums

Additional musicians
Luca la Russa – acoustic guitar, backing vocals
Janet Lee – cello
Paolo De Leonibus "Akira Takanawa" - accordion

----------------------------------------------------------
Comunicato stampa a cura di  Silvia Fattini.
619976388070046.name: NIRVANA UNPLUGGED IN NEW YORK TRIBUTE by Donald's Matters | 17/04/2014 live@ I Candelai

620038918066187.description:
Our amazing show of unity on March 20th rocked the halls of the Capitol Building in Albany. We definitely got Governor Cuomo's attention, and now we're heading back for one more day of action on the budget.

After decades of relentlessly fighting for Fair Elections for New York, we may know by Monday if it'll be included in the budget. If not, we will be there to shame Governor Cuomo if this turns out to be nothing more than another empty promise.

Of course, Fair Elections is not the only thing at stake. We will stand in solidarity with those fighting for:

A Moral Budget
Public Education
Renewable Energy 
Fair Taxation
Higher Wages
Affordable Housing 
Climate Justice 
Gender Identity Non-Discrimination
Women's Equality 
Universal Pre-K (with dedicated funding)
Wage Theft Enforcement 
Access to Higher Education 
Ban on Fracking 
Marijuana Decriminalization 
& more!

Your fight is our fight.

Please, stand with #AllOfUs in Albany on Monday, March 31.

The NYC Citizen Action bus will be making the following pickups:
7:00am Brooklyn - Nevins & Schermerhorn
8:00am Union Square - NE corner of 14th & 4th
8:30am Upper West Side - NE corner of 96th & Broadway 

RSVP here: http://tinyurl.com/AllOfUsMarch31

Heute kehrt Milton zum vierten Mal zurück in DAS BETT - wieder in Trio-Besetzung. Mehr brauchen BLURT nicht um ein kompaktes Happening zu zelebrieren. Milton's Texte sind mindestens so dadaistisch wie sein Saxophon-Spiel. Mal gehaucht, mal geschrieen jagt er dem Zuhörer ein dickes, verunsicherndes Pfund um die Ohren. Schlagzeug und Gitarre bilden den Boden, auf dem sich Ted Milton so entfalten kann. 1980 warf Ted Milton seine Handschuhe und seinen Job als Puppenspieler hin, erlernte das Saxophon und formierte die Band BLURT. Die Bandmitglieder umgaben sich mit so illustren Gästen, wie den SEX PISTOLS, ERIC CLAPTON, THE POLICE, und vielen anderen Verdächtigen aus den berühmten Jahren des Punk und Rock. Milton's Dada-Avantgarde-Jazz und die zerrissene hypnotische No Wave-Hymnen waren stilbilden für verschieden Künstler und Bands Anfang der 80er Jahre. Dass diese Musik aus der Vergangenheit kommt, ist bezeichnend für den Zustand der Musikszene heute. No Wave war in den frühen 80ern eine Vermengung aus der Energie und Respektlosigkeit des Punk und der Emotion und den Improviationen des Jazz. No Wave war nirgends einzuordnen, widersetzte sich der Kategorisierung und vielleicht als bis heute einzige Musikrichtung der kommerziellen Ausschlachtung. Bei BLURT gesellt sich noch ein gewisser Minimalismus dazu, der aus trashig hypnotisches Schlagzeug, monotone Gitarrenlicks und tribalmäßige, mäandernde Predigen besteht. Nur selten war Musik so direkt und unmittelbar und dabei so kontrolliert energetisch wie bei der Band um den ehemaligen Puppenspielers Ted Milton.
Einfach keine Kompromisse, nur BLURT.

"Ein Saxophon schneidet durch den Regen, die Gitarre sendet Morsecodes im Trommeldickicht, und dazu ertönt ein abgeklärt-sympathisch grantelnder Sänger: »Midi Dans Le Midi«, die B-Seite der neuen Single von Ted Miltons Band Blurt, fügt dem auf diesen Seiten bereits mehrmals verhandelten Genre des Jazzpunk eine gewisse Versonnenheit hinzu.

Deutlich ruppiger die A-Seite: »Let Them Be«: Milton begibt sich eher in Deklamationsmodus, als daß er singt. Gitarrist Steve Earle und Schlagzeuger Dave Aylward unterfüttern die Ansage mit bruchfestem Funk. Erschienen ist ihre auf 250 Stück limitierte Single auf Blank Editions, einem Liebhaberlabel für Vinyl und kleinere Drucksachen. Es liegt eine Hundert-Dollar-Note bei, mit der man garantiert nicht bezahlen kann. »In God No Longer We Trust« ist das Motto der diesjährigen Blurt-Tour. Da denkt man an die Dead Kennedys und ihre EP »In God We Trust, Inc.« aus den frühen Achtzigern. Darauf war »We’ve Got A Bigger Problem Now«, die Verknüpfung Zappaschen Anarchosarkasmus mit geistesverwandtem Punk. In diesem Theater besetzen die 1979 in Stroud, Südwestengland, gegründeten Blurt eine Loge."
(Quelle: jungewelt.de)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sb4i3XNxsys
http://www.tedmilton.net 

Support: NEW YORK WANNABES
"Die Zeiten in denen Blues und Punk einander nicht abkonnten sind lange her. Ab und an taucht immer mal wieder eine Combo auf, die beide Genres ganz nett verknüpt und seltsamerweise muss man dafür gar nicht in die USA fahren.Die Möchtegern-New Yorker kommen aus Darmstadt und klar. sofort denkt man bei so einer Gitarre-Bass-Duo-Kombination sofort an die WHITE STRIPES oder eben auch an die CRAMPS.Der Stiefel, den die beiden runterspielen ist zumindest ähnlich dreckig, monoton und reduziert wie das, was Lux Interior und Poison Ivy so trieben, und erinnert manchmal in seinem heulenden Wahnsinn auch an Gestalten wie Haunted George oder wirkt wie eine zotellige Version von LINK WRAY. Schwitziger R'n'R im besten dreckigen Sinne, das ist so eine Klischeeformulierung, die mir durch den Kopf schiesst - aber wenn es doch stimmt. Sue und Lucky aka New York Wannabees sind wahrscheinlich Darmstadts bestes Duo aller Zeiten was die Mucke angeht und prügeln uns hier besten LoFi-Trash-Garage-Blues-Punk um die Ohren. Beeindruckend dabei ist nicht nur der Sound der dermaßen nach Detroit klingt, sondern auch die Tatsache, dass Sue erst mit 37 trommeln gelernt hat! Ein Lichtblick für alle Mitt-30er, die schon immer mal ne Band wollten sich aber zu alt dafür fühlen." (14 November 2012 OX Magazin Gary Flanell)

http://newyorkwannabes.bandcamp.com/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zd1HawvKBVk

625348470875546.description:
The premier fundraising activity of embraceWNY is The Buffalo Brunch, held annually each spring. The Buffalo Brunch honors individuals, groups, organizations and businesses that help celebrate and embrace the LGBT community within the greater Western New York community. 

Enjoy an all-you-can-eat brunch buffet and free mimosas at the beautiful Salvatore’s Italian Gardens with like-minded individuals in the community. Participate in basket raffles, silent auctions and a 50/50 drawing.

Your support of the Brunch allows embraceWNY to provide scholarships to LGBT students and their allies across Western New York as well as community grants to individuals and organizations who make WNY a better place for all of us. 

We’re proud to be honoring two local LGBT activists and a local organization with our annual Community Service Awards: Tim Moran, editor of Outcome Buffalo; Bryan Ball, president of Stonewall Democrats of Western New York; and Parents, Friends and Family of Lesbians and Gays (PFLAG) Buffalo-Niagara.

Tickets are pre-sale only and $50 per person. Purchase your tickets online at www.buffalobrunch.org. Tickets must be purchased before April 20, 2014. Become a sponsor of the event and receive free tickets to the brunch and up to seven others, depending on sponsorship level. First tier of sponsorship is $150. 

In 2013, the 17th Annual Buffalo Brunch drew more than 350 attendees and generated nearly $22,000 in net revenues through ticket sales, sponsorships, donations, in-kind services and ancillary activities.

Throughout the year, embraceWNY disburses those funds locally in the form of scholarships, sponsorships and community grants to those committed to working toward full acceptance of members of the LGBT community.  We believe that “through education, all things are possible.”

Funding requests are considered throughout the year. Applications can be downloaded at www.embracewny.org.

The four goals of the embraceWNY are:
1. to educate and support individuals and local organizations working towards equality for all Western New York residents, especially in the LGBT community.
2. to develop the leadership potential of young adults from under-represented areas.
3. to assist organizations in promoting a positive and affirming position relative to the LGBT community, and 
4. to help strengthen local groups and organizations working towards full acceptance of the LGBT community.

A 13-member board of directors, representing the diversity of the community, oversees the operations of embraceWNY. The governing body is responsible primarily for raising and distributing funds.
625348470875546.name: 18th Annual Buffalo Brunch

630231973681152.description:
$5 at the door, no one turned away (It's a nice place and we have to rent the room)
__________________

Building off the success of the "Socialism at the Ballot Box" and similar meetings, we continue the conversation with "Socialist Campaign in New York?"  Previous meetings focused on the theory; this one is about concrete options.

How do campaigns work?  Should we learn by working on Howie Hawkins' campaign for governor?  Should we run open socialists?  Now, in a few years, or when?  What opportunities to run exist between 2014 and 2018?  Will running candidates interfere with important movement work?  How do we approach nationwide formations?

This event is an open discussion and organizing meeting, so it will involve "audience" participation more than typical events.  Bring your thoughts, listen to others, and focus on the nuts-and-bolts of what we will actually do. 
__________________

Starting speakers:

GLORIA MATTERA is the co-chair of the NY State Green Party, ran for Brooklyn Borough President in 2005, ran for New York Lieutenant Governor in 2010, and is currently involved in EcoSocialist efforts.

DAN LA BOTZ ran for United States Senate from Ohio in 2010, running an openly socialist campaign which involved cooperation between several socialist groups, and which established the Buckeye Socialist Network.

ELJEER HAWKINS, community and anti-war activist, born and raised in Harlem, New York, member of Socialist Alternative/CWI for 19 years. Eljeer is a former shop steward with Teamsters local 851 and former member of SEIU 1199, currently is a non-union healthcare worker. He contributes regularly to Socialist Alternative and socialistworld.net

(Possible/may send representative) HOWIE HAWKINS is a Green Party candidate for Governor, as well as a long-time activist pursuing the establishment of a third party in the US, including the Peace and Freedom Party, Vermont Liberty Union, the Socialist Party, and the Green Party.

Matt Hoke (moderator) is an activist trying to help launch a Socialist Electoral Alliance for different efforts sharing information, awareness, and experience.
630231973681152.name: Socialist Campaign in New York? A Discussion

Big Thunder Productions presents Un-Ironically Enthusiastic, a concert of nerds on parade, showcasing original songs by original geeks featuring famous noobs and all the cool kids. Keep your gamer headsets tuned to the common channel, we're queueing up for a blitz Saturday May 3 at 7pm, or patch in to the live-stream!

Performers joining the nerd-herd include Broadway’s Jeremy Kushnier as badboy Tony Stark, Leenya Rideout as comicbook-nerd grown up, and Drew Aber as a Pikachu devotee, VH1’s Jarvis Derrell (#shehashadit), youtube sensation BrentalFloss’s Brent Black, NYMF’s Next Broadway Sensation Erica Lustig, Beth Kirkpatrick, Chandler Smith, Verse Academy’s Frantz Jerome, Blackie O-Nasty, Joseph Spitale, Avery Royal, and Long-Island Wookiee Louis Nunez.

Music directed by musical theatre-nerd Josh Freilich, the concert features the work of Christie Baugher, Brent Black, Josh Freilich, Frantz Jerome, Jason Purdy, Nora Terzo, David Wolfson, Will Aronson & Bill Nelson, James Ballard & Seth Christenfeld, Julian Blackmore & Daniel Levin, Jackie Johnson & Nadia Osman, Sujin Kim & Daphny Maman, Jonathan Russ & EllaRose Chary, and Christian L. Stahr & Scout Storey.

Nerds, Nerds on Parade, in Nerd glasses, waving Nerd flags. Unapologetically and unironically enthusiastic about all their nerdy passions. Be there or be labeled muggle.

Un-Ironically Enthusiastic will perform for one show only Saturday May 3 (which is Free Comic Book Day!) at 7pm, at the Laurie Beechman Theatre on 42nd and 9th Ave, featuring refreshing tonics and health potions, and delicious gamer grub for powering-up. $18 door, $15 food and beverage minimum. Advance $15 door tickets available online through www.LaurieBeechmanTheatre.com.

Live-stream performance links through concertwindow here:  http://www.concertwindow.com/artists/7083-un-ironically-enthusiastic

638256009579724.description:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
SIA Convention New York, NY. Press Conference 2014

Thursday, May 1st, 2014 at 6:00pm the SIA Organization will host the 2014 SIA Convention Press Conference at Blonde’s Sports bar on 79th and Amsterdam in New York, CA. Survivors of Institutional Abuse (SIA) is a nonprofit organization that is dedicated to empower and aid in the healing of adults who have been subject to abuse in private or government institution, residential treatment centers, detention centers or foster care. SIA hosts a yearly convention, this year our convention is in New York City. We hope that you will join us! The theme is Educate. Motivate. Demonstrate. Please reserve your space register today!

In 2014, the SIA Convention will take momentum from the March on Washington DC straight to Times Square in NYC, the capital of global media to educate the world about Survivors of Institutional Abuse. We assure you that we appreciate your bravery and are looking forward to listening to, and learning from, your thoughts, ideas and experiences. It is our greatest hope that you will find comfort, strength and encouragement amongst this tight-knit community of fellow survivors and supporters. Members of this community stand united with one voice, spanning decades in age, and even further in experience.

SIA Convention will be held in New York, NY to bring awareness and to give each survivor a voice. We stand together – “United as One Voice” Come and let your voice be heard. The press conference will announce the events that are happening the SIA Convention NYC. 
Wednesday, April 30th 2014 the SIA Convention NYC Comedy Benefit at Gotham Comedy Club 208 West 23rd St. NYC, NY. 10011 To book tickets please call 212-367-9000. Doors: 6:30pm, show time is 7:00pm. Tickets are $20.00, the show Host MC is Steven E. AKA (The PodBrother) Kimbrough featuring special guest Comedians starting with Marla Schultz and more.
Thursday, May 1st, 2014 6:00pm to 7:30pm the SIA Convention Press Conference will be hold at Blondies Sports Bar at 212 West 79th Street NYC, NY (between Broadway & Amsterdam) New York Senator David Carlucci is expected to present Jodi Hobbs the President of the SIA Organization with a Proclamation for the “International Day for Survivors of Institutional Abuse.”
Friday, May 2nd, 2014 the SIA Convention Speakers this year are Dr. Strozier – The Fundamental Mindset: Totalistic Communities and Violence at 11:00am. Panel Discussion – Nick Gaglia leads a panel of four families sharing their experiences and discussing the road to healing, Panel includes Aaron Bacon’s Parents Bob and Sally Bacon, Joan Maso, Leslie Hicks and Theresa Pena at 12:00pm. Attorney Phil Elberg will speak about victims legal course of action for institutional abuse at 3:00pm. Nick Gaglia Survivor’s Film Series will be screened at the Quad Cinema 34 West 13th Street New York, NY 10011 (between 5th & 6th) The evening starts with “Over the GW” at 7:30pm followed by Q&A at 8:45pm, the reading of Theresa Pena’s new novel “Run” starts at 9:15pm. A special screening of the film Aaron Bacon on 35mm will start at 9:30pm and the US theatrical premiere of “Altered States of Plaine” will begin at 10:00pm followed by movie and book signing. 
Saturday, May 3rd, 2014 the SIA Convention will host a demonstration in Times Square from 1:00PM to 5:00pm. Survivors, friends, families and supporters will have their voices heard about institutional abuse. Don’t be a Zombie when it comes to abuse. 100’s maybe even 1000’s of Zombie may show up to support the demonstration. The “NYC Zombie Crawl” and “Zombie Blast” will support some fund-raising effects by contributing a portion of sales of the Energy Shot to the SIA Convention. And later at the Quad Cinema, SIA will be screening the film “Kidnapped for Christ” at 6:00pm. Tickets for this event are $12.00.
Sunday, May 4th, 2014 Maia Szalavitz will speak at the educational seminar followed by a Q&A at 11:00am, tickets to this event are $11.00 The dedication ceremony starts at 3:pm and closes at 5:00pm.
SIA Organization is a nonprofit 501c3 dedicated to bring awareness to the subject of Institutional Child Abuse as well as helping survivors on their journey of recovery
To find out more, please visit www.sia-now.org and www.SIA-Convention.org
Contact:Steven E Kimbrough
www.TDEMarketing.com 
TDE Marketing & Consulting
Info@TDEMarketing.com(310) 990-7608

638538579533382.description:
Order tickets via Eventbrite:
http://www.eventbrite.com/e/taboo-yardies-the-documentary-brings-awareness-to-homophobia-in-jamaica-tickets-11254066215?aff=efbevent

 TABOO YARDIES The concept of the documentary Taboo…Yardies is to explore the perception of Jamaica as an Island that is saturated with homophobia by providing Jamaicans who are pro, con and everywhere in between this highly controversial issue an opportunity to share their own realities. Additionally, the film gives a voice to those Jamaicans who dare to speak up and out about the intolerance and violence towards lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender, particularly as it pertains to an individual’s human rights. We hope to give viewers an opportunity to decide for themselves whether to view Jamaica as a homophobic culture is perception or reality. More importantly, we hope Taboo…Yardies becomes a vehicle that spurs an open an honest conversation that ultimately promotes respect and tolerance for all people regardless of sexual orientation.

639281422827544.description:
For one night only in the New York City, IAAC brings Anuvab Pal who will present an evening of hilarious comedy about contemporary India !

Playwright and screenwriter Anuvab Pal whose plays (Chaos Theory, The President is Coming, FATWA) and movie scripts (The Loins Of Punjab Presents, The President Is Coming) made his style of comedy critically and commercially popular across stages and screens in New York and India,  has been performing as a stand up comedian for the last year or so at The Comedy Store, London and The Comedy Store, Mumbai and around the world with a one-man stand up show about the foibles of contemporary India titled The Nation Wants To Know. 

The New York Times has called Anuvab Pal "India's most intelligent stand-up comic" and The BBC says he's "India's answer to PG Wodehouse." THE NATION WANTS TO KNOW which he's written and performs in, has had a 150 sold out shows around India, The Middle East and The UK. The Times of India calls The Nation Wants To Know "brilliant and spectacular. A witty, clever, satirical evening of hilarity. A stand up comedians' view of India's place in the world seems far more accurate than our politicians'".
639281422827544.name: The Nation Wants to Know by Anuvab Pal

Rustie

New York Transit Authority

April 24th 
Port Beach Sand Tracks

WHY MAKE SENSE 002 

There seems to be an uncontrollable urge in all of us to place all incoming information into neat little boxes in a hollow attempt to make sense of it all.

From splitting music into meaningless genre classifications and sub-classifications to splitting ourselves into closed off social circles dictated by our ideas, faith, tastes and aesthetics.

The more we divide and sub-divide, the further we drift from each other. If segregation and loss of individualization is the cost of trying to make sense of ourselves, then why make sense at all?

Why Make Sense? is a boutique event featuring artists that do not fit into compartments, filled with people that just want to live without the constraints of labels.

After sold out our debut in Perth's Grand lane we shift our venue town to Fremantle's Port Beach Sand Tracks so we can get some sand between our toes and bathe in the breeze of the Indian Ocean.

Join us for drinks, food and great music under the stars this Thursday 24th of April and kick off the Anzac weekend with something special. 

(Food vendors will be announced close to event)

Thursday 24th April (Anzac Day long weekend)

Rustie
T.Williams
New York Transit Authority
+ Perth's Finest

@ Port Beach Sand Tracks


Tickets go on sale via ticketbooth.com.au Wednesday 26th at 12pm Sharp.

For further information please contact info@whymakesense.com.au

651177508265241.description:
JOIN US FOR OUR LAST HOUSE CONCERT THIS SEASON

Fred has recently announced that he will be leaving Westchester to brave the cold winters in Utica, NY. This "Farewell Show" will feature some of Fred's friends and collaborators, to help us wish him well at our last show of the season.

Fred is a prolific songwriter, recording artist, and producer. He has released eight independent studio solo albums, one live album, two albums with Hope Machine, and one as half of the duo "Gillen & Turk," all to substantial critical acclaim. His music has also been played on independent, commercial, public, and college radio all over the world. His latest album, Silence Of The Night, brings him back slightly to his rock roots, while also retaining a folky message and delivery. Sixteen tracks long, it features his first spoken-word piece on record in ten years and his first instrumental in sixteen years. The new record, while being truly an "album" and not a collection of singles, dips a big, colorful bucket into the wellspring of American music, touching on folk, Americana, rock, roots, and even funk. One of its songs This Old Car was featured, before its official release, on the NPR syndicated show "Car Talk."

Suggested Donation - $20 in advance ($20.88 after PayPal processing fee)  or $22 at the door
100% goes to the musicians
Pot-luck dinner 1 hour before show – bring a dish!
Tickets at www.riverspiritmusic.com

657386561000784.description:
Rod Fritz solo U.S. tour! I'll be hitting the road again for a 3 month trip to the States! Lots of places to go and people to see and of course lots of singing to do! Bookings are on going and continue to filter through so keep an eye out for more dates and venues.

I'm sending this invite out to everyone so even if you can't make one of my shows please share it with your fiends. As an independent artist I really don't have the luxury of a big advertising budget so I'll be relying on your help to get the word out there...

I'll be doing all sorts of shows while I'm away and even house concerts so please let me know if you'd like to host a party! I'd love to come sing at your place!

If you want to see me play at a venue near you then please, I'm up for venue suggestions too.

Before I leave I have to say goodbye so join me next Wednesday 23rd April at Republic Bar & Cafe in Hobart and catch the full 6 piece line up mixed by Jake Long from Red Planet Studios.

And before I head off to the U.S. I'll be stopping on the mainland for a few private parties and a show at Babushka Bar in Ballarat with Celine Yap on Friday 16th May.

AKA/IUKL Second Annual Event 
IUKL World Championship Qualifiers.
All International teams are welcome.

2nd Annual IUKL /AKA event in NY.

Competition will be held under the classic rules and regulations of American Kettlebell Alliance with shared weight categories.

Rules and regulations:

Goals  & Objectives
-Development of Girevoy Sport
- Strengthening friendship between nations &building strong cooperation in sport
-Development of sport mastership, exchange of experience, establishing strongest athletes between adults and seniors  in Girevoy Sport
-Sport is for healthy living & without age limits!

Organizational Committee of Championship:

American Kettlebell Alliance Inc. (AKA) together with IUKL (International Union of Kettlebell Lifting) and Health Factory LLC
AKA President –Yuri Petunovs
Secretary- Alexander Bodrov
Head Judge - Hetmanenko Serhiy
Contact: Yuri Petunovs +1-203-572-3959

Participants

Individuals in the following age groups:
Adults - Men and Women up to 50 y.o.
Veterans - Men and Women 50+ y.o. as of the day of the competition
VETERANS ALSO ALLOWED TO REGISTER FOR ALL DIVISIONS AS ADULT !

Disciplines:

Men and Women 
Adults and Veterans
Time – in accordance with the international standards  – 10 min for each exercise.

Men and Men Veterans: Biathlon, Long Cycle, Snatch.
 Women: Snatch, One Arm Long Cycle, One arm Biathlon.
Women Veterans; Snatch ONLY.
VETERANS ALSO ALLOWED TO REGISTER FOR ALL DIVISIONS AS ADULT !

Kettlebell weight:

Men: -Beginner – 16 kg, 20 kg; – Amateur – 24 kg, 28 kg; – Professionals – 32 kg.
Men Veterans - 16 kg;
Women: -Beginner-8 kg, 12 kg; -Amateur – 16 kg, 20 kg; – Professionals – 24 kg.
Women Veterans - 12 kg
VETERANS ALSO ALLOWED TO REGISTER FOR ALL DIVISIONS AS ADULT !

Weight categories 

Men: under 63 kg, under 68 kg, under 73 kg, under 78 kg, under 85 kg, under 95 kg, 95+.
Men Veterans: under 63 kg, under 68 kg, under 73 kg, under 78 kg, under 85 kg, under 95 kg, 95+
Women: under 58;  under 63, under 68 and 68+
Women Veterans: under 58;  under 63, under 68 and 68+

In order to be in First Draft to Team USA you have to compete in these lifts:
Men: Biathlon, Long Cycle
Women: Snatch

This Championship is conducted under the  rules of AKA and IUKL with amendments & changes  valid in effect as of the day of the competition.
Winners will be determined by summing up of points in disciplines.
Points count:
         Jerk -1 point           
Snatch- 0.5 point
Long Cycle -1 point
In Biathlon – total result is sum of points of jerk & snatch.



1st place will be awarded with a Trophy, medals & certificates.
2nd and 3rd places will be awarded with medals & certificates.
Absolute winner ( men and women) will be awarded with additional Trophy.
Absolute winner formula( Kettlebell weight X Repetitions ÷ Athlete weight)

662046723841721.description:
To perform the world premiere of 3rd Symphony  by Hial Bancroft King



Paired in a program with works by Rossini and Schumann, Hial Bancroft King’s 3rd symphony invites listeners to hear associations between this minimalistic and neoromantic piece and the two more traditional, classical and romantic compositions. Rossini’s Overture from Gazza Ladra opens the concert followed by Giacomo Franci, artistic director of NYCP, at the Piano for the majestic Schumann Piano Concerto in A minor, Op.54.The perfect transition to the closing act is a contemporary dance piece to improvised music on the main themes of the program by choreographer Silvia Franci. The New York Chamber Players’ passionate music-making concludes with the world premiere performance of HB King’s 3rd symphony.  H.B.King has received documented praises by geniuses like Igor Stravinsky and Leonard 

Reserve your seat here : http://www.kaufmanmusiccenter.org/mch/event/new-york-chamber-players-orchestra-in-concert

http://www.newyorkchamberplayers.org

Program in details :

G.Rossini - Overture Gazza Ladra 

R.Schumann - Piano Concerto in a min. op.54

Delio Cassetta Conductor, 

Giacomo Franci Pianist

2nd Part 

Performance of Contemporary Dancing
Concept and Choreography: Silvia Franci
Dancers: M.Elisa Carzedda, M. Elena Curzi, Silvia Franci, Chiara Pacioni (Luogocomune Dance Company)
Sponsored by Pietra Madera http://www.pietramadera.com
powered by Petris srl. http://www.petris.it



H.B.King - Symphony no.3 

Giacomo Franci Conductor 



.

.

663708890343439.description:
Am nächsten Mittwoch (9.4.14) ist Kenny King endlich zurück im Riff Club.
Der aus Barbados stammende Sänger Kenneth King bringt euch jetzt schon mit Pamela das SUMMER FEELING der Karibik ins Riff.

Info:
 New York Nights - jeden Mittwoch!
 Die legendäre Live-Act-Party in Bochum
 Seit mehr als vierzehn Jahren lädt Pamela Falcon jeden Mittwoch zur "New York Nights" ins Riff. Zusammen mit ihrer Band performed die gebürtige New Yorkerin jede Woche die musikalischen Highlights - nicht nur der letzten 30 Jahre, sondern auch aktuelle Chartthemen. Angefangen bei kernigen Rocksongs bis hin zu Pop, Soul, funky Grooves.

 Jede Woche wartet Pamela Falcon mit Gastmusikern und hochkarätigen Gästen aus Show, Radio und TV auf. Mit ihr standen schon Reinhold Beckmann, Uwe Ochsenknecht, Julia Neigel, uva. auf der Bühne!

 Einlass: 20:00 Uhr
 Buffet: 20-21 Uhr (kostenlos)
 Showbeginn: 21:00 Uhr
 Eintritt: 7,50€

Photos:

The Genesis House of Olean welcomes and serves those in need of a home. Offering services to homeless men, women, children, and families with open arms, they provide temporary shelter and supply the basic needs of human life, in a warm, loving environment. 665398570175215.description:
Diane Cluck zieht es lieber vor, im Hintergrund zu bleiben und entdeckt zu werden. Die in New York und anderswo lebende Singer/Songwriterin ist zwar schon seit den Nullerjahren fester Bestandteil der Anti-Folk-Szene, belegt mit ihrem selbsternannten »intuitive Folk« aber eher einen Nebenschauplatz. Bezeichnend ist ihre klare Stimme und ihr traditioneller Gesang, der einem Joanna Newsom in Erinnerung ruft und offensichtlich eher aus dem musikalischen Repertoire des britischen Folk entlehnt ist als aus dem Gesangsarchiv von Greenvich Village. Im März kommt nun mit »Boneset« (Important Records)  ihr siebtes Album in die Regale – wieder einmal mit einer minimalistischen und feinfühligen Instrumentierung ausgestattet, angetrieben von einem klaren, melodischen Gesang und punktgenauen, poetischen Texte. The Village Voice schriebt zu Diane Cluck: »She is likely one of the most refined and elegant songwriters in all of neo-folkdom (freak-, anti-, whatevuh-). A brilliant idiosyncratic guitarist, a witty and wise lyricist, an imaginative melody writer with a powerful voice; her dark and introspective tunes are utterly captivating, sorta like an earthier Kate Bush. Watch her spellbind the room!«

http://dianecluck.info
http://www.npr.org/2014/02/23/279237676/first-listen-diane-cluck-boneset

__________________

➤ Arana (Wobble • OpenAir) 

Founder and resident DJ of the Wobble and OpenAir parties in NYC, and a former 2-year resident at Cielo, Arana has steadily built a reputation as one of the city's most dynamic DJs dropping tight sets of deep house, techno and electronica & moving dance floors with bending basslines, intricate layers and an uncompromising focus on musicality beyond the simple boom-boom. 
Using a 3-channel setup and an aggressive mixing style, Arana's sets push into live-remix terrain through looping, effects and fader cuts, with sometimes surprising movements between bright/uplifty and dark/dirty extremes. Whatever labels are attached to his style, Arana has an uncanny ability to hear the harmonic, rhythmic and melodic elements which he knows will resonate with his audience to inspire authentic movement and feeling on the floor.
Arana honed his musical ear composing on classical guitar and playing in rock bands as a teen. After moving to NYC for law school, he fell in love with dance music, taught himself to DJ as he juggled life as a corporate lawyer, and then launched the first Wobble parties in 2004. Arana has shared the stage with Paul Ritch, Kaiserdisco, Reset Robot, Miguel Migs, Daniel Sanchez, Willie Graff, Grünbox, Sabb, AFFKT and Gene Farris, among others.

The first-ever Hudson Project Music and Arts Festival will set up camp in Saugerties, New York this July and organizers have put together a stellar lineup for the inaugural showcase. Kendrick Lamar, Modest Mouse, the Flaming Lips, and Bassnectar lead the roster for the event, which will take over Winston Farm from July 11 through 13.

Also on deck for the three-day showcase: Cults, Flying Lotus, Matt & Kim, Twin Shadow, SZA, Dr. Dog, STS9, Moby (playing a DJ set), Majical Cloudz, Araabmuzik, !!!, Small Black, Bonobo, Flatbush Zombies, Isaiah Rashad, ODESZA, Gold Panda, Robert DeLong, Capital Cities, and many more.

Festival-goers will also be able to enjoy a host of local musical acts, performance artists/troupes, interactive art exhibitions, regional arts and crafts, and a selection of Hudson Valley-area gourmet food, craft beer, wine, and specialty cocktails.

Tickets, camping, and transportation options will go on sale on Friday, April 4 at 11:00 a.m. EST. Early Bird tickets range from $185 (for a three-day General Admission pass) to $749 (for a Platinum VIP Package). Find ticketing details and the full lineup over at the Hudson Project's official website.

704008316284213.description:
A Galeria Gravura Brasileira apresenta a exposição:

“Contemporary Brazilian Printmaking” 
abertura- 20/03/2014, quinta-feira, 18/20hs
no IPCNY – International Print Center of New York

A galeria Gravura Brasileira inaugura em 20 de março de 2014 a exposição “Contemporary Brazilian Printmaking” no IPCNY – International Print Center of New York em Nova Iorque, Estados Unidos.

Tivemos grande prazer em receber o convite para colaborar como curadores na preparação e seleção de artistas para a exposição de gravuras contemporâneas Brasileiras na galeria do International Print Center of New York nesta primavera de 2014.

Nossa seleção incluiu os seguintes artistas: Nara Amélia, Mônica Barki, Ernesto Bonato, Ulysses Boscolo, Marco Buti, Cleiri Cardoso, Helena Freddi, Sheila Goloborotko, Nina Kreis, Kika Levy, Fabricio Lopez, Alberto Martins, Claudio Mubarac, Laerte Ramos, Augusto Sampaio e Alexandre Sequeira. Um painel de lambe-lambes dos artistas Maura de Andrade, Sérgio Kal, Maurício Parra, Maria Pinto, Yili Rojas e Carlos Henrique Soares será instalado no hall externo da galeria.

Ao empregar uma grande variedade de meios, técnicas e estilos, os artistas escolhidos para esta exposição representam um panorama do nosso vasto país - de São Paulo e Rio de Janeiro ao Pará e Ceará. Para a maioria dos artistas esta exposição significará a primeira oportunidade de expor nos Estados Unidos. Assim sendo, é também uma oportunidade única para que o público norte-americano possa se conectar com a arte feita no Brasil hoje.

Agradecemos a toda a equipe da galeria Gravura Brasileira e do IPCNY pelo empenho na realização desta exposição.

Eduardo Besen
Rodrigo Naves
Priscila Sacchettin


- IPCNY – International Print Center of New York foi fundado em 2000 no bairro de Chelsea em Nova Iorque. É a primeira e única entidade sem fins lucrativos dedicada somente a exposições e divulgação da arte da gravura. O IPCNY estimula a fruição, exposição e estudo de artistas gravadores, dos mestres aos contemporâneos, além de buscar o aumento do público para artes visuais através de exposições, publicações e programas educativos.

- Galeria Gravura Brasileira – fundada em 1998 por Alberto Fuks e Eduardo Besen, a galeria Gravura Brasileira é o único espaço no Brasil dedicado somente à gravura. Promove exposições, intercâmbios, palestras e edições, além de realizar o evento anual SP ESTAMPA com mostras, cursos, workshops e palestras.

SERVIÇO:
ABERTURA 
20 de março | quinta-feira | 18-20hs 
Visitação- 21 de março a 23 de maio de 2014.
Terça a sábado- 11-18hs

Contemporary Brazilian Printmaking

Curated by Eduardo Besen, Rodrigo Naves, and Priscila Sacchettin
On View: March 21 - May 25, 2013
Available for Touring: Summer 2013


International Print Center New York, 
508 West 26th Street, 5th Floor, 
New York, NY 10001. 
212-989-5090 
contact@ipcny.org


From March 21-May 25, 2013, International Print Center New York (IPCNY) will present a highly anticipated exhibition of fine art prints illustrating the innovative quality and technical excellence of Brazilian printmaking today.  Selected by a team of three highly credentialed Brazilian art historians and curators, works by fifteen artists will be included, representing, in the majority of cases, the first showing of their work in North America.  Twenty-two prints and two artists’ books will be included, varying in aesthetic and style, and ranging from aquatint to etching, mezzotint and woodcut to the more contemporary techniques of photo etching, digital printing and photo engraving. With this 9th in IPCNY’s series of International Print Exhibitions, IPCNY will recognize Brazil’s unique contributions to the international body of fine art prints.  A publication with illustrations and curatorial statements will accompany the exhibition.

International Print Center New York is a non-profit institution chartered by the Board of Regents of the State of New York and granted tax-exempt 501(c)(3) status by the United States Internal Revenue Service in 1997.  IPCNY has organized over 70 exhibitions since opening its first gallery in New York in 2000.


Artists included in the exhibition are:  Nara Amelia, Maura de Andrade, Monica Barki, Ernesto Bonato, Marco Buti, Cleiri Cardoso, Helena Freddi, Sheila Goloborotko, Nina Kreis, Kika Levy, Alberto Martins, Laerte Ramos, Augusto Sampaio, Fabricio Lopez, Ulysses Boscolo, Claudio Mubarac and Alexandre Sequeira.  Curators are Rodrigo Naves, art historian, professor and writer whose work has been published both in critical journals, newspapers and books; Mr. Naves holds a PhD in Aesthetics from the University of Sao Paulo.  Eduardo Beson, a recognized authority on contemporary Brazilian printmaking, is co-founder of Sao Paulo’s highly regarded Gravura Brasileira Gallery.  Lastly, Priscila Sacchettin is assistant curator at Sao Paulo’s prestigious Instituto oreira Salles; Miss Sacchettin was awarded her M.A. in the history of art from the University of Sao Paulo.


IPCNY is located in the West Chelsea Arts Building at 508 West 26th Street in the heart of Chelsea, New York’s City’s liveliest art district.  With some 300 galleries, Chelsea has become, during the last decade, an international destination for the viewing of contemporary art.  Our building is highly trafficked, located just opposite the 26th Street stairway to the Highline park. We are located on the 5th floor, with a wall of windows looking north over the Highline and midtown Manhattan.  The gallery is comprised of 140 running feet of wall space, it has high ceilings and beautiful light.  The building is handicapped accessible, and secure, with 24-hour attendants on duty.  Thousands of people visit our space every year, including university and school groups from the tri-state area, art collectors, museum groups and curators.

The exhibition will open with a Public Reception from 6-8 on March 20, 2013, and close on May 25, 2013.  A program of artists’ and curators’ talks will be organized by IPCNY. Although not confirmed, it is anticipated that the show will tour to a second venue in the US.  The works will be returned to Brazil following the close of the touring exhibition.

BIO (eng)

(Buenos Aires, ARG. 1978). RAMIRO ABREVAYA is musician and producer. He has studies in guitar, singing, piano, musical performing, sound post-production and audiovisual production. Between 1993 and 2000 he founded “Sorbakana” and “Brote”, bands in which he was co-writer and guitar player. In 2005, he created “Sonysamurai”, a band where he has consolidated as the leader voice and performer.

Since 2001, he composed music for short and mid length movies, documentaries and theatre, including the musical interlude of the TV show “Diálogos con Laclau” – Encuentro Channel, 2011 (ARG) - which was voted as “Best Magazine” in the Nuevas Miradas Awards.  

In 2010, and after released his first EP TEST, he begins his career as a solo artist, which has been strengthened with the arrival of his new album FILO.  

Ramiro Abrevaya presents FILO, his second and expected album, which was, as TEST, independently released. With elements of rock, pop and folk, Abrevaya shows his creativity in the performing of his songs and his lyrics, in addition of his voice, which gives personality and character to each of the FILO tracks. 

The album was recorded in the anthological Estudios ION (Bs.As.ARG), mixed by Matías Novelle and mastered by Gustavo Fourcade in Steps Ahead Sounds Studio.

.

BIO (esp)

(Bs.As. ARG. 1978) RAMIRO ABREVAYA es músico y realizador. Estudió guitarra, canto, piano, composición musical, post-producción de sonido y producción audiovisual. Entre 1993 y 2000, fundó “Sorbakana” y “Brote”, bandas en las que fue co-autor y guitarrista. 

Desde 2001, compuso música para medios, cortometrajes y teatro, incluida la cortina de “Diálogos con Laclau” -Canal Encuentro-, “Mejor Magazine” en el Premio Nuevas Miradas. En 2005, formó Sonysamurai, donde se consolidó como voz líder y compositor. En 2010 y tras editar de forma independiente TEST, lanza su carrera solista, que se vigoriza con la llegada de FILO.

Ramiro Abrevaya presenta FILO, su segundo y esperado álbum. Editado de manera independiente. Combinando elementos del rock, el pop y el folk, Abrevaya deja al descubierto su creatividad en la composición de sus canciones y en la prosa de las letras, a las que se suma la impronta de su voz dándole personalidad y carácter a cada una de ellas. 

El álbum fue grabado en las salas A y B de los antológicos ESTUDIOS ION (ARG), mezclado por Matías Novelle y masterizado por Gustavo Fourcade en Steps Ahead Sound.

.

711024575616993.description:
Dance Parade New York’s 2014 theme is
“BE the MOMENTUM” — And YOU can help create memories that can last a lifetime.

For over 7 years, Dance Parade New York has become the world’s largest event to ceelbrate the diversity of dance. On May 17th 2014, over 10,000 dancers will come together to celebrate more than 75 styles of dance and culture!

Check out our Indiegogo Campaign video featuring 2014 Grand Marshals Savion Glover and Jawole Will Jo Zollar!

http://igg.me/p/564458/x/99951

Dance Parade boogies down Broadway in the heart of Manhattan, sashays through Union Square and leaps across Saint Marks Place. YOU will enable never seen before dance and choreography that highlight the human experience–Everything from Ballet to Breakdance, Two-step to Dub-Step and African to Zydeco–all in dazzling outfits, with live bands, djs and decorated floats.
The parade culminates in Tompkins Square Park where DanceFest kicks off unforgettable performances on four stages–with dance lessons, roaming performers and an epic dance party–all FREE to the public.

All participants in our Community Engagement Programs have the unique opportunity to dance alongside their teaching artists in the Parade and Festival!

OUR GOALS:

Although our entire budget exceeds $100,000, this BE THE MOMENTUM Campaign seeks $25,000.
$9,000 will be allocated towards the Marketing, Publicity and Production of the Dance Parade. We will provide sound and parade floats for our Grand Marshals.
Another $8,000 will cover critical insurance and production expenses for DanceFest on 4 stages in Tompkins Square Park.
A final $8,000 will go towards paying 12 teaching artists to bring dance to Schools, Community and Senior Centers in under resourced communities.
The remainder of our budget is secured through grants, event sponsorship and our Annual Dance Parade Showcase scheduled for March 30 2014.
What You Can Get

To show our gratitude, we’ve come up with some great perks to have you remember our 8th Annual Dance Parade: T-shirts, a Photo Album of the Parade, Tote Bags, Magnets, and more!

-Ladies or Mens T-Shirt with 8th Annual Dance Parade on back
-Be credited in our 2014 Photo Album
-Gift Bag with lots of Memorabilia



    An opportunity to provide scholarships to emerging dance groups across New York City’s five boroughs for parade registration.
    Thank Yous including dance lessons, dinners with celebrities, social media and website accolades and a custom choreography.
    Major marketing assets including parade floats, festival display booths and street banners to promote your company’s branding and advertising.
    Dream big and design your own Float!


YOUR IMPACT

Your support will help emerging dance groups reach broad audiences.
Our Community Engagement programs will employ teaching artists to bring dance to deserving schools, community and senior centers throughout New York City’s 5 boroughs.
Come May 17th, the city will light up with color and culture. The general public will see never seen-before dance styles and be able to participate in the FREE Dance Parade and DanceFest.
Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute and that’s okay!
-Please spread the word and make some noise about your campaign.
-Use the Indiegogo share tools and post on your friends’ walls.
-Join our planning team by registering as a volunteer here: http://danceparade.org/wp/volunteer/

Dance Parade, Inc. is a 501(c)(3) Non-Profit. Some donations are tax deductible to the extent allowable by law. For more information call us at 267-350-9213. 

Thank You

The Dance Parade New York Team

Kasta (Russian: Каста, Russian for caste) is a Russian rap group from Rostov-on-Don. 
The group is led by MC and producer Vladi. Other members include MCs Shym, Khamil and Zmey, as well as DJ Khobot. 
Although Kasta is notably influenced by New York rap tradition, especially Wu-Tang Clan, they have always written in Russian.

Vlady, Shim and Hamil all started listening to rap at a very young age. Vlady created his first song when he was just 13 years old. In 1995, he and his friend Tidan (Тидан) made a group Psycholyric (Russian: Психолирик). One year after that Shim joined Psycholyric. In 1997, Psycholyric and other rappers from Rostov-on-Don made a group with the name Kasta, the successor of Psycholyric. Shortly afterwards, Tidan left the group. In 1999, Hamil joined Kasta. Kasta then created a group called Объединенная Каста (Obiedenennaya Kasta) which means United Kasta, due to the fact that the original group was becoming too large. Their first show was in Rostov's famous rap club Duncan and Comanchero.
716041651751219.name: KASTA russian rap

717413384956293.description:
Hub Music Factory, in collaborazione con Sconfinando Festival presenta: 

NEW YORK SKA JAZZ ENSEMBLE
19.07.14 Sconfinando Festival, Sarzana (SP)
Ingresso gratuito 

La prossima estate l'Italia ospiterà nuovamente la NEW YORK SKA JAZZ ENSEMBLE per una serie di appuntamenti estivi tra cui l'imperdibile data allo Sconfinando Festival di Sarzana (SP) il 19 luglio!

La New York Ska Jazz Ensemble è un gruppo di musicisti eccezionali, di diverse estrazioni artistiche. Conosciuti a livello globale come i pionieri dello ska-jazz, il loro stile è stato imitato da migliaia di gruppi in tutto il mondo, dalla Russia di S. Pietroburgo a San Jose, in Costa Rica. 
Nati a New York durante i tumulti dell'ondata ska degli anni '90, la band ha saputo integrarsi alla perfezione negli anni, producendo un suono che perfettamente si integra sia nella scena ska, che in quella reggae. Tutti i membri di questa incredibile ensemble hanno collaborato con importanti musicisti di tutti i generi, e questo fa sì che il livello di contaminazione del suono della New York Ska Jazz Ensemble sia unico ed inimitabile. 
Le loro performance dal vivo sono incredibili e attraggono ascoltatori di ogni età ed estrazione culturale, coinvolgendo tutti i tipi di pubblico dai piccoli club di periferia fino ai palchi dei festival più prestigiosi. 
Fin dalla sua nascita, la band ha pubblicato otto album in studio, due album live, un concerto live su DVD e numerosi brani in compilation ska e reggae. Tutte le registrazioni della band ricevono il plauso della critica, grazie all'altissima energia, ai brani originali e alle creative reinterpretazioni di brani jazz, così come il loro potente mix di dance hall, reggae e rock steady.

La New York Ska Jazz Ensemble è stata fondata nel 1994 da Freddie "RockSteady" Reiter, insieme a membri di The Skatalites, Scofflaws e Toasters, al culmine del successo dello ska americano, con l'intento di riunire e sviluppare musicalmente il genere, abbracciando le armonie jazz con l'improvvisazione tipica degli stili ska e reggae. Suonando insieme nel 1993 durante il tour dei Toasters, Reiter, Rick Faulkner e Jonathan McCain iniziarono a lavorare con  Devon James(Skatalites), Cary Brown(Skatalites) e Victor Rice (Scofflaws) per formare una "all star ska band" che potesse spingersi oltre i confini della musica ska. La loro prima apparizione pubblica ebbe luogo nel 1994 presso il Manhattan Center, di fronte ad una platea gremita, riscutendo immediato successo con il pubblico statunitense. Dopo due anni trascorsi esibendosi in regolarmente in giro per New York e gli Stati Uniti, l'ensemble ha portato i propri suoni all'estero, suonando per la prima volta in Germania in un tour di tredici date, nel 1996. In questa stessa occasione sono stati la prima ska band americana a suonare in Polonia, dopo la caduta del muro di Berlino. La loro prima esperienza europea ha attirato parecchia attenzione, tanto da permettere alla band di sbarcare anche in Sud America, visitare il Venezuela e fare il giro intero del Brasile. 
La New York Ska Jazz Ensemble ha suonato in trentun paesi, e continua a girare il mondo diverse volte all'anno. Gli attuali membri della band sono provenienti da tutto il mondo ska e dalle comunità reggae, dove lavorano regolarmente con altri gruppi come Anthony B, Skatalites, Burning Spera, Lou Reed, Philly Joe Jones, Chris Potter, Ernest Ranglin, Monty Alexander, Sonny Rollins e molti altri ancora. 
Continuano ancora oggi a spingere i confini dello ska-jazz oltre ogni confine, portando la loro musica ogni volta verso nuovi luoghi, e anche per la prossima estate hanno in programma gli immancabili appuntamenti italiani!

Di seguito tutti i dettagli del concerto:

NEW YORK SKA JAZZ ENSEMBLE
19.07.14 Sconfinando Festival, Sarzana (SP) 
Ingresso gratuito

730935070270761.description:
Ein absolutes Highlight in der Kongress Bar!

Zach Danziger ( u.a. Bill Evans, Randy Brecker ) und Owen Biddle (ehemaliger Bassist bei THE ROOTS) bringen uns ganz frischen Sound aus New York City!

Der beste Begriff um die Musik von Owen, Sixtus und Zach zusammenzufassen ist wohl ADM (Advanced Dance Music). Ausgerüstet mit Bass, Keys, Schlagzeug und jeder Menge Midi Kabel lotet das Trio die Grenzen elektronischer Musik aus. Man denke an The Roots, Mos Def, Sting oder Chaka Khan, nur um einige Künstler zu nennen mit denen Owen Biddle und Zach Danziger kollaboriert haben um... Moment ... am Besten gleich wieder aus dem Gedächnis streichen. Denn O.S.Z ist etwas ganz neues - und das liegt vorallem an Sixtus Preiss vom Wiener Musiklabel Affine Records, das zum Beispiel international erfolgreiche Artists wie Dorian Concept oder Cid Rim beheimatet. Zwischen messerscharfen Drums, neonfarbenen Synths und experimenteller Soundästhetik oszilierend wird Sixtus nicht selten gefragt wo denn als nächstes sein musikalischer Fokus liege. Und überhaupt: Was bedeutet eigentlich Jazz im Jahre 2014? Owen Biddle, Sixtus Preiss und Zach Danziger können nur die einzig gültige Antwort darauf geben: O.S.Z.
730935070270761.name: Owen Biddle x Sixtus Preiss x Zach Danziger (New York City/Vienna)

BIO CORMEGA (WIKIPEDIA)

Cormega, pseudonimo di Corey McKay (Brooklyn, 27 aprile 1976), è un rapper statunitense.
Cormega è considerato essere tra i migliori MC di New York [senza fonte]. Nei suoi test, Cormega tende a trattare temi impegnati, volti a mettere in luce la difficile vita dei ghetti urbani [senza fonte]. Cormega è anche noto per i suoi controversi rapporti con il rapper Nas, che li hanno visti dapprima amici e collaboratori, poi avversari in una lunga "faida", per finire con una improvvisa riconciliazione.

Cormega è cresciuto nel quartiere di edilizia popolare di Queensbridge, a New York (Long Island), conoscendo fin da ragazzo Nas, Havoc e Prodigy (i Mobb Deep), Nature e Capone-N-Noreaga. All'età di 4 anni assisté all'omicidio della madre, in seguito al quale andò a vivere con il padre.
Verso la fine degli anni ottanta, Cormega iniziò a farsi notare come rapper, collaborando anche con Blaq Poet.
Nel 1991 fu condannato per rapina a mano armata a una pena di 5 anni. Mentre scontava la pena, Nas gli dedicò una citazione nel pezzo "One love", contenuto nell'album di debutto Illmatic del 1994, aumentando così la fama di Cormega.
Nel 1995 uscì di prigione, dopo quasi 4 anni, e Nas gli propose di far parte del "supergruppo" The Firm, insieme a Foxy Brown ed a AZ. Il gruppo fece il suo debutto con il brano Affirmative Action, contenuto nel secondo album da solista di Nas, It Was Written del 1996.
Cormega avrebbe dovuto partecipare anche all'album del gruppo The Firm, tuttavia, a causa di alcuni attriti con il manager del gruppo Steve Stout [senza fonte], egli lasciò i The Firm e venne sostituito da Nature. Questo portò Cormega alla rottura con Nas.
Nel frattempo, Cormega aveva firmato un contratto con la Def Jam, ma, a causa di divergenze di natura artistica con il manager della casa discografica, il suo primo album The Testament non fu mai pubblicato dalla Def Jam e uscì soltanto 9 anni dopo.
Cormega decise quindi di fondare una propria etichetta indipendente, la Legal Hustle, stipulando un contratto di distribuzione con la Landspeed Records. Finalmente, nel 2001 uscì il primo album di Cormega, The Realness, accolto molto favorevolmente dai critici [senza fonte]. Molti dei pezzi dell'album trattano il tradimento, con dei velati riferimenti a Nas [senza fonte].
Sempre nel 2001 uscì Stillmatic di Nas, con cui il rapper tornava a tematiche più dure, ed in particolare nel brano Destroy & Rebuild vengono attaccati pesantemente alcuni rapper, tra cui Cormega. Cormega rispose alle provocazioni di Nas con alcuni mix [senza fonte].
Nel 2002 fu pubblicato The True Meaning, secondo album di Cormega, che ottenne un gran successo [senza fonte]. Per le produzioni, Cormega si affidò a noti produttori come Large Professor e The Alchemist. Tra i brani emerge Love In Love Out, dedicata agli amici che diventano nemici e esplicitamente rivolta a Nas.
Nella primavera del 2004 esce Legal Hustle, album che contiene molte collaborazioni sia con artisti dell'etichetta omonima di proprietà di Cormega stesso, sia con nomi famosi della scena hip hop americana, come gli M.O.P., Kurupt, Ghostface Killah, Large Professor ed altri ancora.
Nel 2005, attraverso la propria etichetta, Cormega finalmente riuscì a pubblicare The Testament, che avrebbe dovuto essere il suo album di esordio.
Nel settembre del 2005, Cormega pubblicò sul suo sito un documento che annuncia la fine definitiva della "faida" tra lui e Nas, avanzando anche l'ipotesi di possibili future collaborazioni [senza fonte]. Nel dicembre del 2006, al Nokia Theatre di Times Square a New York, Cormega appare al concerto di Nas esibendosi con lui in una performance.
Nell'agosto del 2006 uscì un album in collaborazione con il rapper Lakey The Kid dal titolo My Brother's Keeper.
Nel 2007 è uscito un DVD, accompagnato dalla relativa colonna sonora, intitolato "Who Am I?", che racconta la vita e la carriera di Cormega.
Cormega ritorna sulla scena nel 2009, con l'album Born and Raised , che tra gli altri vede la partecipazione di DJ Premier, Pete Rock e Havoc, e che ha riscosso i pareri positivi della critica [senza fonte].


Discografia

2001: The Realness
2002: Hustler/Rapper: Mixtape
2002: The True Meaning
2004: Legal Hustle: Mixtape
2004: Special Edition: Realness & True Meaning
2005: The Testament (Originariamente pronto per il 1996, poi cancellato e infine pubblicato nove anni dopo, nel 2005)
2009: Born and Raised

Taip pat skambės ir seniai pamėgti „auksiniai“ hitai, patekę į pasaulinio rok‘o lobyną! Koncertas įvyks gegužės 12 dieną, 19 val. „New York“ klube (Kalvarijų g. 85).

Jis gimė Ukrainoje! Nuo kitų džiazo atlikėjų Ruslaną išskiria atlikimo gilumas, išraiškingumas, kūrybingumas. Kai šeima išsikraustė gyventi į Izraelį, Ruslan Sirota įstojo į Bat-Yam Music konservatoriją. Vėliau tapo daugelio džiazo konkursų ir festivalių laureatu. 1999 metais Ruslanas buvo apdovanotas Berklee Full Tuition Scholarship.
 
Siurprizas Nr.2!!!
Dominic Miller  - žinomas jaunųjų talentų rėmėjas. Kur bekoncertuotų, visada paskelbia kokį nors renginį jauniems atlikėjams. Šį kartą taip pat paskelbtas konkursas: jo nugalėtoja, dainininkė iš Lietuvos ar Latvijos, turės galimybę atlikti su grupe keletą dainų koncertuose Rygoje ir Vilniuje! Bus išrinkta tik viena nugalėtoja, nors organizatoriai jau gavo 17 dainininkių iš Lietuvos ir 9 iš Latvijos anketas. Pretendenčių konkursinės dainos pažymėtos kodais, idant būtų išvengta protekcijų, ažiotažo, spaudimo muzikantams. Per keletą savaičių muzikantai išrinks geriausias kandidatūras, ir tik tada peržiūrės videoklipus. Susumavus išgirstą ir pamatytą medžiagą, bus išrinkta nugalėtoja, kuri dalyvaus turnė po Pabaltijį!
 
Kiekvienas Dominic Miller ir jo muzikantų koncertas – sielos šventė, tikras, nepakartojamas reginys. Muzikantas – vienas geriausių pasaulio gitaristų, puikiai atliekantis tiek klasiką, tiek šiuolaikinę muziką. Atlikimo maniera - žavi, technika – aukščiausios klasės. Tai muzikantas, atradęs savąjį unikalų skambėjimą. Bendravimas su publika – šiltas, betarpiškas. Dominic visada padėkoja žiūrovams, noriai dalina autografus ir fotografuojasi su gerbėjais.
Kartu su Dominic Miller (gitara, vokalas) koncertuos žymus būgnininkas ir perkusininkas (iš  STING'o komandos) - Rhani Krija;
Nicolas Fiszman – bosinė gitara;
Ruslan Sirota – klavišiniai.
 
Nepraleiskite paties įdomiausio per pastarąjį dešimtmetį koncerto Lietuvoje! Niekas nežino, kada dar pasitaikys proga pabuvoti tokių unikalių, talentingų, pripažintų pasaulio muzikos elito, atlikėjų pasirodyme!
 

Bilietai į vienintelį Dominic Miller koncertą ir albumo “Ad hoc” prezentaciją gegužės 12 dieną, 19 val. „New York“ klube (Kalvarijų g. 85) parduodami visose bilietai.lt kasose.
Informacija bilietų užsakymui ir bendradarbiavimui teikiama telefonais: +370 671 76502; +370 653 62193; +370 618 01331

Como parte del tour en México, Bass Crew y Crescendo Acad presentan a uno de los mayores exponentes del Moombahton y el Trap music. 

Entre los objetivos como productora de eventos, se busca posicionar a Pachuca como un escenario de eventos de la más alta calidad con artistas de prestigio internacional. 

Esta ocasión podrán disfrutar una noche llena de la música electrónica más bailable, más sabrosa y más candente!!

Ricky Vaughn
Brooklyn, New York 

Nacido y criado en Brooklyn, se ha elevado a las cima de lo que parece ser la fusión de hip hop y la música electrónica, el pasado verano y otoño se lanzaron 3 EPs, que fueron un gran éxito con 4 singles que alcanzaron el Top 20 de singles en Beatport. Su último mommbahton EP, " you're welcome N.I.G.G.A." Publicado en noviembre de 2013, recibió grandes elogios de Moombahton.Net, White Raver Rafting, Vibe Magazine y YourEDM.
Calificándolo como el hombre que trajo de vuelta el género. Sus sonidos únicos y patrones de batería sobresalientes son los que lo hacen ser líder en la onda de los productores del nuevo siglo.

ALGO DE DATA: "Según varios vecinos del almacén de Weehawken [frente de operación del Mossad israelí ] Sistemas Urbanos Móviles, el FBI, en su registro del almacén, descubrieron fertilizante, otros productos químicos para hacer explosivos, tubos, tapas, y rastros de ántrax. Después de que el ántrax fuera descubierto, los investigadores llevaban trajes de protección de materiales peligrosos examinaron el almacén. "

"En la noche de los ataques del 11 de septiembre, la Oficina Médica de la Casa Blanca dispensó [el medicamento contra el ántrax ] Cipro, al personal que acompañaba al Vice President Dick Cheney cuando iba secretamente hacia a la seguridad de Camp David ..." El público no fue advertido del ántrax o alertado sobre el Cipro por un período de seis semanas, cuando las cartas cargadas con ántrax fueron enviadas por correo a altos congresistas demócratas y otros.

"Los palestinos" fueron acusados de cometer los ataques del 11S por agentes del MOSSAD. Uno de los agentes del MOSSAD detenidos dijo a la policía, "Somos israelíes, nosotros no somos vuestro problema. Vuestros problemas son nuestro problema. Los palestinos son el problema. "Una llamada telefónica al" Departamento de Policía de Jersey City ... reivindicada que "palestinos vestidos con ropas árabes fueron vistos celebrando los ataques." ¿Estaba el MOSSAD refiriéndose a sus propios agentes encubiertos? A las 9:43 am el 11 de septiembre ", informa la televisión de Abu Dhabi que recibió una llamada desde el Frente Democrático para la Liberación de Palestina, afirmando su responsabilidad de impactar dos aviones en el WTC. Sin embargo más tarde negaron tal afirmación."

La empresa israelí de mensajería instantánea Odigo recibido advertencias de los atentados del World Trade Center 2 horas antes de que se produjeran.

La Zim American-Israeli Shipping Co. rompió su contrato de alquiler en el World Trade Center y evacuó una semana antes de los ataques. La empresa es propiedad en un 49% del gobierno israelí.

Aunque el gobierno israelí envio agentes del MOSSAD para "advertir" a los EE.UU. acerca de ataques terroristas inminentes, en agosto de 2001: "No tenían información específica acerca de lo que se estaba planeado, pero vincularon la trama a a Osama Bin Laden y dijeron a los estadounidenses que había fuertes razones para sospechar de la participación iraquí ', dijo un alto oficial de seguridad de Israel. " Mezclar a Osama Bin Laden junto con su enemigo Saddam Hussein fue un ridículo ejercicio de propaganda, y quedó expuesto como tal.

pd: el History channel, el canal de historia americano revela cómo los ataques de ántrax después del 11-S sólo podían provenir del programa de Biodefensa de los Estados Unidos

El complot del ántrax.
Tras los atentados del 11-S, siete expertos en guerra bacteriológica fallecieron en extrañas circunstancias... La CIA y la Marina habían instalado oficinas de inteligencia en un edificio perteneciente al World Trade Center que se vino abajo tras una misteriosa explosión... ¿Están relacionados estos hechos?
suentes: http://www.proyectopv.org/1-verdad/co...

757989447558272.description:
With this event Lama Tsultrim Allione launches “Dakini Wisdom”, a multi-lineage collaboration seeking to enhance the understanding of the sacred feminine as expressed through Buddhism’s female heritage, the feminine principle of wisdom, female deities, and the Dakinis themselves. This talk will go over the history of women and the feminine principle in Buddhism with broad strokes and then dive into some specific Dakini stories and touch on sacred sexuality as transmitted through the stories of Dakinis. “Dakini Wisdom” workshops will be held all over the country during the next two years, culminating in the “Dakini Wisdom” Conference in July 2016 at Tara Mandala.
“More than just a conference, we are igniting a movement!”

Hosted by New York Shambhala Center, Brooklyn Zen Center and the Interdependence Project, and women teachers from various Buddhist sanghas in the New York area.
757989447558272.name: Public Talk: Dakini Wisdom at Shambhala Meditation Center of New York City With Lama Tsultrim Allione

Exhibition dates: April 10 – May 11, 2014
Opening reception: Thursday, April 10 from 6-9 pm
LMAKprojects: 139 Eldridge Street, NY, NY 10002 b/w Broome and Delancey

LMAKprojects is pleased to present Jasmina Cibic’s first solo show in the United States Fruits of Our Land. It features a film, of the same title, that was shot specifically for For our Economy and Culture, the artist’s solo project for the Slovenian Pavilion at the 55th Venice Biennial (produced by Museum and Galleries of Ljubljana and Škuc Gallery). The exhibition will assimilate elements from Cibic’s installation presented in Venice in 2013 and offer a full immersion into the narrative, as the space will be transformed through wallpaper along with new photographic works.

778831982130588.description:
The New Millennials: International Lineup of Next Gen Jazz Talent Debuts at Tribeca Performing Art Center together with legendary Lenny White and Randy Brecker!

The diverse range of global talent who'll be appearing onstage also includes Ricardo Baldacci from Brazil, Hermine Deurloo from the Netherlands, Pablo Elorza from Argentina, Vladimir Maras from Montenegro, Rozina Patkai fromHungary, Nick Vintskevich from Russia and NGA Big Band from Germany.

These new jazz luminaries in the making will be joined onstage by legendary jazz drummer and competition judge Lenny White, who appeared on Miles Davis' historic “Bitches' Brew”, will take the stage at the Tribeca Performing Art Center and fellow judge and multiple Grammy award winner Randy Brecker, who has worked with such artists as Bruce Springsteen, Lou Reed, Frank Zappa, Parliament-Funkadelic, Jaco Pastorius and Charles Mingus. Yet another performer will be amazing saxophonist Yaacov Mayman, who serve as the competition's art director.


More information about the historic Made In New York Jazz Competition and entry forms can be found at www.madeinnyjazz.com.

790468244316289.description:
NYTA hails not from the Big Apple, but from Bristol, UK. His real name is Mensah Anderson, who is also the seasoned producer that you probably know simply as Mensah. The NYTA guise focuses on being a fresh outlet for his 120 – 130bpm 80′s Electro, House & Techno influenced tracks & creations.

The ‘New York Transit Authority’ name was first adopted for a split 12″ release with Conqueror (Redlight) on Redlight’s Lobster Boy label last year. His side was a slinky, 808 house number entitled ‘Off The Traxx’, which deservedly found its way into FACT’s 50 best tracks of the year & was caned by a wide range of top DJs across the globe – including Joe Goddard, Loefah, Redlight, Boddika, Jackmaster, Disclosure, Pearson Sound, Benji B & Giles Peterson to name just a few.

NYTA has already proven himself as a talent on the decks with sets across the world & two exclusives mixes: one for Dazed & Confused & ‘the one’ for FACT mag that finished in the top 20 best FACT mixes of the year.

Line-up:
New York Transit Authority (Lobster Boy, UK)
Don Wong
Kurt Ctdk
Ming

$20 w/ 1 standard drink

791412404206747.description:
Информация о фестивале  

http://echo.russianrock.net


Билеты http://www.russianrock.net/newsite/Form/tickets_echo.shtml

С 30 мая по 1 июня на полюбившемся всем кемпграунде Deerpark KOA , Upstate NY , пройдет девятый по счету Фестиваль русского рока и авторской песни «ЭХО-2014». Под открытым небом, сразу на двух сценах, перед дорогими гостями, как всегда, выступят лучшие русскоязычные команды из США, а также хэдлайнеры из России!



В 2014 году «ЭХО» подарит своим гостям фантастический уикэнд: мы продлеваем вам весну! Несмотря на то, что по календарю наш фестиваль будет проходить с 30 мая по 1 июня , для тех, кто окажется по адресу 108 Guymard Turnpike, Cuddebackville (aka Godeffroy), NY 12729, мы обещаем с пятницы по воскресенье нескончаемое буйство весны, вплоть до 32 мая! У вас, как всегда, будет почти всё: бурная речка, зеленая поляна, лес и свежий воздух, солнечные ясные дни и звездное небо по ночам, костры и палатки, волейбол и бассейн, йога, детские и собачьи площадки. Ну и, конечно же, музыка! На двух сценах (электрической, закрытой, и акустической, открытой) выступят самые яркие представители рок-музыкальных течений, которые обещают создать вам самое весеннее настроение. И зря они обещать не будут!

Организаторы «ЭХО-2014» уже осуществляют искрометную подборку будущих участников фестиваля. Их имена пока держатся в секрете, но будут объявлены в скором времени!

«ЭХО» – не единственный музыкальный фестиваль на нашем побережье. Но, пожалуй, единственное место, где не смешиваются стили и, где предпочтение отдается рок-музыке. Событие долгожданное, оно по праву занимает почетное место в списке личных хит-парадов многих жителей этой страны и уже давно стало одним из самых ожидаемых проектов.

С 2006-го года на фестивале «ЭХО» выступили такие гости, как «Red Elvises», Александр Чернецкий, Михаил Башаков, Группа «Настя», Умка и Броневик, и многие другие. Помимо концертной программы, организаторы каждый год стараются придумать что-то интересное.

Следите за обновлениями и расписанием "Эхо-2014" на его странице


Пусть "ЭХО" не затихает! - Настя Полева ; Такого количества приятных людей, занятых столь же приятным времяпрепровождением, нигде, кроме как на фестивале "ЭХО", не встречал... "Оргам" - респект! - Егор Белкин, Группа «Настя»

Фестиваль «Эхо» - это такое место, куда мы просто приезжаем в гости к нашим друзьям и получаем кайф. - Игорь Юзов, « Red Elvises »

«ЭХО» – это наш ключ в лето. Это возможность впервые после долгой зимы выехать на природу и порадоваться теплу и солнцу вместе с друзьями и близкими, под аккомпанемент хорошей музыки. Благодаря чуткости и профессионализму « орков», «ЭХО» вот уже восемь лет – неотъемлемая часть нашей жизни .» -   Михаил Данилин « Interzona »

«Эхо» это праздник рок-н-ролла и веселья, молодости души и задора. «Эхо» - отличные концерты рок-музыки, это джем музыкантов и отличного отдыха. « Эхо » форева . Let the go time », -   Борис Лялин – «Vinyl Band»

«Эхо»- это романтика моей юности. Самые лучшие парни на свете - парни с гитарами в руках. На «Эхо» других не бывает:) – Татьяна Родос - ведущая Danu Radio

«Это классное время с друзьями» - Михаил Ярошевский, президент Russian Rock Club of America.

795426227150722.description:
On Saturday, May 17th 2014, Dance Parade will boogie down Broadway in the heart of Manhattan, sashay through Union Square and leap across Saint Marks Place.  YOU can enable never seen before dance and choreography that highlight the human experience — everything from Ballet to Breakdance, Two-step to Dub-Step and African to Zydeco–all in dazzling outfits, with live bands, djs and decorated floats.  Visit www.danceparade.org and click 'Participate' to join the celebration!
Dance Parade is for EVERYONE!

For the past seven years, Dance Parade New York has become the world’s largest event to celebrate the diversity of dance.  We are well into production for our 8th Annual Dance Parade and are gathering over 10,000 dancers to celebrate more than 75 styles of dance and culture.
Get Ready!  

DanceFest after the Parade!
The parade culminates in Tompkins Square Park where DanceFest kicks off unforgettable performances on four stages–with dance lessons, roaming performers, experience dance booths and an epic dance party–all FREE to the public.
  
Community Engagement
With your support our charitable programs will bring dance to underserved schools, recreation and senior centers throughout New York City’s five boroughs.
In the past few months, we’ve already brought the joy of movement and rhythm to New Yorkers.  In September, we kicked off our season by throwing a House music party featuring Louie Vega and a host of other djs, presenting dance at New York’s largest holiday event — Winter’s Eve at Lincoln Square and are offering weekly classes to Seniors in Manhattan.

In 2014, our Community Engagement programs will allow students to enjoy Family Fitness Winter workshops, six week Cultural Residencies and — new this year — “Ageless Action,” a program specifically designed to keep seniors moving!
If your school, community or senior center is interested in one of our popular education programs, click here for our Community Engagement brochure.

In keeping with tradition since 2008, all of our education programs, whether they are for students in schools, community or senior centers, end their programs with participation in the 8th Annual Dance Parade and DanceFest!

Be The Momentum, our 2014 theme, is a call to action:  We invite you this holiday season to make a donation and help create memories that can last a lifetime!  As a 501(c)3 non-profit organization, we rely on generous donors to make our programs possible.  Our passionate staff is excited to bring you Dance Parade, DanceFest and our Community Engagement Programs described below.Look out for our Indiegogo Campaign for exciting perks in January and click here to pitch in with a 100% tax-deductible donation–Any amount will help!

Am 30.4.14 wird im Riff Club in den Mai getanzt 
und mit wem könnte man das besser als mit Pamela Falcon, ihrer Band und den wunderbaren Gästen!

Zu Gast sind Kieron und Giulia Wahn!

Die gebürtige Belgierin Giulia Wahn begeistert mit ihrer einzigartigen Performance und ihrer extravaganten und kraftvollen Soulstimme immer wieder aufs Neue und der australische Sänger Kieron überzeugt durch seine rockige Röhre.

 Info:
 New York Nights - jeden Mittwoch!
 Die legendäre Live-Act-Party in Bochum
 Seit mehr als vierzehn Jahren lädt Pamela Falcon jeden Mittwoch zur "New York Nights" ins Riff. Zusammen mit ihrer Band performed die gebürtige New Yorkerin jede Woche die musikalischen Highlights - nicht nur der letzten 30 Jahre, sondern auch aktuelle Chartthemen. Angefangen bei kernigen Rocksongs bis hin zu Pop, Soul, funky Grooves.

 Jede Woche wartet Pamela Falcon mit Gastmusikern und hochkarätigen Gästen aus Show, Radio und TV auf. Mit ihr standen schon Reinhold Beckmann, Uwe Ochsenknecht, Julia Neigel, uva. auf der Bühne!

Additional Info:
Glen Matlock:Glen Matlock is one of the most respected, if underrated British musicians. In a career that has spanned over thirty years, Glen has made indelible contributions to music as the original bass player with The Sex Pistols, formed the underrated Rich Kids, worked with a variety of artists ranging from Iggy Pop, fellow original School of ’76 Brit Punk Rockers The Damned, through to neo-rockabilly singer Robert Gordon, whilst pursuing his own musically distinctive direction where melodic and inventive rock music thrives. To cap it all, 2010 sees Glen release a brand new album – arguably the finest to bear his name – in the shape of Born Running, as well as taking the coveted bass playing role in the reformed Faces.Sylvain Sylvain:Before joining the New York Dolls in 1971, Sylvain was a member of the band Actress, also featuring Dolls Arthur Kane, Johnny Thunders and former fashion partner Murcia. He played rhythm guitar in the proto-punk group the New York Dolls (replacing Rick Rivets), from 1971 until the group’s final dissolution in 1977.
