830937356935277.description:
Nottingham's two best nightclubs join forces to bring you the most eclectic selection of music all under one roof. 

With five rooms of music, six bars, the two largest smoking terraces in the city, world-class headline bands and DJs, a finger-licking Caribbean BBQ, 1200 party people, the latest opening hours in town and a number of hidden surprises and rooms, it's no wonder that Stealth Vs Rescued has been voted "Nottingham's Best Clubnight!"

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

❂ Stealth Room 1 ❂

NEW YORK TRANSIT AUTHORITY
www.facebook.com/NYTAofficial

NYTA hails not from the Big Apple, but from Bristol, UK. His real name is Mensah Anderson, who is also the seasoned producer that you probably know simply as Mensah. The NYTA guise focuses on being a fresh outlet for his 120 – 130bpm 80′s Electro, House & Techno influenced tracks & creations.

The ‘New York Transit Authority’ name was first adopted for a split 12″ release with Conqueror (Redlight) on Redlight’s Lobster Boy label in 2011. His side was a slinky, 808 house number entitled ‘Off The Traxx’, which deservedly found its way into FACT’s 50 best tracks of the year & was caned by a wide range of top DJs across the globe. The track that really put his stamp on the music scene however, is undoubtedly '95,' which has been tearing apart dancefloors all over the country.  

♫ New York Transit Authority - 95  ♫
♪♪♪ http://tinyurl.com/newyta95 ♪♪♪

♫ Jus Now - Tun Up (New York Transit Authority remix)  ♫
♪♪♪ http://tinyurl.com/nytajusnow ♪♪♪

♫ New York Transit Authority - Swarm ♫
♪♪♪  http://tinyurl.com/nytaswarm ♪♪♪ 


AND


DEADBOY
www.facebook.com/pages/Deadboy/25706257596

South London based Deadboy came to prominence with his own production sound fused from elements of garage, house, techno, RnB, bassline and many other rich seams of underground and overground music. Since then his productions have gone on to incorporate everything from disco and boogie to jungle, and his eclectic DJ sets, often playing mostly vinyl, are no different.

Deadboy has performed all over the world, touring America and Australia and performing at festivals such as Sonar, Primavera, South by South West and Brooklyn Electronic Music Festival, with many more to come.

Kappa Gamma are a five piece Nottingham based band. 
Dean Jackson from The Beat, BBC Nottingham has said: “Though only a couple of years old, Kappa Gamma have captured the imagination and attention of gig-goers in Nottingham- and beyond-in a way few other bands have managed. Each of their tracks takes you on a journey with a rare combination of assured subtly and emphatic bursts of energy.”

Taking influence from their live sets, Kappa Gamma bring their eclectic sound to their DJ set. Expect to hear tracks you may not have heard before, but are sure to love by the end of the night.

837066526310852.description:
Viaggio fotografico in una delle città più affascinanti del mondo, un centro economico e culturale tra i più prolifici del pianeta americano. Dal Bronx a Manhattan passando per Brooklyn troveremo una sorta di pozzo di San Patrizio per la nostra indagine fotografica. Non ci limiteremo a raccontare le architetture più famose ma il nostro obiettivo si concentrerà sulle miriadi di facce cosmopolite che abitano questa splendida città! I quartieri delle varie etnie, i muri che spesso raccontano più di quanto possiamo immaginare, gli angoli più suggestivi che spesso sono stati descritti nelle opere di Eduard Hopper, le stazioni che accolgono un'umanità tanto diffusa quanto colorata, insomma un contesto davvero complesso ed affascinante da indagare con le nostre macchine fotografiche. La tecnica per entrare in questa materia tanto variegata nelle forme e nei contenuti e quella di avvicinarci gradualmente passando dall'insieme organizzato ai dettagli più intimi, dalle visioni grandangolari a quelle più ravvicinate, solo in questo modo possiamo entrare nelle forme del sogno americano.
Pasquale Comegna 

Le forme sorgono!
Forme di fabbriche, arsenali, fonderie, mercati, forme delle duplici rotaie, forme delle traverse dei ponti, ampie armature, travi maestre, archi, forme di flottiglie, di cantieri navali, la forma dell'ipocrita sofà, le forme sorgono!
La forma della gabbia del prigioniero nell'aula del tribunale, la forma del banco della bettola, contro cui si appoggia il bevitore giovane e quello vecchio, la forma dello scaleo per l'assassino processato e condannato...
la forma sgrossata, limata, misurata..
Walt Whitman

Quota di partecipazione €. 1050.00
comprensivo di volo a/r - alloggio in camera doppia in un appartamento centrale - workshop fotografico.
Sono escluse altre voci, il costo è relativo a questo periodo, se si prenota entro un mese la quota non varia altrimenti possono esserci dei ritocchi.
Seguirà mostra fotografica delle immagini più belle su F.B. e relativa analisi critica del lavoro svolto attraverso Skype e pagina dedicata su F.B.
info: comegna.pasquale@gmail.com
www.pasqualecomegna.com
cell. 349/5848409
Pasquale Comegna

* SATCHMO-THON curated by Ricky Riccardi
* HOT JAZZ CLIP FEST

FESTIVAL JAM SESSION with Dennis Lichtman


This year The Festival is at the beautiful and historic Players Club and features multiple rooms with continuous live music for nearly 12 hours from 16 bands, numerous solo artists and jaw dropping surprise guests! Celebrating traditional jazz with rising stars and legendary bands and performers - the Festival will once again showcase the best talent of the Hot Jazz Renaissance sweeping the country. 

The music will span the entire breadth and scope of early jazz, from the beginnings in New Orleans, through the music's glorious migration to Chicago and then to Harlem - up through the Roaring '20s and the Prohibition - and into the beginning of the Big Band Swing era.
